column4: />We are seeking the funding to build her team of talented people to carry on fashion production. Since having no current extra seamstresses, pattern drafters sewers or sketchers it bottlenecks production of these amazing pieces. Please join us on this project. Rather than outsource and remove the unique custom-made touch, we are going to keep operations in-house with local fashion talent.  If you want to make a more beautiful world and inspire people to be more lovely please join us on this project.

column1: • We need talented team players to produce the line and carry on the dream.
• Any funds raised will be used to scale-up production and design.
Priscilla Dawn Style Prom or Wedding Gown...
• Is re-invigorating the doll and tea fashion for a new generation.
• To date, we have made over a thousand dresses, and want to make many more in years to come.
We need your help to spread this style and bring back the doll in your friends and yourself helping people to feel more beautiful.
If you want to help beyond funding:
• Tell your friends about PriscillaDawn to spread the word!
• Share us to your Facebook, Twitter and Indiegogo friends!
• Help us find talented clothing designers interested in a future of fashion design!
• If interested to work as a Priscilla Dawn designer, contact us!
And that’s all there is to it.

Priscilla is a young Chicago fashion designer and she founded PriscillaDawn in 2008 with the devoted passion to bring back the doll in her customers' fashion.  Since then she has sold over hundreds of custom dresses to her ever growing fan base all made my hand.

Each piece is carefully designed and handmade by her with the highest quality materials. All designs have been documented and trademarked as exclusive one of a kind or limited editions with less than ten created.

Priscilla has also designed for runway show, ballets, TV shows, Broadway, movies, plays, charity fundraisers, stage performances, tea parties, proms, balls, weddings, photo shoots, top models and boutiques in the US and overseas.  These pieces have also been featured in many wonderful public blogs and magazines like TURN, model magazine, Artisan, etc.
But to truly impact the fashion industry we need your help...
What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking the funding to build her team of talented people to carry on fashion production. Since having no current extra seamstresses, pattern drafters sewers or sketchers it bottlenecks production of these amazing pieces. Please join us on this project. Rather than outsource and remove the unique custom-made touch, we are going to keep operations in-house with local fashion talent.  If you want to make a more beautiful world and inspire people to be more lovely please join us on this project.
We are asking for $3,000 to for the starting cash to quickly expand production.
We will need over $10,000 to grow operations

Hi! We’re Sorte, an independent and homemade brand based in
Maracaibo, Venezuela. Our team consists of three friends (Marcela Arends, Michelle and Omer Paz) all students in our early-twenties, looking to create and share with others our skills as
graphic designers. We produce our pieces from design to print. We’re mostly inspired by things that surround us and represent
our culture, as well as interesting things we see form other cultures around
the world, which we eventually turn into original and new designs for our
want to promote values such as equality, tolerance and respect towards others.
We also want to show a good work ethic and discipline.
is made with passion. Yet, the problems we currently face in our country make
everything very difficult, especially for honest, young students as us who want
to start new creative projects. Because of the economic crisis we live in, the
lack of materials makes it impossible for us to grow as a Screen Printing
workshop and a brand, for that matter. We started off very
humbly, with a very low budget. We basically took all we had in our pockets and kept going from there. Even our equipment was made at home.
given all our love to this project of ours. By contributing to this cause,
you’ll be helping is grow as a strong consolidated business. With your donation,
we will be able to buy the necessary equipment that will allow us to keep

en Maracaibo, Venezuela que se inspira en diferentes culturas, cosas que nos
rodean para crear divertidos diseños y luego estamparlos en diferentes
materiales. Trabajamos principalmente con franelas, bolsos, faldas y ropa
Somos una organización independiente, producimos nuestras piezas  desde el diseño hasta el estampado, inspirándonos en
tendencias actuales para crear un producto de calidad y a su vez 100% hecho en
casa con todo el cariño del mundo.
Este proyecto inició con tres amigos (Marcela Arends, Michelle y
Omer Paz) todos jóvenes estudiantes, buscando mostrar sus capacidades

equipo creativo, además de la pasión por el diseño y la moda.

Comenzamos con un presupuesto muy bajo, tomamos lo que había en nuestros bolsillos y desde ahí comenzó a andar la idea. Nos encanta la humildad de nuestro taller, porque nos recuerda quienes somos y como comenzó la idea, que es un producto hecho en casa. Sin embargo, queremos perfeccionar nuestro producto y con las herramientas que contamos en este momento no se nos hace posible, nuestro país pasa por una crisis económica grande, y la venta de nuestras piezas apenas alcanza para la compra de material. La alta demanda y poca producción actual genera desabastecimiento y una inflación descontrolada, haciendo que en menos de 24 horas los productos aumenten su precio en un 100%, y a su vez reduciendo la posibilidad de conseguirlos.
hemos esforzado para lograr que este proyecto naciera. Tu contribución nos ayudará a seguir creciendo como empresa y
marca, a armar un taller de serigrafía mucho mas competente para así poder
consolidarnos. El presupuesto se utilizará para la compra de materiales
necesarios y equipos para nuestro taller de serigrafía.
incluyen: Pulpo serigráfico, Máquina secadora, Insoladora serigráfica, Emulsión
fotosensible, Tanque de agua a presión, Emulsionadores, Papel de transparencia,
Bastidores serigráficos, Mallas de seda, Cinta de embalar y adhesiva, Pegatex
en spray, Pinturas a base de agua, Espátulas, Racletas, Removedor de pantalla,
Franelas, Telas, Maquina de coser, Maquina de filetear, entre otros.
se usará para la producción de sus recompensas y envíos.
amabilidad por leer nuestra historia y creer en pequeñas organizaciones como la
nuestra. Incluso sería de gran ayuda si sólo comparten esta información con

otras personas. ¡Muchísimas gracias! ♡

¡No olviden visitar nuestras páginas para conocer más sobre nuestro trabajo!

graphic designers. We produce our pieces from design to print. We’re mostly inspired by things that surround us and represent

And that's just for basic caption T's.  Looking for an all-over print, or discharge work (Ink in the shirt and not plastisol), the costs go up...and your definitely talking about a minimum quantity order...  With JOJUBO-Apparel, you get unique prints, at affordable prices not driven by supply and demand.  Even as our line gains in popularity, our prices will NOT increase to match!  ((Make sure to Read our FAQ's at the bottom))

column8: >Everything is Ready, Now we need YOU!

column2: >All Caption T's will be printed on durable Gildan T-shirts, 100% Pre-shrunk Cotton. Shirts are available in both Men and Womens, in White or Black.The captions will be placed using Ultra-Soft Touch Plastisol.  The result is a smooth feel that is durable yet light enough not to inhibit the natural movement of the shirt. (Sizes range from Adult Small to 3XL)

column1: • All Limited Edition Signed Custom Artistic shirts will be on Next Level Apparel ( 3600 Men's and 3300L Women's) styles.  These are fantastic shirts with a soft comfortable feel, and great form fitting. The Artwork will be placed into the shirts them selves through a process known as Discharge.  This process allows for amazing detail, no cracking or flaking as there is NO plastisol, meaning you will enjoy the look and feel for countless years (Sizes range from Adult Small to 2XL)

*Even though they are pre-shrunk we suggest you order one size larger as they do shrink a slight bit (If you like the loose fit more)...A size larger will provide you a great, loose, form fit appearance that flatters everyone.  For those who enjoy a close fit to their skin, order your normal size.

Your chance to win ""Free"" JOJUBO-Appare! At 50 orders, we will hold a drawing for a Free shirt of your choice, for a randomly selected buyer. At 100 orders we will be holding a secondary drawing where one lucky winner will get 6 Free Artistic T's. We will hold additional drawings for every 100 orders we receive before the campaign ends. Your name will go into the drawing once for each shirt purchased. Those who have already made purchases, are already entered. Like, Share, Purchase, and lets see how many winners we can announce after the campaign!!!!
Keeping Art and Artists in our lives:
More than just purchasing amazing apparel, your orders are helping us create a platform that will continually offer exposure to new artists.
• The more popular our limited release lines become, the more artists will bee seen.
• The more artists we have the greater the selection will become.

• Your purchases will ensure that there is a connection maintained between talented artists and the public.  JOJUBO-Apparel is dedicated to bringing like interests together and expanding the eyes of the public to works they would have otherwise never knew existed.
• Like, share and tell people about our site, or Facebook page, and our event.
• Share this campaign, right here from the Indiegogo site.

​At the end of the campaign everyone who ordered will receive an email to confirm sizes and selections, however we will also be sending emails during the campaign to collect this information prior.  We want everyone to receive their shirts before the Christmas holiday, with a delivery goal of December, 15th.  This means we need accurate mailing, gender, and size choices as soon as possible.
How do I order more than one design?

column2: >Just select them individually.  This allows us to ensure that we do not exceed the maximum prints to be released. You will notice some offers include more than 1 shirt to help minimize the need for multiple orders

column1: ​Yes!  Our chosen facility for the Artistic prints has over 30 years experience in custom printing and in-house fulfillment capabilities (they ship directly to you.), and a manufacturing capability of 20,000 shirts a week.
Our chosen facility for the caption t's has over 10 years experience with 2 distribution centers, in-house fulfillment ability, and a capacity of 50,000 shirts a week.

column3: > of seeing a multitude of people wearing your same shirt is greatly reduced.  Limited prints means that you can be unique, and among a special few.

column1: NOPE!  Now a days if you want something original or not seen everyday, you have to pay big bucks.  Whether your paying for your own development, or paying a large amount of money because few others will, the bottom line is your paying a lot of money...not with JOJUBO-Apparel.  We will continually offer great caption and Artistic T's, at affordable prices no matter how limited the supply or how popular we become.

column4: >Crowdfunding makes it possible to offer unique prints without the cost of stocking inventory upfront, or the risk of money spent on non-performing designs.  Plus it allows for people to make
column8: > choices and receive their shirts regardless of the items popularity.
column11: >  Yes there is a small delay from ordering till delivery, but as a small company this allows us to keep profitable until such time where we can

column1: Will you ever make previous prints available again if I miss the first offer?

column2: >We want our artists to find exposure through JOJUBO-Apparel. If a particular
column3: > design does not reach it's maximum release count of 2000 shirts, then they may be made available for purchase directly from our site (We suggest you get them here while you can...free shipping within the US and lower cost) ...The caption screen printed T's - we might re-offer the most popular, once more the following year, so make sure to like our Facebook page and submit to the site to be kept up to date.

column1: Will the Quality of the Shirts Vary?

While some Printers offer different types of shirts, quality is our NUMBER ONE concern.  The Screen Caption shirts will be sturdy Gildan cotton shirts, utilizing ultra-soft plastisol screen printing.  This method of printing allows the shirt to move naturally with barely any restrictions from the over-lay.  The Artistic T's will be printed on Next Level shirts using discharge printing techniques.  The technique places the artwork directly into the fabric of the garment and offers a high level of detail, no plastisol!  Next Level shirts or known for their soft feel and form fitting style!

.

","JOJUBO-Apparel is here!
JOJUBO-Apparel is a clothing line dedicated to two ideas:
Clothing that lets you speak out-loud without saying a word.
A platform for Artists to offer signed, limited edition, unique custom works.

Our caption screen printed T's can be bought for self-expression, given as a gift, or just enjoyed for the words and feel. Our Artistic-Signature shirts provide you the opportunity to own unique apparel that will not be found everywhere you look. Large retailers can have 1000's of locations, with a 100 prints or more per store.  That's hundreds-of-thousands of shirts, and suddenly your style became that guy's, and that guy's,and........

JOJUBO's limited edition apparel means that these shirts will only be owned by a select few, and when they are gone, That's It! Our shirts will always be made with quality material and printing processes to ensure durability, comfort, and style.

Being unique can be costly in today's world. Creating your own shirt costs lots of money, especially if you only want one!  There's generally a set-up fee per color screen ($20-$30 per color screen), and minimum order amounts... And that's just for basic caption T's.  Looking for an all-over print, or discharge work (Ink in the shirt and not plastisol), the costs go up...and your definitely talking about a minimum quantity order...  With JOJUBO-Apparel, you get unique prints, at affordable prices not driven by supply and demand.  Even as our line gains in popularity, our prices will NOT increase to match!  ((Make sure to Read our FAQ's at the bottom))

JOJUBO-Apparel is dedicated to helping artists gain exposure in ways they might otherwise not find available.  There are many great artists around the world but only a select few become widely known, or are commissioned to have their works provided on multiple media. JOJUBO offers artists a way to have their work brought to the public on a national and possibly global scale. By placing these works on shirts, thousands of people far and wide, will be introduced to their talents. The more popular we can make JOJUBO-Apparel, the better the exposure we can generate for our Artists. Imagine owning a limited edition, signed T-shirt, before they became well-known.       The best part, is that it costs them (the artists) nothing to be featured!  In-fact they make money for every print, both their works and a portion of each caption-T, sold. We might not make them millionaires, but we can keep them from starving!

​Limited prints means that the likely-hood of seeing a multitude of people wearing your same shirt is greatly reduced.  Limited prints means that you can be unique, and among a special few.
Will Limited Prints Mean Higher Costs?

NOPE!  Now a days if you want something original or not seen everyday, you have to pay big bucks.  Whether your paying for your own development, or paying a large amount of money because few others will, the bottom line is your paying a lot of money...not with JOJUBO-Apparel.  We will continually offer great caption and Artistic T's, at affordable prices no matter how limited the supply or how popular we become.

Crowdfunding makes it possible to offer unique prints without the cost of stocking inventory upfront, or the risk of money spent on non-performing designs.  Plus it allows for people to make their choices and receive their shirts regardless of the items popularity.  Yes there is a small delay from ordering till delivery, but as a small company this allows us to keep profitable until such time where we can ​pre-order inventory for immediate shipping ability.
Will you ever make previous prints available again if I miss the first offer?

We want our artists to find exposure through JOJUBO-Apparel. If a particular design does not reach it's maximum release count of 2000 shirts, then they may be made available for purchase directly from our site (We suggest you get them here while you can...free shipping within the US and lower cost) ...The caption screen printed T's - we might re-offer the most popular, once more the following year, so make sure to like our Facebook page and submit to the site to be kept up to date.
Will the Quality of the Shirts Vary?

While some Printers offer different types of shirts, quality is our NUMBER ONE concern.  The Screen Caption shirts will be sturdy Gildan cotton shirts, utilizing ultra-soft plastisol screen printing.  This method of printing allows the shirt to move naturally with barely any restrictions from the over-lay.  The Artistic T's will be printed on Next Level shirts using discharge printing techniques.  The technique places the artwork directly into the fabric of the garment and offers a high level of detail, no plastisol!  Next Level shirts or known for their soft feel and form fitting style!.",28.0,0,"3 Campaigns

FAST, which stands for Fashion And Student Trends, is UCLA’s first and only fashion club. It was founded eleven years ago with an aim to showcase student achievements and provide opportunities for things like: leadership experience, fashion design, graphic design, styling, event production, photography, fashion blogging, and career exploration. Our club holds the largest fashion show at UCLA. Th<span class=""text_exposed_show""><span class=""text_exposed_show"">e annual spring show is entirely student run: student fashion designers, student models, student photographers, and student dancers, and studen runway architects. This year our show highlighted eight student designers, 35 student models, 6 committee groups (Sponosrship, Creative, Blog, PR &amp
column2: Marketing, Editorial, External Events, and Backstage crew) and two student dance groups.

column1: If you haven't already, please check out our MUSE intro video created by Creative Director, Kathleen Schenck.
MUSE Fashion Show Intro: http://vimeo.com/66298020

Each year, fashion show production fees steadily rise and as a non-profit student organization it becomes increasingly harder to pay these fees. We need your help in order to keep this unique organization alive. We want to continue our tradition of annual fashion shows in order to provide a creative fashion outet for our students.

Despite UCLA's location in the epicenter of the entertinament and fashion industries, there are no fashion design major, classes, nor large-scale outlet for students to express their flair for sartoiral creation. Therefore, FAST provides this experience and exposure for UCLA's finest artistic talent, regardless of major or year. FAST also offers the opportunity for students to participate in the planning and execution of a full- fledged production.
Please help our students hold on to that creative outlet! Any monetory donation helps.
After student funding, we are still $4,500 short. Dearest FAST family, friends, and alumni, any donation helps! Look at our swag list for perks for donations!
For more info about our club, please visit:

FAST, which stands for Fashion And Student Trends, is UCLA’s first and only fashion club. It was founded eleven years ago with an aim to showcase student achievements and provide opportunities for things like: leadership experience, fashion design, graphic design, styling, event production, photography, fashion blogging, and career exploration. Our club holds the largest fashion show at UCLA. The annual spring show is entirely student run: student fashion designers, student models, student photographers, and student dancers, and studen runway architects. This year our show highlighted eight student designers, 35 student models, 6 committee groups (Sponosrship, Creative, Blog, PR & Marketing, Editorial, External Events, and Backstage crew) and two student dance groups.
If you haven't already, please check out our MUSE intro video created by Creative Director, Kathleen Schenck.

We need your help in order to keep this unique organization alive. We want to continue our tradition of annual fashion shows in order to provide a creative fashion outet for our students.

Despite UCLA's location in the epicenter of the entertinament and fashion industries, there are no fashion design major, classes, nor large-scale outlet for students to express their flair for sartoiral creation. Therefore, FAST provides this experience and exposure for UCLA's finest artistic talent, regardless of major or year. FAST also offers the opportunity for students to participate in the planning and execution of a full- fledged production.
Please help our students hold on to that creative outlet! Any monetory donation helps.

For more info about our club, please visit:

VISION: A global declaration to claim our rights to be ourselves. 
MISSION: ""I Am An Artist"" 

@bypoststreet is a Canadian-based art &
column2:
apparel house with the mission of igniting passion through creative expression.  @bypoststreet celebrates artistic talent and street culture, and rides the collaborative wave that combines art, fashion, music and social media.  We embrace the guerilla marketing philosophy to engage our customers and supporters through collaborative art projects, unisex apparel and interactive art events. 

@bypoststreet was first conceived on Feb 12, 2013.  In a year we created three limited edition t-shirt collections, hosted several successful art events in Vancouver and San Francisco and laid the foundation to become a house hold brand name known for pushing the envelope of art and design.  It is time to develop the new product line and solidify our company branding to expand our international presence and we need your help!
column4:
>

@bypoststreet's business model allows for the ebb and flow of success and failure.  Our streamlined structure allows for adaptation
column5:
we welcome changes!  As the company grows, we grow.  While we had an incredible 2013 of developing the brand, raising $38,000 from the banks and learning the ropes of business, we now find ourselves at a crossroads.  @bypoststreet needs to get to the next level, and we don't have the money to do it.  We need to move into a new live/work space, we need to expand our global Wall Project and for this campaign, we need to raise the funds to fine tune our brand create our next apparel collection.  Here's what we need: 

INVENTORY $2000

  • We'll create the samples for the next collection consisting of printed &
column6: plain t-shirts and tank tops in multiple colours (and yes, first on the list- BLACK t-shirts!).

column1:
STORE PREP $1500
  • In order to get @bypoststreet in over 30 brick &
column2: mortar stores across North America, we need a chunk of cash to shoot a Product Look Book, hire Vancouver photographer Rick Legal to shoot the Editorial shots, create a Line Sheet and bring on a Sales Rep.

column1: $7500: We sourced a fabulous business manager in Vancouver.  She'll be hired on a consulting basis to our Operations team to hold us accountable on our day-to-day operations and determine the best course-of-action for growth so we can aim to never fall short of cash again!
$10000: It's Trade Show time! At the 10K mark we'll be able to confirm a spot at Knowshow, a trade show for lifestyle brands hosted in Vancouver at the end of July.

$15000: NYC? Sure! LA? Absolutely! PR Team? Obviously! We've talked to several PR agencies across North America and if we reach the 15K+ zone, we'll be able to pick a team to turn our megaphone up to high.

•  $25000+: When we reach the 25K+ mark, we'll be able to live stress-free and execute our plan in our new live/work space (aka a creative retreat) in downtown Vancouver until the end of May at least.  Creating takes time, and time breeds creativity.

Your contribution will become a part of the brand's story.  Every dollar we receive will be another drop in the bucket towards the goals we outlined above and goals we haven't even conceived yet.  You'll become a part of creating a united army of self-expression and a look that works for all, a global declaration to claim your right to be yourself.  When you have our back, we'll absolutely have yours. 

""No joke, the best fitted t-shirt I may have ever had or worn.""
-Dustin Grant, Barber

""I've seen your awesome t-shirts before and with your creativity and amazing contacts, friends and rule breaking attitude, you will succeed in no time!""  
-Julia Kozlov, Founder/CEO of Profile Studio  

$1- THANK YOU 
  • Every single contribution will receive a spot on our Express Wall on the @bypoststreet website.
• Receive a glossy white iPhone case with an embossed limited edition print of Karl Lagerfeld drawn our Art Director. The thin &
column2: slim case provides your phone with added protection minus the heavy bulk or weight. <b>Ready to ship immediately, 4/4S &amp

column1: • With a new logo, we need a new t-shirt! Get a head start by pre-ordering your @bypoststreet logo t-shirt at the $35 dollar level.  Logo will be printed on a black 100% cotton pre-made body with unisex sizing S-L.  Ready to ship in April.

$55- DESIGNER COLLECTION T-SHIRT
  • The @bypoststreet limited edition apparel collections feature unique luxury and sportswear inspired graphic t-shirts.  The ultra-soft bamboo/cotton cloth is milled in Ontario and the garments are produced, printed and finished in Vancouver.  Pick a t-shirt from the 'Designer Collection' (released late 2013) featuring limited edition portraits of influential fashion personalities drawn by our Art Director.  Ready to ship immediately.

column2:
PERSONAL PORTRAIT
  • @bypoststreet pays homage to self-discovery, mutual discover and transformation.  Pick either the style icon Isabella Blow, or designer Alexander McQueen (the Lost and Found).  Images are placed on the back of the t-shirt.  Though we lost them both to suicide, their art is immortal.  With this perk, you will also receive a 20"" x 30"" portrait of a person of your choice drawn by our Art Director. Allow 10 business days for shipping.

column1: We thank each and everyone of you for your time, consideration and your listening!  One of the biggest challenges of a starting a new business is building brand awareness and trust.  Please help us out by simply sharing this campaign with your social media networks. Your shares will make a huge impact on showing the world who we are.  Nothing works better than a little word of mouth, so consider this permission to gossip away about us!
Want more of us? Follow @bypoststreet on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram &

Thanks everyone for your support!! We at DELTAt are very grateful for your believing! We really hope that you will love wearing the SoRa as much as we do
Being the first pilot watch in the history of crowdfunding, SoRa is a beautiful timepiece that is made to redefine the standard of pilot watches.

SoRa 1918

SoRa 1918 has been unlocked for stretch goal level 1.

For every contributor, we will send a survey to ask which model you want (choose between 1918, 1939, Stealth, Eagle, and Drone) before shipment.

Please be notified that the hands of the SoRa 1918 has not been finalized yet. Everything else is confirmed and the specifications are the same as other SoRa models. We will keep you updated

We are a bunch of young wrist watch enthusiasts. After all these years, we’ve found out that the ecology of watch business is divided into two major tiers. Decent watches with good qualities are priced at exceptionally high-priced ranges, while watches with acceptable prices are usually made with compromised qualities.

By lucky chance coincidence, we were introduced to the owner of a watch manufacturer, who has been in the business for more than three decades. His dedication to the business and his attitude of never just being satisfied with qualities makes us feel like we have been friends for years. This enlightened us to build our own watch company, whose purpose is to merge the two tiers and to produce high quality watches with passion, at a very reasonable price range.  Our goal is to bring quality watches to the public so that everyone can share our joy of being a watch lover.

This is how DELTAt is born. “DELTA” is the measure of change, and “t” denotes time. Together, DELTAt symbols the change of time.

Product – SoRa, the pilot watch

Amongst all categories of watches, the pilot watch has played a very important role in wrist watches’ history. During World War I, bomber pilots relied heavily on watches’ accuracy for assistance in precise navigation for coordinated attacks, in turn this advanced the whole watch industry for at least 10 years!

Although pilot watches are unique in the watch family, it is surprising that it has never established a standard. So we decided to define a standard for pilot watches:

Size - A pilot watch must be read with ease, so it must have a big dial.

Large Crown - Pilots wear gloves when driving aircrafts, so the crown must be specially designed.

Precise Time Setting - Pilots need to set time precisely, even up to seconds, so good quality movements with hacking seconds function is a must.

Long Straps - Pilots may wear their watches on flight jackets’ sleeves.

 

 

 

SoRa Pilot Watch
column5:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

With the above standards as the baseline of design in mind, we came up with the perfect pilot watch, the SoRa.
column7:
/>

Initial Sketch of the SoRa.

Case


SoRa's case measuring 44mm in diameter. With a 38mm diameter dial, time reading on SoRa is very easy. SoRa uses 316L Stainless Steel as its case and bottom cover's material. 316L Stainless Steel is a surgical grade material. Not only because it is very hard and free from corrosion, it also contains much less nickel that does not trigger an allergic reaction to sensitive skins.
The shape of SoRa may seem simple. However, the simpler the design is, the harder it is to make it perfect. In order to have SoRa brushed thoroughly, we divided the case into two parts (which increases the cost quite a bit), the bezel and the body, so that every surface of the case can be brushed perfectly, and every edge of the case can be so shapely defined. Every line and curve is carefully designed with its necessity and beauty, and they all add up to form the case of a minimalist's perfect pilot watch.

 

 

 

 

Crown

 

SoRa's large crown, with cross-diagonal pattern, measuring 10mm in diameter and 5mm in height makes it easily accessible even with gloves on. While being big, its size is carefully designed so that it doesn't jab into your wrist's skin.
column12:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

Movement

In order to be collectable, a wrist watch must use a mechanical movement. Mechanical movements not only represent the inheritance of watchmakers' tradition, they are the essence of over 500 years of watch history. You can't imagine how difficult it is to measure one second precisely by pure mechanical instruments, especially if compares to electronic devices. This craftsmanship alone is considered as a form of art.

 

SoRa uses the Japan Time Module Automatic Movement cal. NH37 from Seiko. If the movement is the heart of a wrist watch, then the balance-spring is the soul of the movement. NH37 can be wound manually or automatically by its rotor. It also features the hacking seconds function, which allows you to set time precisely up to the second.
column14:
/>

 

Straps

SoRa comes with 3 set of extra-long straps:

column1: • Genuine Fine Crazy Horse Leather straps with removable base.

Extra-long genuine fine Crazy Horse leather straps with removable base.

 

 

Extra-long genuine fine leather straps.

 

Extra-long military style Nylon strap.

Wearing SoRa on the pilot jacket's sleeve.

The double-sided Crazy Horse leather straps and the Nylon strap is very nice and elegant. Paired with SoRa, they make the watch beyond an instrument of chronology. It becomes an icon of fashion! To help you enjoy changing the straps of SoRa, we implemented the tooless-strap-changing system into SoRa, Changing straps for SoRa will never be easier.

We do not stop just because we have met the standard of pilot watches. We push the standard to a new level in every aspect of the SoRa, and make sure it is a wrist watch with premium value:

Crystal

 

SoRa uses Sapphire Crsytal with anti-reflective coating. Sapphire Crystal is the second hardest natural mineral on earth. Rated 9 at Mohs Scale, only after diamond. A material will be scratched only by materials that are harder than itself, so the chance of Sapphire Crystal being scratched is very low. Therefore, Sapphire Crystal is highly scratch resistance. It has become the standard of luxury wrist watches.
column6:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

Water Resistant

 

Although SoRa is a pilot watch, we want you to be able to wear it as much as you want to, so that we make it water resistant to 200 meter/660 feet. There is no reason to leave your SoRa at home.

Bottom Cover

 

SoRa's screw-in bottom cover is made of 316L Stainless Steel. A bi-plane and a serial number is engraved on the bottom cover.

Indiegogo Exclusive Edition

Each model of the SoRa will have 20 pieces of the Indiegogo Exclusive Edition, which has the traditional aviation arrow engraved on the bottom cover. The letter ""A"" followed by the broad arrow were used by the British bomber pilots in the First World War. The ""A"" represents aviation or air force, and the arrow represent the British War Department.

 

Models

SoRa has 4 models, 1939, Stealth, Drone, and Eagle. Each model has PVD and Steel variations.

1939

 

Stealth

 

Drone

 

Eagle

 

Warranty Card

 

Each SoRa comes with a dog tag as the warranty card.

Specifications

Movement:

column1: • Japan Time Module (Seiko) Automatic Movement Cal. NH37

Crown:

  • 10mm diameter with cross-diagonal pattern

Crystal:

  • Sapphire Crystal with anti-reflective coating

Water Resistant:

  • 200m/660ft (20ATM) Water Resistant

Straps:
• One set of 90/135mm genuine fine Crazy Horse leather straps with removable base
• One set of 90/135mm genuine fine leather straps

Perks

Perks are simple. The earlier the contribution, the greater the discount. SoRa will be retail priced at USD450. All models are priced at the same amount. All perks will ship internationally for free.

For USD20 perk, an US Army Dog Tag will be received. The dog tag has five lines with 15 characters on each line. The following characters can be used:

ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ 0123456789，.：‘-/&
column2:
*@+！？（）

Photo Gallery

First and second generation of SoRa's prototypes at the workshop.

 

First generation prototypes.

 

SoRa and Mr. Michael Tong

 

Where are we now?

We have been working on the SoRa project since January 2014. Two generations of prototypes have been produced and we are now working on the third generation of prototype, which should be very close to the final product. We had spent a couple of months with the factory to ensure that every step of the manufacturing processes is reliable, accurate, and flawless. As the employees of the factory have become very good friends of ours, we work very closely with them and visit the factory weekly.

Why we need your help?

As we use the best materials and craftsmanship to build the SoRa, the cost of the production is relatively high. In order to lower the cost and thus lower the retail prices, mass quantity of production is needed. That's why we need your help and support! Please help us and so that we can share the joy of owning this beautiful timepiece!

Schedule

 

 

Risks and Challenges

We understand that every project may encounter some risks and challenges. However, as we have been working on the SoRa project for almost a year, we have planned thoroughly and have estimated every single step of the processes. Due to the fact that we work so closely with the factory, we are so confident that everything will work as smooth as possible, and can overcome any issue that might arise. The number one risk that we might have to face is production delay. If *touch wood* anything went wrong that prolong the production process, we will inform you immediately. We will keep you updated for every single step we have moved.

FAQ

Q. Sapphire crystal will not be scratched, but may I ask why there is still damaging of sapphire crystals being heard from time to time?

Ans. There are two cases in this scenario. A) If an object is colliding with another object that is harder than itself, it could be scratched. For example, if a sapphire crystal collides with a diamond, it would be scratched. But this is a rare situation. B) If the force of the collision is huge, such as falling on the ground from a high position, then the sapphire crystal might break.

Q. What is Mohs Scale?

Ans. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mohs_scale_of_mineral_hardness

Q. What is hacking seconds function?

Ans. Hacking seconds is the function that when setting time, the second hand stops, so that you can set time precisely up to second.

 

 

 

","Goal Reached!

Genuine Fine Crazy Horse Leather straps with removable base.

Extra-long genuine fine Crazy Horse leather straps with removable base.  Extra-long genuine fine leather straps. Extra-long military style Nylon strap.Wearing SoRa on the pilot jacket's sleeve.The double-sided Crazy Horse leather straps and the Nylon strap is very nice and elegant. Paired with SoRa, they make the watch beyond an instrument of chronology. It becomes an icon of fashion! To help you enjoy changing the straps of SoRa, we implemented the tooless-strap-changing system into SoRa, Changing straps for SoRa will never be easier.We do not stop just because we have met the standard of pilot watches. We push the standard to a new level in every aspect of the SoRa, and make sure it is a wrist watch with premium value:Crystal SoRa uses Sapphire Crsytal with anti-reflective coating. Sapphire Crystal is the second hardest natural mineral on earth. Rated 9 at Mohs Scale, only after diamond. A material will be scratched only by materials that are harder than itself, so the chance of Sapphire Crystal being scratched is very low. Therefore, Sapphire Crystal is highly scratch resistance. It has become the standard of luxury wrist watches.Water Resistant Although SoRa is a pilot watch, we want you to be able to wear it as much as you want to, so that we make it water resistant to 200 meter/660 feet. There is no reason to leave your SoRa at home.Bottom Cover SoRa's screw-in bottom cover is made of 316L Stainless Steel. A bi-plane and a serial number is engraved on the bottom cover.Indiegogo Exclusive EditionEach model of the SoRa will have 20 pieces of the Indiegogo Exclusive Edition, which has the traditional aviation arrow engraved on the bottom cover. The letter ""A"" followed by the broad arrow were used by the British bomber pilots in the First World War. The ""A"" represents aviation or air force, and the arrow represent the British War Department. ModelsSoRa has 4 models, 1939, Stealth, Drone, and Eagle. Each model has PVD and Steel variations.1939 Stealth Drone Eagle Warranty Card Each SoRa comes with a dog tag as the warranty card.SpecificationsMovement:
Japan Time Module (Seiko) Automatic Movement Cal. NH37
Hands:Lumed Hour, Minute, Small 24 Hour HandCase:
Crown:10mm diameter with cross-diagonal patternCrystal:Sapphire Crystal with anti-reflective coatingWater Resistant:200m/660ft (20ATM) Water ResistantStraps:
One set of 90/135mm genuine fine Crazy Horse leather straps with removable base
One set of 90/135mm genuine fine leather straps

PerksPerks are simple. The earlier the contribution, the greater the discount. SoRa will be retail priced at USD450. All models are priced at the same amount. All perks will ship internationally for free.For USD20 perk, an US Army Dog Tag will be received. The dog tag has five lines with 15 characters on each line. The following characters can be used:ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ 0123456789，.：‘-/&*@+！？（）Photo GalleryFirst and second generation of SoRa's prototypes at the workshop. First generation prototypes. SoRa and Mr. Michael Tong Where are we now?We have been working on the SoRa project since January 2014. Two generations of prototypes have been produced and we are now working on the third generation of prototype, which should be very close to the final product. We had spent a couple of months with the factory to ensure that every step of the manufacturing processes is reliable, accurate, and flawless. As the employees of the factory have become very good friends of ours, we work very closely with them and visit the factory weekly.Why we need your help?As we use the best materials and craftsmanship to build the SoRa, the cost of the production is relatively high. In order to lower the cost and thus lower the retail prices, mass quantity of production is needed. That's why we need your help and support! Please help us and so that we can share the joy of owning this beautiful timepiece!Schedule  Risks and ChallengesWe understand that every project may encounter some risks and challenges. However, as we have been working on the SoRa project for almost a year, we have planned thoroughly and have estimated every single step of the processes. Due to the fact that we work so closely with the factory, we are so confident that everything will work as smooth as possible, and can overcome any issue that might arise. The number one risk that we might have to face is production delay. If *touch wood* anything went wrong that prolong the production process, we will inform you immediately. We will keep you updated for every single step we have moved.FAQQ. Sapphire crystal will not be scratched, but may I ask why there is still damaging of sapphire crystals being heard from time to time?Ans. There are two cases in this scenario. A) If an object is colliding with another object that is harder than itself, it could be scratched. For example, if a sapphire crystal collides with a diamond, it would be scratched. But this is a rare situation. B) If the force of the collision is huge, such as falling on the ground from a high position, then the sapphire crystal might break.Q. What is Mohs Scale?Ans. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mohs_scale_of_mineral_hardnessQ. What is hacking seconds function?Ans. Hacking seconds is the function that when setting time, the second hand stops, so that you can set time precisely up to second.",85.0,3,"1 Campaign

column16: >NOBRE is a Environmentally and socially conscious fashion brand, Working

column1: environmental and social causes. Every single product of NOBRE has a power to change the world. Our products are organic, they are ethically sourced and are under warranty. So there are many unique features NOBRE, Check out the campaign further to learn more.

Environmental issues

Since the Industrial revolution began, the Fashion industry has become the 4th highest polluting industry of the world. Phthalates, nonylphenol, ethoxylates (NPEs) and azo dyes are still commonly used in industry, these chemicals are dangerous  to nature and human health. About 19.6% of total industrial waste comes from the fashion industry alone.             

Social

Fashion industry looks clean from one's first glance but has a truly a dark side when one digs deeper. The big names of fashion industry have been promoting cheap labor trends and this trend has made poor laborers work day and night still unable to feed themselves and their family.

                               

We produce a range of high quality, environmentally friendly, and socially responsible clothing. Nobre is not just a clothing brand, it is a cause working to provide a sustainable and respectable business that will move those in lower labor conditions to achieve a higher standard of living. Team Nobre believes that every business gets plenty of resources from society, so it's about time the responsibility of every business begins to work for the betterment of all who they affect.

column11: >For each NOBRE style and item you purchase, the charity tied to that cause will benefit that specific metric. YOU are creating the change in the World! Through our website and social media, we will be highlighting stories of the change being created. YOU will literally be able to see the change YOU have created.

Our products are unique, ecological, and ethically sourced. Our Shirts and Jeans are designed to be stylish, yet complementary. They serve as an eye-catching, statement to show support for the movement to end environmental and social degrading practices with a stylish fitting. Our products are made from 100% organic materials.

 The most unique feature of our products is that they are free of toxic chemicals and materials. This ensures that the product is not harmful to anyone from fabricator to our clients.

column1: life-changing experience, come with our team to India to see the change
happening! (All Expenses Paid- See $5000 perk) <span style=""color: rgb(106, 106, 106)
We know you want to show off your Nobre, so we are working hard to get them manufactured and ready to ship as soon as possible. We refuse to send you anything but the highest quality product!

Please note that due to overwhelming demand, these are our best estimations. We will contact you via Indiegogo update and direct email with exact dates after our campaign. We cannot tell you an exact date at this point.
Is there a charge for International Shipping?

Yes, there will need to be an additional charge to ship internationally. It costs $10 per product to ship to international addresses.  Please include that in the checkout price.  If you forget, we'll contact you prior to shipping to finalize those details.
If you have any specific questions about your location, please email us at team@nobreclothings.in

column5: >Is there a warranty on Nobre's products?

column1: Yes. There is a 1-year warranty. If you want to raise the warranty to 5 year you can add by purchasing perk of $10. If there are any defects, our repair center will fix it or replace it. However, we strive to provide the highest quality materials so this will not be an issue.

column2: >Is Nobre available in retail stores of U.S?

column1: Not yet, but soon! Nobre will be in retail stores in first months of 2015.
What percentage of donations go to the charities?

Each Nobre comes with a metric which is carried out with the purchase of the products.  We want to make the business model as transparent as possible and never want you to have to ask the question ""And then what?""  With that said we will not only tell you what, we will show you what!

For example, for every Shirt purchased, it will provide 5 children in the India with food supplements and we will plant 4 tress in your name.  The same holds true for each of the other metrics. The goal is to create an actual quantified change in people's lives around the world for each watch sold.

The Products are designed and manufactured in Nagpur, India. The facility has passed the SA8000 (Social Accountability) and ISO14000 (Environmental) audits. Furthermore, our manufacturing facility is ROHS compliant.

GeckoEye is a small (45 mm), stylish, highly-protected and
convenient device with durable aluminum or polycarbonate casing. It is a
round camera powered by solar panels that is fit to be mounted anywhere
due to its special mounting features.

the base (supplied with a cam, it also has a gsm slot) by wi-fi. The GeckoEye station
transmits video to a secure cloud storage. The user can either monitor the
device live or video from the archive and look through it later.

Q: How do I set up GeckoEye, can anyone do it?
A: Yes, it’s very easy to setup.
      1. Unpack your device
      2. Sign in with mobile app
      3. Connect GeckoEye Cam to GeckoEye Station by Wi-Fi
     4. Customize GeckoEye device for your convenience – set up the mode of alerts, video quality, settings of storage and record

Q: Does perks prices include some discount?
A: Yes, only for Indiegogo backers price is about 25% less then future retail. Also cloud storage is always free of charge.

Q: How big is GeckoEye?
A: Camera is just 45 mm and base is 104 mm.

Q: How many GeckoEye cameras can be connected to base?
A: It support up to 3 cameras.

Q: What is the range GeckoEye camera can send video to base?
A: GeckoEye’s range is approximately 200 feet (61 meters).

Q: How does GeckoEye attach to items?
A: GeckoEye cameras can be stuck to almost any surface using mount stick. But best way is a window.

Q: Can I use the GeckoEye app on more than one mobile device?
A: Yes, surely. You will be creating a account with a username and password which will allow you to sign in on any iOS or Android smartphone or tablet.

Q: What if there is a power outage?
A: GeckoEye is equipped with high capacity batteries and will continue to operate as a security system, even if it has lost contact with your home internet connection due to power loss.

Q: What if there is a GSM signal lost?
A: GeckoEye base equipped with 128GB onboard memory and after signal is back all your data will be send to secured Cloud.

Q: What are the monthly fees?
A: There will be no monthly fees for Indiegogo backers. 50 Gb cloud storage is available for each user for free. However, it can easily be extended for an additional fee.

Q: Where is recorded video stored?
A: The video is stored on our secure cloud service and streamed to the mobile app. Live video is accessed directly from GeckoEye by the mobile app.

Q: What encryption do you use?
A: GeckoEye will use 256-bit SSL encryption for all communications.

Q: What if someone steals or destroy my GeckoEye camera?
A: You’ll receive alert and will immediately have access to recorded video of the event.

Q: Can I check my office/home/car if I’m on other side of the Globe?
A: Yes of course, all you need is internet connection.

Q: Can I use GeckoEye when I left my car on a parking?
A: Yes, it will still work up to 240 hours.

Q: Does this replace my existing security system?
A: As you wish. It can be stand-alone system or as additional to your existing security system.

Q: What voltage does GeckoEye Support?
A: GeckoEye will ship with an international switching power supply capable of 100/240v 50/60Hz cable.

Any other questions? Ask away!

We hope you join us.

We've built the cost of shipping into the price of the Indiegogo perks. As with all Indiegogo Projects, this price does not include the customs fees, duties and/or taxes you might incur when importing products into your state or country. We cannot pay these fees for you.

Q: How do I set up GeckoEye, can anyone do it?A: Yes, it’s very easy to setup.       1. Unpack your device      2. Sign in with mobile app      3. Connect GeckoEye Cam to GeckoEye Station by Wi-Fi     4. Customize GeckoEye device for your convenience – set up the mode of alerts, video quality, settings of storage and record

Q: Does perks prices include some discount?A: Yes, only for Indiegogo backers price is about 25% less then future retail. Also cloud storage is always free of charge. Q: How big is GeckoEye?A: Camera is just 45 mm and base is 104 mm.Q: How many GeckoEye cameras can be connected to base?A: It support up to 3 cameras.Q: What is the range GeckoEye camera can send video to base?A: GeckoEye’s range is approximately 200 feet (61 meters).Q: How does GeckoEye attach to items? A: GeckoEye cameras can be stuck to almost any surface using mount stick. But best way is a window.Q: Can I use the GeckoEye app on more than one mobile device?A: Yes, surely. You will be creating a account with a username and password which will allow you to sign in on any iOS or Android smartphone or tablet. Q: What if there is a power outage?A: GeckoEye is equipped with high capacity batteries and will continue to operate as a security system, even if it has lost contact with your home internet connection due to power loss.Q: What if there is a GSM signal lost?A: GeckoEye base equipped with 128GB onboard memory and after signal is back all your data will be send to secured Cloud. Q: What are the monthly fees?A: There will be no monthly fees for Indiegogo backers. 50 Gb cloud storage is available for each user for free. However, it can easily be extended for an additional fee.Q: Where is recorded video stored?A: The video is stored on our secure cloud service and streamed to the mobile app. Live video is accessed directly from GeckoEye by the mobile app.Q: What encryption do you use?A: GeckoEye will use 256-bit SSL encryption for all communications.Q: What if someone steals or destroy my GeckoEye camera?A: You’ll receive alert and will immediately have access to recorded video of the event. Q: Can I check my office/home/car if I’m on other side of the Globe?A: Yes of course, all you need is internet connection.Q: Can I use GeckoEye when I left my car on a parking?A: Yes, it will still work up to 240 hours.Q: Does this replace my existing security system?A: As you wish. It can be stand-alone system or as additional to your existing security system. Q: What voltage does GeckoEye Support?A: GeckoEye will ship with an international switching power supply capable of 100/240v 50/60Hz cable.Any other questions? Ask away!We hope you join us.

We've built the cost of shipping into the price of the Indiegogo perks. As with all Indiegogo Projects, this price does not include the customs fees, duties and/or taxes you might incur when importing products into your state or country. We cannot pay these fees for you.
PressPlease email pr@geckoproject.netPress kit download",18.0,0,"1 Campaign

In Greek mythology Harmonia is the daughter of Aphrodite, Goddess of Love. Known herself as the Goddess of Harmony, Harmonia is a name that brings elegance, love and peace to those who say it and are willing to believe.

Inspired by the Goddess’s sense of both serenity and style, Harmonia Lily is a NY based independent fashion label founded in 2019. Combining years of passion for collecting vintage clothing and accessories with a strong admiration for wicker craftsmanship, I am proud to present to you Harmonia Lily’s flagship handbag. Modeled on one of my favorite animals, my hand woven FREYA bag captures the sweet and gentle nature of a creature also known for it’s adorable cotton tail!

My passion is to create unique designs that are based off of the past but bring a modern twist to each item that you will love for years to come.

With your support, this campaign aims to bring Harmonia Lily’s first handbag line to life from idea to creation, establish better advertising, upgrade product displays, and rental spaces for markets/shows/pop-ups and more. 

Thank you for your contribution!

FREYA - Available in AU Naturel, Grape, Noir, Cotton Candy, and Periwinkle.

Color: Grape

Color: Periwinkle

Color: Au Naturel

Color: Cotton Candy (and Periwinkle)

Color: Noir 

 

Each bag is handwoven by a skilled artisan taking special care and attention to each and every detail.

• Materials: Final bag will be made out of wicker! That means the design will be varied just slightly from the photos in the campaign.  Be sure to read the updates section to stay up to date on design, packaging and more!
• Available in Natural, Purple, Black, Pink and Blue.
• 4x4 Door opening in the back to fit your cell phone, wallet and keys.

FOLLOW @HARMONIALILY ON SOCIAL MEDIA

ESTIMATED PRODUCTION TIMELINE

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

This is a new venture for me, and as such I am prepared to encounter obstacles along the way and challenges that I am sure will come with the process.  Some things that could prevent delays in fulfillment could be that the weavers can't weave fast enough, materials run out, or anything we are not prepared for.  I am working with professionals who have years of experience and knowledge that will resolve issues should they occur as I try my best to avoid any delays that arise.

If there are any unforeseen circumstances that delay the work, I will keep an open and honest communication with all my backers! 

Duty/VAT charges: NON US RESIDENTS, you will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges.

Short Summary

Petra &
column2:
Jules Embellished Wear was born in the Fall of 2006, by myself designer and founder Mary Leisz. By taking a plain and mundane jean jacket, and adding beautiful embellishments of fabrics, beading, leathers, and vintage jewelry pieces I was able to create a one-of-a-kind piece of Wearable Art.

With a background in clothing design, and 30 years of experience, executing beautiful garments, bridal gowns, and interior home accessories, it was a natural to bring all those elements to a blank canvas such a a denim jacket to create something exquisite. With the growth of interest in the jackets, I expanded my line in 2008 to include Embellished Accessories such as Handbags, Hats, Gloves, Scarves, Cuffs, Chokers and Belts to go with them. Embellished Pillows for the home were recently added in 2013. 

For the past 5 years I've sold locally to small boutiques, and through my website, but now It is now time for Petra &
column3:
Jules Embellished Wear to soar to new heights. Through my campaign and your donations I will be able to source several base products to embellish which will ultimately produce larger quantities of my unique brand. I will also be able to reach women Nationwide by Attending an Apparel/Accessory Trade Show, where I will meet and sell to buyers for stores all over the country. Now is the time!!


What We Need &
column4:
What You Get

I am seeking a goal of $15,000 to be used in the following way
column5:
1. Approx. $7,000 for Attending ONE Apparel/Accessory Trade Show (Feb. 2015) to launch, promote, and sell products to buyers NATIONWIDE.

2. Approx. $8,000 used for the Sourcing of Base Products to be embellished. Currently, with many of my products I seek out individual pieces to embellish, this takes a large majority of my time. Having base products made will enable more time for embellishing, as the products will be at my fingertips, ultimately producing larger quantities. Funds will also be used for fabrics, leathers, embellishments, labels, industrial sewing machine and other working supplies.

I am offering 8 levels of perks
column6:
1. At the $25 level EMBELLISHED LEATHER CUFF ( an example), they are all one of a kind and come in different widths and embellishments, choice of Chocolate Brown or Black Leather.

2. At the  $50 level EMBELLISHED TIED SCARF(an example), let us know your favorite colors!!

3. ""NEW PERK"" at the $60.00 dollar level I'm offering the newest piece in my line the FAUX LEATHER REVERSIBLE HOODED SHAWL(retail value on my website 98.00).


3. At the $100 dollar level I'm offering my  EMBELLISHED BLACK SUEDE AND LEATHER CLUTCH with Beading, a Vintage Adornment (adornment may be different than what's shown) over a snap.

4. At the $125 dollar level, I'm offering the newest piece in my line for fall the EMBELLISHED FAUX LEATHER DRAPED COAT in Black.  The upper back of the coat is fitted, the front panels are free flowing and draped with pockets. Coat is un-lined and embellished with Black Braid.

5. At the $145.00 dollar level, I'm offering a beautiful 22"" EMBELLISHED LEATHER/FABRIC PILLOW trimmed in stripe braid. Offered Chocolate Brown or Black Leather and fabric in the colors of your choice.

6. OR  at the $275.00 dollar level, I'm offering a SET of the EMBELLISHED LEATHER PILLOW(same pillow as above). Every couch looks better with a SET of pillows on it. Offering in Chocolate Brown or Black Leather, 


7. At the $400 dollar level, I'm offering a signature Petra &
column7:
Jules EMBELLISHED JEAN JACKET( an example)  done personally for you, in your size and choice of colors.

8. At the  EXTREMELY GENEROUS $1000 dollar level of giving I am offering  a TRUNKFUL of P&
column8:
J,  ONE OF EACH of the above gifts for your support and a HUGE THANK YOU !!!


The Impact

         With your GENEROUS DONATIONS I will be able to produce larger quantities of products, and most importantly, display and sell at a National Apparel Trade Show, giving hundreds of store owners NATIONWIDE the opportunity to view and order my products in quantity.

column1:
• With your GENEROUS DONATIONS I will enable women nationwide the opportunity and joy of owning an Embellished Piece of WEARABLE ART.
  • With your GENEROUS DONATIONS we can continue to produce our product in the USA.

    • Risks &
column2:
Challenges

We understand there will be challenges on our road ahead, but as in life we take them on one-day-at-a-time. I have been at this business for several years with many roadblocks along the way and yes, there have been days I've wanted to give up, however, I have a strong constitution, and in the words of WINSTON CHURCHILL, ""Never, Never, Never Quit"" which hangs in my studio, I never will until I have reached my goals. God gives each of us ""Spiritual Gifts"" I want to give my gift of Embellishing/Wearable Art to as many women as I can reach.

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand if you cannot donate, but if you could be a VOICE FOR MY CAUSE and SPREAD THE WORD to all your friends, family and cohorts, I would be forever grateful. Just one SHOUT or SHARE to another person, could make all the difference in my campaign.

It's so easy as Indiegogo provides all the Share tools!!

NOW IS THE TIME!!

THANK YOU, I'M FOREVER GRATEFUL,

Mary

www.petrajules.com

column1: With your GENEROUS DONATIONS I will enable women nationwide the opportunity and joy of owning an Embellished Piece of WEARABLE ART. With your GENEROUS DONATIONS we can continue to produce our product in the USA.   Risks & Challenges We understand there will be challenges on our road ahead, but as in life we take them on one-day-at-a-time. I have been at this business for several years with many roadblocks along the way and yes, there have been days I've wanted to give up, however, I have a strong constitution, and in the words of WINSTON CHURCHILL, ""Never, Never, Never Quit"" which hangs in my studio, I never will until I have reached my goals. God gives each of us ""Spiritual Gifts"" I want to give my gift of Embellishing/Wearable Art to as many women as I can reach.   Other Ways You Can Help I understand if you cannot donate, but if you could be a VOICE FOR MY CAUSE and SPREAD THE WORD to all your friends, family and cohorts, I would be forever grateful. Just one SHOUT or SHARE to another person, could make all the difference in my campaign.It's so easy as Indiegogo provides all the Share tools!!NOW IS THE TIME!!THANK YOU, I'M FOREVER GRATEFUL,Mary  www.petrajules.com",9.0,0,"1 Campaign

Who are we?

We are a snowboard and ski club based out of Lane Technical College Preparatory High School in Chicago, Illinois. Lane Tech is a school known for its diversity, rich history in sports, and outstanding academic record. Students at Lane are some of the hardest working and highest achieving students in the city of Chicago, the state of Illinois, and the United States. Our club is aiming to reward the work ethic of Lane students by making it possible for them to escape from school work and get involved in the amazing sports of snowboarding and skiing. The only thing standing in the way is fundraising, which is why we are reaching out to you.

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

Our goal is to raise $6000 which will go entirely to a budget set aside to subsidize the majority of the costs associated with the trips we plan to take as a club and to help our members gear up for the sports.

column1: In addition to the knowledge that you helped students get involved in two of the most fun sports that exist, we have many perks set up so that when certain amounts are donated, you will receive club apparel and stickers to show your support!

column3: >By donating to our club you are helping the students of Lane Tech get the opportunity to experience the sports of snowboarding and skiing as well as get involved in the community in ways not before possible!

column1: If we happen to exceed our goal, then every extra dollar will go to efforts to get more than the students at Lane involved in the winter sports community. We plan to reach out to the community around Lane and to other high schools in Chicago as well.

Other Ways You Can Help

    As high school students, we understand that money can be tight sometimes. If this is your case and you still want to help, then spread the word about our project! Every little bit of publicity helps immensely and is greatly appreciated.

Luca Cutter is designed for cutting glass bottles &

column2: >The wonderful design make it able to cut bottles &amp
column3: flat glass to any diameters and lengths. Apart from these amazing functions, Luca Cutter works excellent with the basic function of normal bottle cutters, cutting straight. Multi-function of Luca cutter gives all the possibility when you DIY your glass products and comes up with wide variety of final products.

column1: You can create your own vases, glasses, different kind of holders, ashtrays, lamps &amp
Luca Cutter is not only a cutter, Luca Cutter is possibility

Most bottle cutter in the market can only cut straight line, but Luca Cutter cut both CURVES and Straight. That's why you can make your glass products to any shape as you want.  The adjustable blade and four legs design make it fits for bottles with any diameters.
Luca Cutter is a Hand-held tool, it is easy to operate and carry around.  Ergonomic design makes the cutting process more efficient and easy.
The minimalist design of Luca Cutter makes it be a great decoration.
Luca Cutter is made of high quality plywood. All parts are made by laser cutting to ensure high consistence and accuracy.
Give new meanings to beautiful empty bottles by reusing &
With the use of Luca cutter and straight line kit set, you are able to make 4 kinds of glass products:
What do you think, what will you get

Luca cutter does not actually cut the bottle/flat glass. It makes a score line on the bottle/flat glass by the blade. With exerting heat on it, the thermal expansion will split the bottle exactly on the score line.
The blade of Luca Cutter comes with ball bearing which enables it to turn freely.  When the cutter leans, the blade turns to the same direction of leaning.

column5: >Besides, four legs design of the Luca Cutter confines the position of blade and bottle/flat glass. It prevents the blade from slipping and keeps steady leaning.

column2: >Combining four legs structure and blade with ball bearing ensures cutting the bottle/flat glass in all directions smoothly, steadily and efficiently.  That's why curves can be easily cut by Luca Cutter.

column1: 4 steps to make your glass product

Use marker to sketch the shape you would like to cut. Place the cutter on the bottle/flat glass with 4 legs, adjust the blade until it contacts with the bottle/flat glass and lift the cutter a bit above the bottle/flat glass, the purpose is for leaning of the cutter.
Gear up your cutter with straight line kit set and place it on the bottle. Adjust the position of cutter and blade to the place where you want to split the bottle.
As most bottles are not perfect circle, its better to make a trial rotating of bottle with the cutter and make sure the blade keep contacting with bottle during rotates.
With leaning the cutter and rotating the bottle forwards and backwards, make the score line as the sharp you have sketched
Make a full circle score line by slowly rolling the bottle.

column5: >You should hear the scratching sound by the cutter. The score line should be slightly seen and continuous.

column1: Pour boiling water on the score line, then pour cold water over the score line from the faucet.  Keep repeating to pour the hot and cold water until the bottle splits.  The heating and cooling will crack the bottle along the score line.
Only pours the water along the score line, sticky tack included in set will help to make a clear split especially on curve cut.
Use your hand or running pliers to split the flat glass/mirror along the score line.

4.  Finishing

Sharp edge would be left on both halves after splitting the bottle. The edge can be smoothed and finished by sandpaper. There are three grit size sandpaper included in the kit set. Use 80 grit sandpaper to remove the sharp edge. Use 120 or 180 grit for smoother result. If you want to make even smoother edge, you need to buy higher grit sandpaper with glass polishing compounds in your local store.

column3: >How far your imagination can reach, how wonderful your product can be

column1: Luca Bottle Cutter is our first production. Empty bottles are nice materials to be reused for different purposes. Thousands of great DIY projects are made by empty bottles. That’s why Luca Bottle Cutter here.
International shipping is included in the perk.

Mass production will be started ASAP once the fund is raised.
First batch of Luca Cutter will be shipped on early December and it will be one of your wonderful Christmas present. Remember, first contribute, first ship! Contribute now and get your cutter ASAP.
Production, assembly and delivery will keep on throughout whole December and January 2015.
As new to market, there are certain risks to bring Luca Cutter to market. We consider our risk to be minimal and put the following measures to ensure you have amazing experience with Luca Cutter.
Body part of Luca Cutter will be laser cut in professional workshops and then assembled with different other parts.

column2: >All parts of Luca Cutter were well sourced. In order to minimize the possibility of any delays, there are back-up suppliers and manufacturers for all parts.

With the use of Luca cutter and straight line kit set, you are able to make 4 kinds of glass products:
What do you think, what will you get

Luca cutter does not actually cut the bottle/flat glass. It makes a score line on the bottle/flat glass by the blade. With exerting heat on it, the thermal expansion will split the bottle exactly on the score line.
The blade of Luca Cutter comes with ball bearing which enables it to turn freely.  When the cutter leans, the blade turns to the same direction of leaning.
Besides, four legs design of the Luca Cutter confines the position of blade and bottle/flat glass. It prevents the blade from slipping and keeps steady leaning.

Combining four legs structure and blade with ball bearing ensures cutting the bottle/flat glass in all directions smoothly, steadily and efficiently.  That's why curves can be easily cut by Luca Cutter.
4 steps to make your glass product

Use marker to sketch the shape you would like to cut. Place the cutter on the bottle/flat glass with 4 legs, adjust the blade until it contacts with the bottle/flat glass and lift the cutter a bit above the bottle/flat glass, the purpose is for leaning of the cutter.
Gear up your cutter with straight line kit set and place it on the bottle. Adjust the position of cutter and blade to the place where you want to split the bottle.
As most bottles are not perfect circle, its better to make a trial rotating of bottle with the cutter and make sure the blade keep contacting with bottle during rotates.
With leaning the cutter and rotating the bottle forwards and backwards, make the score line as the sharp you have sketched
Make a full circle score line by slowly rolling the bottle.
You should hear the scratching sound by the cutter. The score line should be slightly seen and continuous.

Pour boiling water on the score line, then pour cold water over the score line from the faucet.  Keep repeating to pour the hot and cold water until the bottle splits.  The heating and cooling will crack the bottle along the score line.
Only pours the water along the score line, sticky tack included in set will help to make a clear split especially on curve cut.
Use your hand or running pliers to split the flat glass/mirror along the score line.

4.  FinishingSharp edge would be left on both halves after splitting the bottle. The edge can be smoothed and finished by sandpaper. There are three grit size sandpaper included in the kit set. Use 80 grit sandpaper to remove the sharp edge. Use 120 or 180 grit for smoother result. If you want to make even smoother edge, you need to buy higher grit sandpaper with glass polishing compounds in your local store.

I'm going to deliver all Perks even if I'll not achieve the target of 6000 $.
When you select perks containing tshirts don't forget to write your size!

I'm Lorenzo and I'm a young italian entrepreneur. I'm 28 years old and, as many people do, I've got a lot of passions. I like sports, history, literature, technology, cinema, music and fashion. At the begginning of 2013 I quit my job as engineer to start a new business on my own, even if now It's a very big challenge!
Maybe you're wondering what this crazy guy had in his mind when he created this t-shirt collection, so let me explain why I do not need any psichologist's help!

The graphic technique was the first thing to be involved, because you hardly see embroidered t-shirts in the t-shirt world. On the other hand you can easily find any kind of screen/digital printed graphics in every clothing shop: all of this pushed me to make embroidered t-shirts. The embroidery technique is very particular, because It doesn't allow filling the graphics, you can only use the edge to define your figures otherwise your t-shirts would be heavier than an armor.

Once I had created graphics using only the drawing borders, I had to find the proper drawing style. I searched a lot and obviously the most part of the research was on the Web. It was saturday night, when I suddenly found the picture below: maybe the destiny mocked at me

Those chicks were having a lot of fun wern't they? Anyway, that picture was such a flash, because in the Middle Age the drawing style had two particular features: drawings were not complex and the postures were totally insane! At that time painters didn't use perspective in their paintings, and the result were static positions even for moving subjects.

The style was finally defined, but I didn't decide what to draw yet. I needed to find something significant to my style and original at the same time, maybe something similar to Steam Punk! Steam Punk uses complex steel and wooden machines powered by steam, bringing contemporary elements to the 19th century.
Ok, It can work, and the final step was to characterize the scene: I chose a sport theme.
The result was my first t-shirt, ""Solcatore di Flutti"".
1) The number 1285 refers to the year of the imaginary background and to my birth date.
2) I'm italian, so I wanted to racall my country, naming all t-shirts in italian language.
3) The figure is composed only by borders, some shades and there is no perspective.
4) I spent one surfing week last year in Spain you had to try It once in your life! I tried to draw a surf table by imagining it built in the Middle Age.

My campaign is for the initial funding, providing the financial resources to start up a business in Italy. Unfortunately It's not cheap to start a business here and that's why I need your help. Money will also help me to buy the very first batch of t-shirts for the online store.
The contributors of this campaign have the possibility to create something new and cool, an apparel that links past to present, both in the technique and in the graphic design.
The funding I'm asking for is 6000$, that is the minimum I need to start the business. Of course the more I get the more resources I'll have to start in a easier way. Money earned are divided in:
- 50% to buy the first batch of t-shirts

My perks are related to my activity, you'll find both gadgets and t-shirts. Part of your contribution is for charity. Your help is very important to me: I maybe be able to realize my dream and help other people at the same time. The business is related to people and I want to focus on this value the very beginning.
Well, I'm an optimistic guy. If I'm not able to gain the whole finding goal, I'll try to apply for a bank loan for the rest of the sum I need.
If you like what you see you can contribute even with suggestions, advices or sharing this campaign with your friends. So if you do not have money just help me spread the voice,
I'm going to deliver all Perks even if I'll not achieve the target of 6000 $.
When you select perks containing tshirts don't forget to write your size!
