column1: Please Welcome check my Facebook page: ML / Clothing
“Magic” T-shirt is a comfortable shirt from ML / Clothing. This is made of 52% combed and ring-spun cotton and 48% polyester
column2: guaranteed not shrinking after every wash. It comes in one color only which is dark grey with bright eye-catchy green text.  The materials used are high quality and 100% made in USA.

column1: It is a short sleeved shirt with deep V-neckline perfect for any casual date or gathering. The text design and the whole shirt looks classy and very stylish at the same time. Guaranteed unique and attention catching since the print is not common and not over-used by other shirt companies and designers.

This hot shirt is perfect for any type of personality and suitable for all ages. Since the fabric used is soft, stretchable and breathable, even sporty women or those ladies who are always on the go can pull this off.

The cut is not too feminine that is why it is flexible enough to be paired or matched with any bottom such as jeans, short pants, skater skirts, leggings, etc. The extraordinary, youthful and lively designs of ML / clothing make the t-shirts stand those who are wearing out it stand out and look magnificent.

“Magic” t-shirt can transform your boring look into something captivating. You do not have to be over-dressed or no need to wear accessories when wearing this shirt because the design is enough to make a statement and leave a cool impression.

This style is available in all sizes although the fabric is quite stretchable and follows the body shape. Magic t-shirt has the most unique design that you won’t find anywhere!! It perfectly fits the body but does not make you feel uncomfortable or uneasy. You can wear this shirt during anytime of the day, anywhere and with anybody.

Ladies’ flowy draped sleeve t-shirt is the best outfit you could wear to a night out clubbing, bar hopping, parties or even to a weekend bonding with friends and family. The product is made of 65% polyester and 35% viscose. The fabric used is absolutely soft designed to drape perfectly and accentuate body curves.

Aside from the soft textile, this shirt is comfortable to wear and lets you move freely since it is loose, side-seamed and made with open dolman sleeves. This draped sleeve t-shirt from ML / clothing is 100% made in USA and the materials used are luxurious and high standard.
The design or print of this shirt is quite simple but looks very sophisticated and feminine. The only shirt that feels cozy while looking prim and proper.

This draped sleeve shirt is also perfect for both daytime and night time occasions and can be paired best with either long or short pants. This one is also suited for leggings since the length is quite enough to cover the hip and bottom area. This shirt is not just an ordinary clothing because you can transform your plain fashion sense to a modish get up by simply pulling it off.

If you want to wear something hot and flirty without revealing too much skin, this ladies’ flowy draped sleeve is what you need. Who says you have to be daring and seductive to be attractive?  In this outfit, you can simply prove the world what “Simplicity is beauty” all about, because you can look fabulous and sassy in this unique, stylish and decent top made for every woman who loves fashion and comfort.

“Stay Calm and Keep Drinking” statement shirt from ML / Clothing is one of the most purchased shirts online. The product is made of 52% combed and ring-spun cotton making it more comfortable and breathable to wear and 48% polyester. The fabric used is quite stretchable, it comes in three different sizes which are small, medium and large.

This one is perfect for any body type since it hugs the figure very well. The only available color of this product at the moment is dark grey with white and red text design. This short sleeved and deep v- neck t-shirt is perfect for any type of personality and can be worn with jeans, shorts or skirt.

The statement “stay calm and keep drinking” is too unique and very eye-catching making this product one of the best sellers. It is more suitable for adult and mature women but still appropriate for any casual event, either daytime or night time.

If you are tired of wearing plain and boring shirts or clothes with usual designs, then you have to check out the famous statement shirts from ML/ clothing just like this one. All the products are guaranteed comfortable to wear, soft and gentle on sensitive skin, true to size and does not shrink or change size or even color after washing. Since it is made in USA, expect that all materials used in producing these shirts are not cheap and proven to be durable.

Say goodbye to your dull wardrobe and try the “stay calm and keep drinking” t-shirt for a more fun and exciting experience. Create an enticing fashion statement anywhere you go and keep heads turning as they adore your one of a kind hot and attractive shirt from ML / Clothing. Be a trendsetter and make everyone fall in love with your cute and unique outfit.

So you are not the t-shirt type of person but you want to wear something cool and uncommon? Why not try this most talked about “Stay Strong, Have Faith. Be Smart” tank top from ML / clothing. This style is something you can wear to any event, any time and with any other outfit without feeling over-dressed or unfashionable.

The design is enough to catch attention and attract other fashionistas to wear the same tank top to parties, night outs, casual dates and meetings or even when doing simple daily activities. This style can make you look sexier and more feminine and at the same time can rock and be stunning.
The fabric is guaranteed 100% combed and ring-spun cotton
column2: perfectly follow curves and forms since it is ultra-stretchable. The product and the materials used are made in USA and proudly passed the quality control check for more comfortable clothing.

column1: The statement written on the tank top which says “Stay Strong, Keep Faith. Be Smart” is truly inspiring and motivating. This top is recommended and suitable for any age bracket since the cut, color and print is quite friendly and wholesome enough to be appreciated by many people.

The “Stay Strong, Keep Faith. Be Smart” tank tops are guaranteed made of the finest materials and will not shrink after some time. This is one of the most favorite products in ML / clothing. Share positive vibes to the people around you as you wear this brilliant and inspirational statement tank that you can never find from other stores.

","Hello There! Are you ready?? Let's do it!
My name is Iryna and I moved to America 7 years ago  with NO money in my wallet ,and only NOW  am I finally ready to follow my dream... dream of my life!
To be honest, I am tired of visiting clothing stores and wasting my money on  clothes that don't even look good on me. No more!
I started from scratch designing girls t-shirts and top tanksand work very hard to make my brand look professional. Check my Facebook page ML / Clothing, What do you think? It looks very nice, right?

I learned to work with Photoshop, marketing, promotions, and even getting great pictures of the girls. My brand looks professional and people don't believe that I am the only one who did it. Many people still laugh at me and don't believe in me. It hurts!! But, I won't give up! Not yet
Please Support Me! Help me grow my dream!   Everything I have is invested in it, but I still need a little push.
My short-term goal is $650 in sales

But my biggest dream is let the world know about my clothing line. We all start with nothing, and many of us work day and night for our passion. This is my passion  and I need YOUR help! Only 10 minutes of your time and donation of $10 can make a difference in my life. All the donated money I will  invest into my brand. Print more shirts with new design.
My long-term goal is get known as a brand and second donate $1 from every t-shirt sale to support cancer patients and their treatments.
(my mother has  breast cancer and I know how hard it can be, so as a result, I want to help people like my mom and their families)

Feel free to support my dream any amount of $$$ will help me grow my brand I would deeply appreciate your help!! However, if you cannot do that right now PLEASE visit my Facebook page ML / Clothing instead and GIVE me a LIKE! That simple action will make my day and support me in my dreams!

column2: This campaign on YOUR Facebook",6.0,0,"1 Campaign
>Don't forget to click the image above to check out a funny commercial we shot specifically for the project!
>Don't run to the nearest shoe store - not just yet. Ariana is not an existing product at the moment, but the good news is it's not sci-fi anymore. It actually combines

column1: already existing technologies in a very unique way. Well, we added our
own little inventions to the formula, of course, but nothing you can see
here is out of our reach today.
column2: >We hope it won't take much to recognize the potential in Ariana, and to get the urge of being part of this awfully big adventure. Cause trust me, it's going to be - that is if you're willing to support and help us make it happen.
>Too much talk, I know. To the point then.
column4: >Actually it’s exactly what you just saw in our little commercial. An ordinary pair of shoes – at least that’s what it looks like. In reality it has the ability to change the colour of the shoe’s surface, but not just that. If you had a pair of Arianas (and we strongly hope you will have in the foreseeable future) you could put any kind of decoration on them as if they were a blank piece of paper. The only limitation is the number of colours. You can use three of them on one pair of shoes: black, white plus one of your choice.

column2: >So when you walk into a store to buy a pair of Arianas, you have to decide, what the third colour should be? Let’s say your favorite colour is red - in this case you probably want to buy a pair of red Arianas. That means the three colours your new shoes will be able to handle are black, white, and RED. If you’d like to take home a blue Ariana however, the colours that version will have are white, black and BLUE. Simple enough. There will be, of course, green Arianas, brown, orange, gold, you name it.

>As you can see, the white and the black colours are always there, every member of the Ariana family will have them. These two would be enough themselves to put any kind of patterns on your shoes, but with the third colour the possibilities literally become limitless. It's up to your imagination.
>I hope it’s not too difficult to follow me, but just to be sure, we set up a little animation to show you what I’m talking about.

>We took a red Ariana for this example and started with the basics. We can set our shoes to be completely white, or black or red. Then it’s time to spice things up a little. Let’s put some decoration on our shoes. (We've picked a nice floral pattern, but it could be anything else.)
column3: >This is where the real fun begins: We can put our black pattern on a white background. Then let's switch the colour of our pattern to red. Now it's time to change the background colour. Let it be black. In that case we can colour the pattern white and red. And if we go with red as the background, the decoration can be white and black. Sounds too complicated? Just take a look at the video and everything will be clear as day, I’m sure.

column2: >We kept it pretty simple for educational purposes, but of course there is no limitation in using the three colours our shoes have. Another example: a simple (all-time classic) zebra pattern. Black and white, looks like this, cool.
column4: >We can do this inverted anytime (white on black), but it wouldn't look much different, so we just skip that. Now let's put our third colour to work. Red on white. Nice.

column2: >Wow, flames. But that's still not all, it's time to go wild with mixing our colours. Of course we can do it as freely as we want. See?
column4: >It's the same pattern and we still didn't cover all the variations, not nearly. The real beauty of it is that we only used our three colours all the way. I could go on practically forever, but you got the point by now, I'm sure.

column2: >Now what’s the real kicker here? We’re still talking about the SAME PAIR OF SHOES, since ONE red Ariana can do all this for you! It can look like any of the examples above and many, many other ways. One pair of shoes. Just think about it.

>And how can you make your shoes change their appearance? It's pretty easy. Via an application on your smartphone, wirelessly. Just like in our little commercial. Every pair of Arianas will be shipped with a software, specifically linked to those pair of shoes. This way you can be sure that the look of your shoes can not be controlled using some other phone than your own.

>Upon installing the software on your phone the application is going to allow you to compile any new look (or skin if you prefer to call it that way) for your shoes in a very user friendly way. You can visually set everything up before “arming” and then you can send the new look with one touch of your finger onto the shoes. They will change their appearance in an instant. Just like that.

>Now the communication between the shoes and the phone requires some built in electronics, but the look and feel of the changeable surface will be perfectly natural, without any glow or illumination - just like any pair of ordinary shoes. Only the Ariana logo will give it away, but we’re going to place that somewhere more discreet.

>The energy consumption of the whole system is going to be very low, so we don’t plan to use a battery that needs frequent changing. Our battery is going to recharge itself using the kinetic energy generated by yourself as you walk around in the shoes.

>For the development of a fully functional protoype and for the pre-manufacturing process we need more funds than we can come up with on our own. Our goal is to give you something that makes wearing shoes a truly creative and fun experience. Project Ariana, above all, is about to make your shoes more... you. By giving you the freedom to change the look of your shoes at will, this technology will take personalization to a whole new level. You can put anything on your shoes from your astrological sign to your favorite tattoos or even emoticons reflecting your current mood.
column3: >You can have a totally new look every day, or every hour or every five minutes if that's what you want. Like putting on new shoes anytime you feel like it without taking them off and you don't even have to rely on designers' ideas. You can design your own dream shoes. Isn't it the coolest?

column2: >You can create any shapes or patterns to your liking. From the most basic elements like dots or stripes to really complex drawings and artworks, even text in different fonts. Think of the surface of the shoes as an empty canvas. We give you three colours, the rest is up to you. Knock yourself out, design, draw, paint anything you like combining these colours freely, and wear it as long as you feel comfortable. Of course, you can save these looks to use them later again. And again. Anytime.

>Not so much of an artist yourself? No problem! We're going to set up a website with tons of readymade designs. You only have to choose the one you like the most, download it and apply it on your shoes. Good, but not perfect? It would only need a little customization? Sure, why not? No one's going to stop you, you can do it yourself. And if you are the creative type you can upload your own drawings and designs to the website and share them with others. Who knows when you will meet them walking on the street?
column4: >The control software on your phone is not going to be the only tool you can use to create your designs. For the more complex drawings or artworks there will be the usual image editors on your desktop computer, laptop or tablet. You can use Photoshop, Gimp, Artweaver or any other software and save the end result in universal formats like .JPG or .PNG. Of course you're going to have to make sure you don’t use more colours than your Ariana can handle. (You don’t have to worry about using that exact red or blue or any other third colour your Ariana have, we’re going to convert everything to the right shade of the third colour that is not black or white in the picture.)

column2: >When your image is ready, you only have to download the free converter software from our website. It’s going to convert your image to the right format, so you can send it on your phone right away. That’s it, the new image is in your design library now, you can apply it on your shoes anytime you want.

>Now the images and videos show only high heels, but of course Ariana could come in numerous different shapes and sizes. Practically any type of shoes can be made using this technology, the only requirement is the relatively rigid upper portion. This means that shoes primarily designed for sports or other form of intensive physical exercise are not going to be in our focus for now, but the look is not the highest priority for those anyway.

>The other reason we used women’s shoes in our examples is that we have a feeling Ariana will be a wee bit more popular among the ladies, but of course we could well be gravely mistaken. So gentlemen are definitely not excluded. Or think about the kids! It's enough to buy a pair of Ariana to make them happy - and very busy - for the rest of the shoes' life span. Inspiring and developing their creativity and imagination is guaranteed.
>Now that the concept is hopefully clear, let's see the faces behind the project:
column4: >Peter Moharos: The engineering genius. Deals with stuff most of us can't really understand. Like inventing the technology (mechanics, electronics, programming etc.) which makes Ariana work. He is the kind of guy who designs microelectronics, builds robots, drones and laser emitters at home just to amuse himself. So he is the brain behind the project, the real heavy lifter. Someone, who actually finds ultimate pleasure in what he's doing (especially since he's simply thrown the word impossible out of his dictionary God knows how long time ago). Programmer mathematician in the real world, with an ability to oversee and control very complicated work streams.
column5: >Tamas Harmatos (moi), leader of the art department, project manager, designer, also the order maintaining force keeping the genius mind on the right track (Not an easy task, as you can imagine. On the second thought, there is no way you can :-). Freelance screenwriter and director.

column2: >Andras Fajta: Andras is the main voice of reason, he is coordinating the whole team, keeping our heads and finances straight. Big guy with a big heart, and an unquenchable thirst for knowledge. He started his career as a mechanical engineer which puts him in a very delicate position whenever Peter needs a capable assistant in the lab.
column4: >We are operating as a team for a few years now, most of our work however is done outside the public's eye since they typically involve developing new technologies as a part of our clients' projects. Without being contract-breakingly specific, we have so far built or took part in building of encryption hardware for internal corporate communications, networked parking meter systems (hardware and software), optical sensors for military drones, secure (bugging-proof) office spaces, control software for industrial robots (car manufacturing), new data transfer technologies in computer networks and the list goes on.

column2: >Ariana however will be completely ours, from idea to production. Of course we are only the head of the project, we're going to need lots of experts and talents on the way to the completion of the first Ariana prototype. Cause make no mistake about it, this is going to be huge. As a phenomenon and as a working process. And it's going to cost a lot as you can see.
>Oh and one more thing: patience is a must for all our backers, since the whole development process will take roughly a year. (Maybe not that long, but we like to be on the safe side.)

column3: >I think we’ve covered just about everything. Our goal should be clear, now we only need your help to reach it. Making Ariana come true will not be an easy task as you could imagine. Something tells us though, it's worth all the efforts. It's gonna be a hell of a ride, that much we can promise. Care to hop on board?

","Don't forget to click the image above to check out a funny commercial we shot specifically for the project!

column1: Don't run to the nearest shoe store - not just yet. Ariana is not an existing product at the moment, but the good news is it's not sci-fi anymore. It actually combines
already existing technologies in a very unique way. Well, we added our
own little inventions to the formula, of course, but nothing you can see

here is out of our reach today.We hope it won't take much to recognize the potential in Ariana, and to get the urge of being part of this awfully big adventure. Cause trust me, it's going to be - that is if you're willing to support and help us make it happen.

Too much talk, I know. To the point then.What is Ariana?Actually it’s exactly what you just saw in our little commercial. An ordinary pair of shoes – at least that’s what it looks like. In reality it has the ability to change the colour of the shoe’s surface, but not just that. If you had a pair of Arianas (and we strongly hope you will have in the foreseeable future) you could put any kind of decoration on them as if they were a blank piece of paper. The only limitation is the number of colours. You can use three of them on one pair of shoes: black, white plus one of your choice.

So when you walk into a store to buy a pair of Arianas, you have to decide, what the third colour should be? Let’s say your favorite colour is red - in this case you probably want to buy a pair of red Arianas. That means the three colours your new shoes will be able to handle are black, white, and RED. If you’d like to take home a blue Ariana however, the colours that version will have are white, black and BLUE. Simple enough. There will be, of course, green Arianas, brown, orange, gold, you name it.

As you can see, the white and the black colours are always there, every member of the Ariana family will have them. These two would be enough themselves to put any kind of patterns on your shoes, but with the third colour the possibilities literally become limitless. It's up to your imagination.
I hope it’s not too difficult to follow me, but just to be sure, we set up a little animation to show you what I’m talking about.Diving into details

We took a red Ariana for this example and started with the basics. We can set our shoes to be completely white, or black or red. Then it’s time to spice things up a little. Let’s put some decoration on our shoes. (We've picked a nice floral pattern, but it could be anything else.)This is where the real fun begins: We can put our black pattern on a white background. Then let's switch the colour of our pattern to red. Now it's time to change the background colour. Let it be black. In that case we can colour the pattern white and red. And if we go with red as the background, the decoration can be white and black. Sounds too complicated? Just take a look at the video and everything will be clear as day, I’m sure.

We kept it pretty simple for educational purposes, but of course there is no limitation in using the three colours our shoes have. Another example: a simple (all-time classic) zebra pattern. Black and white, looks like this, cool.We can do this inverted anytime (white on black), but it wouldn't look much different, so we just skip that. Now let's put our third colour to work. Red on white. Nice.
Okay, what's next? Black on red.

Wow, flames. But that's still not all, it's time to go wild with mixing our colours. Of course we can do it as freely as we want. See?It's the same pattern and we still didn't cover all the variations, not nearly. The real beauty of it is that we only used our three colours all the way. I could go on practically forever, but you got the point by now, I'm sure.

Now what’s the real kicker here? We’re still talking about the SAME PAIR OF SHOES, since ONE red Ariana can do all this for you! It can look like any of the examples above and many, many other ways. One pair of shoes. Just think about it.This is how you do it

And how can you make your shoes change their appearance? It's pretty easy. Via an application on your smartphone, wirelessly. Just like in our little commercial. Every pair of Arianas will be shipped with a software, specifically linked to those pair of shoes. This way you can be sure that the look of your shoes can not be controlled using some other phone than your own.

Upon installing the software on your phone the application is going to allow you to compile any new look (or skin if you prefer to call it that way) for your shoes in a very user friendly way. You can visually set everything up before “arming” and then you can send the new look with one touch of your finger onto the shoes. They will change their appearance in an instant. Just like that.

Now the communication between the shoes and the phone requires some built in electronics, but the look and feel of the changeable surface will be perfectly natural, without any glow or illumination - just like any pair of ordinary shoes. Only the Ariana logo will give it away, but we’re going to place that somewhere more discreet.

The energy consumption of the whole system is going to be very low, so we don’t plan to use a battery that needs frequent changing. Our battery is going to recharge itself using the kinetic energy generated by yourself as you walk around in the shoes.

For the development of a fully functional protoype and for the pre-manufacturing process we need more funds than we can come up with on our own. Our goal is to give you something that makes wearing shoes a truly creative and fun experience. Project Ariana, above all, is about to make your shoes more... you. By giving you the freedom to change the look of your shoes at will, this technology will take personalization to a whole new level. You can put anything on your shoes from your astrological sign to your favorite tattoos or even emoticons reflecting your current mood.You can have a totally new look every day, or every hour or every five minutes if that's what you want. Like putting on new shoes anytime you feel like it without taking them off and you don't even have to rely on designers' ideas. You can design your own dream shoes. Isn't it the coolest?What to wear today?

You can create any shapes or patterns to your liking. From the most basic elements like dots or stripes to really complex drawings and artworks, even text in different fonts. Think of the surface of the shoes as an empty canvas. We give you three colours, the rest is up to you. Knock yourself out, design, draw, paint anything you like combining these colours freely, and wear it as long as you feel comfortable. Of course, you can save these looks to use them later again. And again. Anytime.

Not so much of an artist yourself? No problem! We're going to set up a website with tons of readymade designs. You only have to choose the one you like the most, download it and apply it on your shoes. Good, but not perfect? It would only need a little customization? Sure, why not? No one's going to stop you, you can do it yourself. And if you are the creative type you can upload your own drawings and designs to the website and share them with others. Who knows when you will meet them walking on the street?The control software on your phone is not going to be the only tool you can use to create your designs. For the more complex drawings or artworks there will be the usual image editors on your desktop computer, laptop or tablet. You can use Photoshop, Gimp, Artweaver or any other software and save the end result in universal formats like .JPG or .PNG. Of course you're going to have to make sure you don’t use more colours than your Ariana can handle. (You don’t have to worry about using that exact red or blue or any other third colour your Ariana have, we’re going to convert everything to the right shade of the third colour that is not black or white in the picture.)

When your image is ready, you only have to download the free converter software from our website. It’s going to convert your image to the right format, so you can send it on your phone right away. That’s it, the new image is in your design library now, you can apply it on your shoes anytime you want.NOT for women only!

Now the images and videos show only high heels, but of course Ariana could come in numerous different shapes and sizes. Practically any type of shoes can be made using this technology, the only requirement is the relatively rigid upper portion. This means that shoes primarily designed for sports or other form of intensive physical exercise are not going to be in our focus for now, but the look is not the highest priority for those anyway.

The other reason we used women’s shoes in our examples is that we have a feeling Ariana will be a wee bit more popular among the ladies, but of course we could well be gravely mistaken. So gentlemen are definitely not excluded. Or think about the kids! It's enough to buy a pair of Ariana to make them happy - and very busy - for the rest of the shoes' life span. Inspiring and developing their creativity and imagination is guaranteed.The team

Now that the concept is hopefully clear, let's see the faces behind the project:Peter Moharos: The engineering genius. Deals with stuff most of us can't really understand. Like inventing the technology (mechanics, electronics, programming etc.) which makes Ariana work. He is the kind of guy who designs microelectronics, builds robots, drones and laser emitters at home just to amuse himself. So he is the brain behind the project, the real heavy lifter. Someone, who actually finds ultimate pleasure in what he's doing (especially since he's simply thrown the word impossible out of his dictionary God knows how long time ago). Programmer mathematician in the real world, with an ability to oversee and control very complicated work streams.Tamas Harmatos (moi), leader of the art department, project manager, designer, also the order maintaining force keeping the genius mind on the right track (Not an easy task, as you can imagine. On the second thought, there is no way you can :-). Freelance screenwriter and director.

Andras Fajta: Andras is the main voice of reason, he is coordinating the whole team, keeping our heads and finances straight. Big guy with a big heart, and an unquenchable thirst for knowledge. He started his career as a mechanical engineer which puts him in a very delicate position whenever Peter needs a capable assistant in the lab.We are operating as a team for a few years now, most of our work however is done outside the public's eye since they typically involve developing new technologies as a part of our clients' projects. Without being contract-breakingly specific, we have so far built or took part in building of encryption hardware for internal corporate communications, networked parking meter systems (hardware and software), optical sensors for military drones, secure (bugging-proof) office spaces, control software for industrial robots (car manufacturing), new data transfer technologies in computer networks and the list goes on.

Ariana however will be completely ours, from idea to production. Of course we are only the head of the project, we're going to need lots of experts and talents on the way to the completion of the first Ariana prototype. Cause make no mistake about it, this is going to be huge. As a phenomenon and as a working process. And it's going to cost a lot as you can see.
Oh and one more thing: patience is a must for all our backers, since the whole development process will take roughly a year. (Maybe not that long, but we like to be on the safe side.)

And that's it!I think we’ve covered just about everything. Our goal should be clear, now we only need your help to reach it. Making Ariana come true will not be an easy task as you could imagine. Something tells us though, it's worth all the efforts. It's gonna be a hell of a ride, that much we can promise. Care to hop on board?",11.0,1,"1 Campaign
Empreintes des pilotes in the press :
The ""Empreintes des pilotes"" mounted in the middle of downtown Le Mans memorialized in bronze the winners of ""24 heures du Mans"".

At the end of the race, the winners made their handprints on the plasterboard. One plate is then cast in the ground, and et the following year, juste before the race, we celebrate winners on the occasion of the inauguration of the newest plate.
Les ""Empreintes des pilotes"" disposées en plein centre ville du Mans immortalisent dans le bronze et sur le sol les vainqueurs des ""24 heures du Mans"".

A la fin de chaque course, les vainqueurs posent leurs empreintes dans le plâtre. Une plaque est ensuite coulée dans le sol des rues du quartier, et l'année suivante, l'inauguration de cette nouvelle plaque a lieu la veille de la course.

Unum Figura is a unique, custom furniture line that incorporates Luxe style with

contemporary and vintage aesthetic.
This amazing line is the newborn child of high
end upholsterer, David Marvill of Las Vegas, NV and master metal
fabricator/artist, Paul Swek of Phoenix, AZ
Combining their talents and unique aesthetic has
culminated into extremely unique designs that combine the contemporary feel of
ground metal with the vintage appeal of old world crafted upholstery.
We have started to produce our first piece and Unum Figura is already generating a
huge buzz! There are 2 Las Vegas magazines that are interested in doing
articles about this venture and the very unique pieces that we will be
offering. Alas, the cost of the materials to produce the first few pieces comes
at quite a high cost. We only use the best materials so that we can offer the
utmost of quality. Add to that, the cost of marketing, website construction,
transportation of unfinished product for upholstery between Phoenix and Las
All of the pieces that we will be making will be hand
crafted by both Paul and David. These pieces will not be manufactured in a
factory. We have each worked very hard, over the years, to develop our crafts to
the highest level and believe that old world craftsmanship should be a primary
focus. Our dream is to create amazing and unique furniture pieces. We have both
worked relentlessly, for many years, to come to this point and we are energized
by the positive feedback that we are already getting.
There will be a time when you’re visiting a casino,
restaurant or club in Las Vegas and you will recognize one (or more) of our
furniture pieces. You will proudly tell your companions that you helped fund
When you contribute to helping us succeed with our dream,
you will be a part of the reason why this line became so successful! We have
all been taught that the American dream of “if we work very hard and do what we
are passionate about, the success will follow.” We believe that time, is now!
Help us to make it over this last financial hurdle to keep the momentum going
and to ultimately allow us to have great success!!
For your generous contribution, you will be given a hand
crafted gift made by Paul, David or a collaborative piece by both of us. These
gifts will speak of the high quality that the furniture will embody. Please see
the perks section of this page to see what you will get!
If you are unable to donate at this time, please help us by
spreading the word about this project! You can use the Indiegogo share tools to
make it even easier to tell your friends about us. Tell your co-workers,
designers you may know, architects….heck, anyone you can think of!!
Again, we are so VERY EXCITED about this venture and can’t

wait to unveil it to the world! Work hard, dream BIG and make it happen!


","Unum Figura is a unique, custom furniture line that incorporates Luxe style with
contemporary and vintage aesthetic.This amazing line is the newborn child of high
end upholsterer, David Marvill of Las Vegas, NV and master metal
fabricator/artist, Paul Swek of Phoenix, AZ
Combining their talents and unique aesthetic has
culminated into extremely unique designs that combine the contemporary feel of
ground metal with the vintage appeal of old world crafted upholstery.
We have started to produce our first piece and Unum Figura is already generating a
huge buzz! There are 2 Las Vegas magazines that are interested in doing
articles about this venture and the very unique pieces that we will be
offering. Alas, the cost of the materials to produce the first few pieces comes
at quite a high cost. We only use the best materials so that we can offer the
utmost of quality. Add to that, the cost of marketing, website construction,
transportation of unfinished product for upholstery between Phoenix and Las
All of the pieces that we will be making will be hand
crafted by both Paul and David. These pieces will not be manufactured in a
factory. We have each worked very hard, over the years, to develop our crafts to
the highest level and believe that old world craftsmanship should be a primary
focus. Our dream is to create amazing and unique furniture pieces. We have both
worked relentlessly, for many years, to come to this point and we are energized
by the positive feedback that we are already getting.
There will be a time when you’re visiting a casino,
restaurant or club in Las Vegas and you will recognize one (or more) of our

I've been working with leather for about eight years now and want to up my production capability with a leather sewing machine.  Working with and being creative with leather is a great passion of mine.

In the beginning I started out with leather bracelets and bracers as an experimentation and for myself and friends. The items became great gifts that I could give that were personal and uniquely created for a specific person. I started to get more into custom cigar cases over the past year and a half.

These cases have been my hottest items.  There is a lot of hand stitching involved in every case.  Demand has been growing rapidly for my custom cigar cases. So much so, I  haven't been able to keep up with the demand, and have had to limit my orders due to the time it takes to put these cases together.  Each case is prepped for stitching by aligning the stitch line, pre-punching each hole, and then hand stitching each half of the case which takes about 30 minutes each.  This time taken would be reduced to just minutes with a sewing machine.
The amount needed for this campaign is $1500

This amount gives the the huge opportunity to purchase a leather sewing machine and specific sewing supplies.  I want to purchase this machine locally at a cincinnati based industrial sewing machine company. This way I can also help support our local economy along with my local business.
• $35 donation will allow you to choose one of my popular pipe stands.
• $50 Donation will allow you to choose one one of my signature style cuffs.
• $60 donation will allow you to choose one of my leather pipe cleaner holders.These hold 50 pipe cleaners and feature a crossed pipes tooled design.
• $100 donation will allow you to chose a black or brown 3 finger cigar case.
If the goal is not reached the donated amount will go into an account to continue to save up for a leather sewing machine.
• Expand into new items ie: pipe bags etc.
• Open up bigger opportunities to take on bigger orders
• Bring myself closer to using my leather business as my sole job.
• I've been approached by smaller up and coming cigar brands that would like to have their logo on a cigar case and this would allow me to fulfill their requests.

column2: > A Quick video of my current stitching

column1: This timelapse video took about 30 minutes in real time.
If you can't help out with donations please help by spreading the word of this fund raiser  via facebook, twitter, or by word of mouth and post it notes

column2: >I am a final year fashion design student at The London College of Fashion. For my degree project I am designing and producing a new fashion magazine. The premise for the magazine is to showcase the most individual, stylish, original and talented women, regardless of age.
>The fashion industry does not equate ageing with beauty, and I believe that this is not only ridiculous but quite the opposite.

>This will be a fashion magazine that features women of all ages, with cutting edge fashion shoots and original interviews, such as one with legendary fashion editor for Nova magazine and style icon Molly Parkin, who offered her thoughts on SuperWomen: "" I applaud you and it"".

column4: >With innovative fashion features and profiles, this magazine aims to offer high quality, intelligently written and exciting editorial that stands out amongst the thousands of mainstream fashion magazines dishing out the same thing!

column2: >To make this happen I am asking people to donate as much as they can, no amount is too small, so that I can fund the expensive process of printing, publishing and distributing the magazine. Printing just one copy will cost me about £160 or roughly $260, but if I print more then the price goes down, so I would love to be able to print at least 500 copies.

> I believe so strongly in this idea, and I want to reach out and inspire other people with the independence, style, and confidence of the women featured in the magazine. By donating you will significantly change this project and my life, as I would love to continue this project to a second issue and beyond!

>All the money raised will go on project costs and if anybody donates over $100 they will receive a personalised SuperWomen postcard, and you will receive an honorary thank you mention in the magazine! Donate over $500 and you will receive all of the above plus a limited edition copy of the magazine!
>So if you believe that beauty has no age limit, and you want to see a fashion magazine that celebrates individuality and uniqueness then please donate! Thank you so so so much!
>If anybody would like to link up on Indiegogo, who is creating a similar project, or would like to know anymore about what I am doing here in East London UK, please don't hesitate to get in contact!

column1: I am a final year fashion design student at The London College of Fashion. For my degree project I am designing and producing a new fashion magazine. The premise for the magazine is to showcase the most individual, stylish, original and talented women, regardless of age.
The fashion industry does not equate ageing with beauty, and I believe that this is not only ridiculous but quite the opposite.

This will be a fashion magazine that features women of all ages, with cutting edge fashion shoots and original interviews, such as one with legendary fashion editor for Nova magazine and style icon Molly Parkin, who offered her thoughts on SuperWomen: "" I applaud you and it"".

With innovative fashion features and profiles, this magazine aims to offer high quality, intelligently written and exciting editorial that stands out amongst the thousands of mainstream fashion magazines dishing out the same thing!What We Need & What You Get

To make this happen I am asking people to donate as much as they can, no amount is too small, so that I can fund the expensive process of printing, publishing and distributing the magazine. Printing just one copy will cost me about £160 or roughly $260, but if I print more then the price goes down, so I would love to be able to print at least 500 copies.

I believe so strongly in this idea, and I want to reach out and inspire other people with the independence, style, and confidence of the women featured in the magazine. By donating you will significantly change this project and my life, as I would love to continue this project to a second issue and beyond!

All the money raised will go on project costs and if anybody donates over $100 they will receive a personalised SuperWomen postcard, and you will receive an honorary thank you mention in the magazine! Donate over $500 and you will receive all of the above plus a limited edition copy of the magazine!
So if you believe that beauty has no age limit, and you want to see a fashion magazine that celebrates individuality and uniqueness then please donate! Thank you so so so much!

If anybody would like to link up on Indiegogo, who is creating a similar project, or would like to know anymore about what I am doing here in East London UK, please don't hesitate to get in contact!",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

First off, if we are successfully funded, we will send out your rewards as soon as we start producing our clothes, stickers, etc. (hopefully before April/May). We can even raise more than our goal, if you help! However if our project is not successfully funded, you dont lose anything, and get your pledge back.

Blub is a clothing company from Los Angeles, and our goal is to successfully create comfortable clothes for everyone with simple designs. The Founder and Primary Designer is 15 Years Old, and Goes to Milken Community High School. Our website is www.ablub.com, we are still working on launching it, so please be patient. We also have a facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/ablubblub, and a big cartel site: http://blub.bigcartel.com/, where you can see some of our prototypes/mocks of our clothes. We also have a Flickr Page (http://www.flickr.com/photos/77771678@N04/sets/) with mocks and prototype designs. We have not started selling anything yet, in fact we have not even started to print, but we need your support to get started.
Can Be Found At the Following Websites:

So we don't want to bad quality printing, nor uncomfortable clothes. And we want them to last. The comfort quality, and print quality has a price. This costs lots of money, money we need to make your shirts! We want to give you top quality clothes with designs you'll love, using different printing styles, but primarily silk-screen, which unfortunately is the most expensive, but most sustainable too.
We plan on starting off doing men's and women's tops
column2:
Tee Shirts, Sweatshirts, Sweaters, Hoodies, etc. Sizes: XS, S, M, L, and XL. We have researched tons of T-Shirt and Clothing manufacturers to provide for us, and we are still figuring it out based on quality and price. Our research on printing has ranged from extremely low prices to extremely high, but we want to give you the best quality (not necessarily the most expensive, just the most comfortable and best looking, For reasonable prices.) For the Stickers, we have only ordered from ""The Sticker Guy"" to test the quality first, and once confirmed we can start printing those too.

column1: Hello everyone, this is the last call for ""UChicago: The Original Order of the Phoenix t-shirts"". If you want a shirt, it is important to buy it now as there are a limited number of shirts in each size/style. There are two shirt choices - a Gildan shirt or a higher quality American Apparel shirt.

The shirts will be available for pick-up on Tuesday, October 28th from 2:00 PM to 3:00 PM and Saturday the 1st from 2:00 PM to 3:00 PM in or outside of the Regenstein Library (I can't reserve a room until 1 week before) but you will be emailed the exact location. You can also contact me at Katalina Kimball@gmail.com. If you really can't make either of the times above, please leave a comment on this campaign's page and we will work something out.

If you live in South, Max P, B.J, or Snell-Hitchcock, I'm considering having some of the shirts delivered. I haven't decided yet but, if you would prefer this to picking the shirt up, you should be able to include your address when you order.

To those of you that pre-ordered, I'm sorry but the special pre-order price is no longer available. I'm glad that so many of you had the opportunity to buy a shirt at the special price, but it would be too complicated to continue this as I am abroad and someone else will be distributing the shirts.
Gildan size chart, specifications etc.: http://www.mygildan.com/p/2000/011?view=

I did not grow up sewing, although I grew up around it. My mom was into a variety of needle crafts. If you would have told me when I was younger that I would not only sew, but have a business based on sewing I would have laughhed at you. Like most young people I could not predict what life would throw my way. In 2008, my 3 week old son, cooper, died after open heart surgery. My creative outlet had always been knitting, but it  no longer quieted my mind or calmed the storm raging inside me. I needed something more. As a former knitting shop owner, color spoke to me, but it was no longer in the form of yarn, fabric was its replacement. I taught myself how to sew as a way to heal my heart, honor my son and keep living. The creative process saved me. As a result lucends was born.

I like to take simple shapes and forms and give them a modern feel. Color fuels my soul and is the inspiration for each piece. My pieces are unique because each one is one of kind, ensuring that each item is not only one that my customers love but is a piece of art, as well. All items are made by in my home studio, usually while my two year old son Chace is either at school or napping. I believe wholeheartedly in the handmade process, ensuring that my hands and only my hands work on each lucends product. Each piece of work is made with a great deal of love, time and care. I want my work to help customers feel an often times intangible emotion, love.

lucends continues to steadily grow year to year, sales have doubled each year since opening and are on track to at least double last years sales. In order to continue to grow, I need a comprehensive and cohesive website. One that portrays who I am and what lucends is all about, as well as serves an online marketplace for lucends products. Because lucends has developed and grown very organically I have various pieces in of the puzzle in place, but I need them to be sewn together in a cohesive way.

This is where you come in... With your funding and support lucends will have a professionally designed website that encompasses all of who I am as a company, one that represents a journey of growth, healing and an immeasurable amount of love. I will be extremely honored, very grateful and downright giddy if you would join me on this adventure that fuels my creative soul, honors my sweet son cooper, and spreads love across the country piece by piece.
I hope that you will join me on this creative journey.
Pleas feel free to share with your friends, family or those who you think would be interested in this project.
You can read more about my story on my blog www.lucendsblogspot.com.
Follow lucends on twitter: www.twitter.com/lucends

Like lucends on facebook: www.facebook.com/lucends

Hello! I can’t THANK YOU enough for visiting my fundraising page on indiegogo.  That’s What SHE Said Sports LLC is a sports show I created because not only am I a diehard sports fan but this show is something that I’ve dreamed about for a long time.  I have been a sports fan since I was little girl (thanks Dad!) I can’t remember a time when sports didn’t play an integral part of my life.  To this day depending on what’s on TV my dad and I will discuss and breakdown a game, the athletes and then disagree on who is going to win – I love it.  I remember telling my dad that I wanted to win the Heisman trophy and be a quarterback in the NFL – he just smiled never discouraging me.  My background is in broadcasting and journalism – I’ve done talk radio and TV news.  But my passion has always been sports.

So while going back to graduate school I knew doing my own sports show was what I wanted to do.  Currently, I do a sports podcast with my “Co-Dude” Byron Grover aka Bee Gee.  It’s amazing when you’re doing something your passionate about – it doesn’t feel like work.  My goal is to move our podcast to television by September.  We’ve also been successful doing live shows at sports bars and have created an amazing following using social media.

This campaign will allow us to do that – I’ve always believed if you are going to dream – why not dream big! Your contributions will make this happen - I’m shooting for my Heisman trophy by doing this sports show on local television twice a week.  I feel once we get on the air locally the sky’s the limit and then one day we go national!

You have to start somewhere – right now That’s What SHE Said Sports has its own YouTube channel   http://www.youtube.com/user/TWSSSports?feature=sub_widget_1   and we have been successful with our podcasts http://thatswhatshesaidsports.podbean.com/  and https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/thats-what-she-said-sports/id594293101?mt=2nd

With your contributions we get the opportunity to evolve and put our show on television.  Our vision is to be the #1 sports show on television while maintaining integrity. We will use the show as a platform to assist those in need in the community, educate and inspire.

Putting a show on television cost money and by raising $40,000 we can pay for 10 months of air time this will allow us to produce two 30 minute shows twice a week on a local station here in Atlanta, Georgia. Any additional funds will help buy more equipment - we can use another camera and more lights. I don’t want to think about “what if we don’t get our goal amount needed” because whatever we get it will be one step closer to getting on television.

We have some awesome perks to show you how appreciative we are of every dollar we raise.  We have everything from mugs, t-shirts, fan “shout outs” and a special invite to our launch party before the show starts in September.  We have autographed t-shirts and hats by some of the Atlanta Falcons. Ever wanted to be a producer? Well here you go and if you would like host one of our live shows first hand – we can do that too.

Your contributions will be fulfilling a life-long dream.  Ever since I can remember family and friends have told me “You need to be on television” or “You ever thought about doing your own sports show?”  I can’t tell you how excited I am about this show and how I’ve been so blessed to have such great support from all those who I talk to about the show.
Just think one day you will be able to say “I remember when I helped get her show on TV” like I said before the sky’s the limit with That’s What SHE Said Sports.
Remember everyone we know who has been successful on TV had to start somewhere and I’m proud to be starting with you all and this indiegogo campaign!

If you are unable to contribute with a monetary donation towards the show we all would appreciate prayers for our success and WORD OF MOUTH.  Please tell your family, friends, the mailman, all of your neighbors and the folks at the grocery store
column2: and please send our fundraising links to everyone you know as well.

We have some awesome perks to show you how appreciative we are of every dollar we raise.  We have everything from mugs, t-shirts, fan “shout outs” and a special invite to our launch party before the show starts in September.  We have autographed t-shirts and hats by some of the Atlanta Falcons. Ever wanted to be a producer? Well here you go and if you would like host one of our live shows first hand – we can do that too.

Your contributions will be fulfilling a life-long dream.  Ever since I can remember family and friends have told me “You need to be on television” or “You ever thought about doing your own sports show?”  I can’t tell you how excited I am about this show and how I’ve been so blessed to have such great support from all those who I talk to about the show.
Just think one day you will be able to say “I remember when I helped get her show on TV” like I said before the sky’s the limit with That’s What SHE Said Sports.
Remember everyone we know who has been successful on TV had to start somewhere and I’m proud to be starting with you all and this indiegogo campaign!

If you are unable to contribute with a monetary donation towards the show we all would appreciate prayers for our success and WORD OF MOUTH.  Please tell your family, friends, the mailman, all of your neighbors and the folks at the grocery store
column2: and please send our fundraising links to everyone you know as well.",0.0,0,"2 Campaigns

column1: 0,"
Its all about the details.
Our Pure T-shirt  MEN/WOMEN
We need funds to re-engineer this mold so we can increase our output.
Our Mission: We need to raise $2,500 to launch PURE. The funds will go towards buying material and re-engineering the molds needed to make our headphones.
Pure is a southern California based company that emphasizes comfort, sound, and style. Simply put, we aim to be the most comfortable and unique headphones on the market.
I've always had a passion for creating, and designing things. I’ll look at something and think of a new way to make it look more appealing or functional. That's what I did with PURE.

I started Pure to give people a product that they can appreciate. I hope with this campaign I can raise enough money to make the first batch of headphones and really make an impact on the people who will wear them.

Any contribution helps, and regardless of the size of contribution you will receive something in return.  Buying material in bulk and re-engineering the molds will be expensive, and its something that this 20 year old college student doesn't have. Securing funding to fully launch Pure will be challenging, but with recent help from local investors and your help I know it can be accomplished.

column5: >Everyone who donates gets something in return.

column1: $20 gets you a PURE Headphone in any color
$25 gets you a LIMITED EDITION color. Either White/Pink or White/Turquoise
$75 gets you a family pack. 4 headphones in any color even our limited edition line.
If we only reach 60% of our goal then we wont make the black color option.

What makes them Unique:  We take pride in assembling them right here in the U.S.A but what really makes us unique is our limited edition collection.  Each one is hand colored making no two exactly alike.  Each PURE headphone LIMITED EDITION line is literally one of a kind. Who else can say that.

What makes them comfortable: The most important feature is the material we use. Its not a hard metallic or plastic, our material has a more natural skin like feel to it. That essentially is what gives you the ability to wear them for hours doing almost anything you like to do, even laying on your side where the earbud is between you and the material you are laying down on.

How do they sound:  We use high quality neodymium magnets which offer great sound. They're extremely loud, yet they still offer a crisp sound when turned up all the way. The bass is exceptional as well, it handles the different levels you get with hip hop and rap music without compromising sound quality. Comparable to headphones in the $50-100 price range.

Who are they made for: Anyone who requires the most from their earphones. There are a lot of options out there but no one has taken the comfort aspect and included to their design.  Pure is as unique as every individual out there, so it’s a matter if you want the best of both worlds. Style and comfort.

Why are they so cheap: Because the owner (Kazbek) said ""I would never spend more the 60 bucks on a pair of earphones, so why would I make mine that expensive. They should be at that price, they're packaged at that price, the sound they produce could be compared to other headphones at that price, but I don’t feel the need to do that"".

column2: >Unlike most headphones where the cable is tied in a knot inside of the headphone, ours is securely attached to the speaker itself.  This method is better because constant tugging and pulling may result in a loose connection and cause static or overall failure of the headphone rendering it useless.  We have eliminated that entirely using a strong adhesive.  Pretty much the only way these can break is if you rip the wire.

column1: How long do they last:  We tested our headphones non stop for 4 months at 80% . Never failed. We just stopped after that.  We use high quality wiring, and materials to insure a long enjoyable product that should last for years.

Can you really fall asleep with them on: Yes. Its almost as your not feeling anything you just hear the music. When you first put them on you feel there presence but as you turn to your sides or do your normal activities you almost forget like they are really there.


The Impact

Pure is all about comfort and uniqueness. We believe that we are the most comfortable in ear headphones on the market and hope to share our product with the world. Everything is set in place to make this happen, the only thing missing is the support we need to launch PURE.

Other Ways You Can Help
column4: >Please share this page anywhere you can! Facebook, Instagram, it doesnt matter. Anything helps!

LA native and single dad, Akua Floyd has partnered with Santa Cruz native Jessica Burns, MBA. As a father and former professional ball player, Akua knows what it means to work hard.  His creative ideas, and incredible work ethic makes him the perfect partner for Entrepreneurial Jessica Burns. Jessica ran a small business from 2010-2012 and is craving this chance to put her creativity to work.  As two California natives, both Akua and Jessica feel extremely passionate that Californians have a unique attitude or ""swag"" about them that no one else has in the world.  If you are from California and moving to Texas- or across the globe to China- that Calgirl or Calboy inside will never leave.  You may be able to take the man out of Cali but you will never take the Cali out of the man!  This realization led to the concept of CBCG.   CBCG is a new clothing line- starting with T-shirts and Hats- geared towards the Californian in all of us.  Never again will anyone have to leave California behind! Enjoy it every day with style in our new, fashion forward, sweat-shop free, super soft T-shirts!
For our first Campaign we are asking for $5,000 to cover start-up expenses.
*At the very mimimum we need $1,000 per trademark (x3)
*$400 for LLC filing and legal consultation
*$50 to cover website start up costs
*The rest $1550 would go to making our first large order of inventory
*Any gift over $75 recieves a T-shirt of one of our beginning designs to show our appreciation for your instrumental support! PLEASE CONTACT US TO PROVIDE GENDER AND SIZE FOR YOUR PERK!
* All donors will be thanked from the owners for helping two people fulfill a passion and spur on the spirit of California!

At CBCG, we believe in what we call the GIVING CYCLE.  If you give to us, to get our feet on the ground running, we believe that we should keep that cycle going and pay it forward.  As a result, CBCG is committed to helping other small business get off the ground.  We will provide small business consultations via email to future entrepreneurs who need help getting starting.
Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:
• Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
• Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!
• Once our marketing is up and running, find us a like us on Facebook!

And that’s all there is to it.

Grandma and Grandpa should enjoy life without worrying about falling and injuring themselves, or even breaking a hip. Now, you can help your Grandparents continue to enjoy their lives free from the fear of falling and hurting themselves.

Here’s how: Contribute money to the development of a product that will help protect seniors from injury when they fall.

I am Dr. Marshall Keyes, MD, a physician who has practiced medicine for over 35 years. I invented HIP-D™ (Hip Inflatable Protection Device), a stylish belt that automatically detects falls and inflates a protective personal-size airbag around the hips, well before the wearer hits the ground. This all takes place within a fraction of a second, faster than the blink an eye. The airbag, just like the one in your car (but much smaller and attractive) cushions the fall and reduces the force of impact against the ground. At the same time, a built in mini-cell phone connects the wearer to an emergency call center operator.

Falls and hip fractures are a huge epidemic. Every year, there are thirty million falls, resulting in 60,000 deaths in the US alone. The size of the problem is evident in the following facts*:
• 30 million falls a year in the US alone
• 33% of seniors (1 out of 3) fall at least once a year
• 350,000 hip fractures a year from falls
• 60,000 deaths a year from hip fracture complications
• 20,000 seniors die of each year from falls alone
• 80% of women over age 75 would rather die than fracture their hip and be admitted to a nursing home (British Medical Journal).
*CDC (Center for Disease Control and Prevention), a branch of the Dept. of Health and Human Services of the US government, and respected medical journals
There has been no solution to this problem, until now. With your help, we can solve this epidemic.

HIP-D™ uses state-of-the-art technology including personal-size airbags, motion sensors (accelerometers), cell phones and GPS location systems. In addition to the elderly, HIP-D can also help protect anyone prone to falls, including the injured, disabled, handicapped and post-op patients.
Development for HIP-D™ has been performed by researchers, scientists and engineers at USC Dept. of Engineering in Los Angeles, the Palo Alto VA Rehabilitation R&
column2: D Center, the Motion Analysis Laboratory of the Neurology Department of Tel Aviv Sourosky Medical Center/Ichilov Hospital and independent engineers in the US, Israel and China.

column1: As a physician, I have spent most of my adult life caring for people. I fell in love with medicine as an undergraduate at Princeton and continued my studies at Temple Medical School. Throughout my career, I have had thousands of seniors as patients, many of whom have fallen or live in constant fear of falling and breaking their hips. Now, HIP-D can make a unique contribution to the well-being of millions of seniors.

Your support can help me complete the development of this revolutionary product. A commercially available HIP-D™ will help protect seniors, improve their quality of life, and maybe even help save your own Grandma from serious injury, hip fracture or death.
Marshall Keyes, MD: physician and inventor who wants to improve the lives of seniors and protect them from fall related injuries.
Steve Finkel, Engineer: an experienced engineer who has managed product development for major international technology companies.
To finish product development, perform clinical testing, set-up for production and prepare to market and sell our product, we need $475,000.

You contributions will support the following activities: completion of product development, clinical trials, production line set-up and tooling for manufacturing, creation of sales and marketing campaign and miscellaneous expenses including rent, travel, legal fees, computers and insurance.

Two emerging fashion designers who love art, fashion and surrounded by the people who appretiate it.
Entrapenuers, artists,and self starters have all experienced road blocks one way or another in their careers because of money and lack of funding.

At this current stage we are two emerging fashion designers who are absolutly passionate about art and fashion, after two  successfull years in chicago demand for our designs grew, but lack of proper work space and resources have been limiting our potential to expand. So after carefull consideration we decided to take a risk and get our own design studio (chicago fashion factory) begening june 2012.

Our plan is to also create unique workshops in the studio, teaching rare fashion design techniques , fashion marketing , fashion show production, and much more. As our workshops progress we aim to give back to the community by creating donated workshops to teach young artists who are interested in fashion design yet lack the opprotunity to learn the proper fundamentals to exceed.

With your help so much is possible, funding proper tools and supplies that are needed in the professional design environment , this will give us the opprotunity not to only move forward as designers but also have the ability to help other artists/designers with knowledge and experience to move forward with their careers, a trickle effect with so much potential.
If you look on the right side of the page you will see different options of donations with awsome perks, check then out and pick one or more.
If we don't reach our entire goal than most of the funds will go towards the cutting tables and sewing machines.

Its simple, we all need a push here and there and what goes around comes around, the more we grow as business owners the more there is contribution to the community , the nation and possibly one day the world.One day we will be the donors and funders of other entrepenuers and remember the day amazing people like you helped us suceed.
Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:
we ask that you please share our campaign with your friends, families, on your facebook twitter linkedin fan pages, and emails.
Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!
And that’s all there is to it.

With your help so much is possible, funding proper tools and supplies that are needed in the professional design environment , this will give us the opprotunity not to only move forward as designers but also have the ability to help other artists/designers with knowledge and experience to move forward with their careers, a trickle effect with so much potential.
What We Need & What You Get
If you look on the right side of the page you will see different options of donations with awsome perks, check then out and pick one or more.
If we don't reach our entire goal than most of the funds will go towards the cutting tables and sewing machines.

Its simple, we all need a push here and there and what goes around comes around, the more we grow as business owners the more there is contribution to the community , the nation and possibly one day the world.One day we will be the donors and funders of other entrepenuers and remember the day amazing people like you helped us suceed.
Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:
we ask that you please share our campaign with your friends, families, on your facebook twitter linkedin fan pages, and emails.
Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!
And that’s all there is to it.",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

Selective is designed in the heart of San Francisco. We spent months finding the best WRAP certified factories around the world – the very same ones used by the most prominent designer brands.

Quality products usually come at an extra-inflated price. At Selective, we believe our customers have the right to know what their products cost to make. We reveal our true costs and show you our markup.
column2: >White V Neck
column3: >White Crew Neck
column4: >Grey V Neck
column5: >Grey Crew Neck
column6: >Black V Neck
column7:
>Black Crew Neck

 

From the fabrics to the stitches and seams, we've focused on the details that will exceed your expectations.

We recommend machine wash the undershirts with cold water, tumble dry low. Do not bleach or iron. 

Unlike cotton, which requires massive amounts of water to grow, bamboo requires almost no irrigation and pesticides. Bamboo also regenerates naturally and grows 10 times faster than a regular tree. Any product that is made of bamboo will eventually decompose into a nutrient rich soil, meaning that its remains are extremely valuable to the Earth.


If you add up all the fabric, the production and shipping costs from the factory to your door step, you end up with a price that is a little over $10. Sounds like a pretty good bargain, right? In reality, this is also the cost of a premium undershirt that is made by your favorite designer brand. When you pick up a premium undershirt off the shelf at any high-end fashion store, you end up paying 8x more than just the cost of the undershirt: advertisement, sponsorships, retail stores, and middlemen.  

At Selective, we believe that our customers have the right to know what their products cost to make. We cut off all that nonsense and sell to you directly, offering the same high quality, but without the high price tag.

We investigated factories all around the world to ensure the highest possible production quality for our undershirts. We were led to this Central China factory by its first-rate industry reputation. Since 1963, this knitting factory has been producing top quality products for a range of established designer brands.

How do I measure my chest? 

With arms straight at sides, measure around the fullest part of the chest, over the shoulder blades and right under your armpits.


Risks and challenges

We know production delays and unforeseen obstacles are always a risk. One of these possible circumstances is exceeding our forecasted quantities by a significant amount. However, we have been in contact with our factories for quite some time. They have over five decades of experience and have been the chosen factory for many designer brands.

We are very confident they will be punctual. We believe in transparency and communication, so our backers will be the first to know about any unplanned hurdles or delays. Although, at this point in the project, they are highly unlikely.
