",,1.0,0,"1 Campaign
Kasy is an Icelandic, innovative brand that offers
The great thing about Kasy swimwear is that women can easily mix and
match colors and sizes to create gorgeous variations.
The idea of Kasy was initiated when Katrín, the founder
and the designer was on her summer vacation in Spain several years ago. She had
always found it difficult to find the right swimwear that fulfilled her needs
and desire. The usual outfit for her on the beach was a whole swim dress that
she was comfortable enough wearing when playing with her son. On the other hand
when there was time to relax and catch some sun, she needed to go privet to
change into a bikini. At this time Katrín got the idea of designing a
multifunctional swimwear that would fulfill her needs.
Katrín started working on the idea of Kasy swimwear after she lost her job prior to the economic crisis. That pushed her
to follow her dream and act on this brilliant idea of a multifunctional swimwear
that is both comfortable and stylish.
The basic elements are the bikini bra and
bottom. They come with stylish and beautiful magnetic snaps. Then you choose
whether you want a top or a dress that easily snaps on to the bikini bra or a
skirt that snaps onto the bikini bottom - or all of the above. The snaps are
made with magnetic buttons that makes it very easy to attach the additional pieces
to the bikini. Wearing Kasy swimwear will make it possible for you to change
quickly depending on what your needs and desires are.

column2: >To create additional variations for the bikini top, the woman can change the straps in three different ways.

column1: of Kasy swimwear in the color black for introduction and managed to sell most
of it. The women who got to know Kasy, all seem to love this variation of
swimwear and if you are interested to join them, we still have some left. To order now, klick on this link order@kasyswim.com.

Kasy needs your support to be able to continue our hard work. We have pretty much set everything up, the design, the colors and a solid manufacturer. We even were able to build up strong contacts with international retailers last year. What we need the most at this time is a financial support to be able to manufacture more styles and colors. As well as build up a strong international marketing campaign. The women who have tried Kasy swimwear are all happy with the product and some claim that Kasy has changed their lives. We do believe we have a good product and a great opportunity on the market. Your support means a great deal for us and will allow us to reach our goal.
Here’s how you can support our campaign:

1) Select a perk on the right hand side to start your pre-order. 
2) Continue onto the next page to enter shipping information followed by payment details.
3) Complete payment via Paypal or using your credit/debit card. Kasy will use these funds to process the first production run, bringing the project to life.
4) We aim to deliver your first items in Feb-Mars 2015.
has already beaten its greatest challenge which is finding a trustful  manufacturer
and the perfect material, as well as financing the first production. Now our greatest challenge is to
reach our goals in the Indiegogo campaign as well as finding our way into the

We have a tremendous faith in our product and It´s our believe that Kasy swimwear is coming to stay for a long time.  The risks are very low where there is plenty of room fur us on the market, since the selection of swimwear for curvy women is minimal.
The Kasy team is determent to work as hard as it takes to reach our goals and we surely hope you will have faith in us.
<div> If you can´t support our campaign by purchasing
Kasy swimwear or contributing money. You can help us by sharing
column2: >this project in your circle of friends, family and in all your social networks. It would be of a great help.

column1: the link provided below the video at the top of the page to invite people
We want to thank all of those who offered their help and supporting in the making of our campaign, for giving us good advice and a pat on the back, it really means a great deal to us.

We also want to send a special thanks to the girls in the band East Of My Youth, for letting us use their beautiful song in the video, which is called Lemon Stars.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=okJRdU37Atw

What sort of fabric is Kasy swimwear made out of? 
We only use quality fabric: a nylon/spandex blend, matted and a bit thick for extra support and coverage. 

Can the fabric withstand chlorine and sea water? 
Yes, you can enjoy wearing your Kasy swimwear to the pool and the beach.
Does the bikini bra have a plate?
No the bra has no plate nor is padded. For our next line we're adding a plate on the side for extra support.
Can I switch the position of the straps on the back of the bikini bra?

Yes, you can actually have them three ways: either fastened normally (vertically), across the shoulders or tied at the back of your neck for a halter neck look. We recommend having them across the shoulders for maximum support.
Since the bikini bra is in one piece, is it hard to put on?
For some women it can be a bit difficult, similar to putting on a sports bra. In the near future we´ll alter the design of the bikini bra and add regular bra hooks to make it easier to put on.
The fabric in most of my swimwear gets a bit see-through after a while, especially at the back of my bikini bottoms. Will that happen to my Kasy swimwear?

No, Kasy swimwear definitely shouldn't become see-through. Just in case, we made our bottoms out of extra thick fabric because we’d like our customers to be able to bend over and adjust their towels on the sun bench without feeling uncomfortable.

Yes we will! Our goal is to always have our 8 main colors available so you can add your favorite color piece to your Kasy collection at any time. We´ll have 2-3 new and trending colors every year, but to top it off, each year a carefully selected artist will design a fabulous new print for us. For every sold print piece from the Kasy swimwear line, a donation will be made to a charity of the artists choosing.
Will the snaps withstand chlorine and sea water?

Yes, they will. Just in case, we recommend that you soak your Kasy swimwear in cold water for about 30 minutes after use. We also recommend you watch our video that shows the best way to take care of your Kasy swimwear.
Do the snaps get very hot in the sun?

In the three years we've sold Kasy swimwear we haven't had any problems with people hurting themselves on hot snaps. They can of course get quite hot if you lay your swimwear in the sun with the snaps exposed, so be careful just in case.
What if I already have a few Kasy pieces and get pregnant?

You sure can. When your baby bump gets bigger you might need a bigger middle piece (like a swim dress) to snap on to your bikini bra, but you should still be able to use your bikini bra and bottoms. You could use the opportunity to get a middle piece in a print or a new color to mix it up.
I entered my address incorrectly. Can I change it?
Yes you can. Please email to kasy@kasyswim.com with subject title: ‘Address Change’. Thank you.

We are all looking for the perfect bag.

We found our selves always having to choose between function and looks. We often ended up with different bags for our daily occasions
column2:
a backpack on the bike to work, a nice laptop case for the meetings and a third bag for dinner. So we created Bukvy.

Bukvy creates multi-functional bags and accessories with timeless design and high quality materials. All items are ethically made by sustainable materials in our small studio outside of Porto, Portugal. 

The offer

We have a direct-to-consumer approach. It means that you get what you pay for, a great bag without the usual market mark ups which often is x 8-12. The campaign is inviting you to join the order-process earlier than with a usual purchase. We, toghether, make a total order to our studio and in return for your patiance you get a great discount. In these times it is very valuable for us to share part of the minimum ordercost, remain our order continuity and keep supporting our studio in Porto. 

Except for the reduced pricing you will also get continuous updates and insight in the production process and we of course answer all your questions regarding production – as always.

Imagine what a wonderful thing to know that a beautiful daily bag-companion will arrive to you in December!

All support means the world to us – a cheer, a share or a purchase is all highly appreciated! 

 

The 5-in-1 Bo Bardi bag

The Bo Bardi bag is a:

column1:
All at once! Just change the straps, fold the bag and adjust the zippers to make it fit the moment. 

Size: 22- 42 cm H x 30 cm W x 3-15 cm D. Straps: 2 x 75 cm L x 2 cm T
column5:
> 

 

 

The 3-in-1 Midi Curie bag

The Midi Curie is a:

column1:
All at once! Just change the straps to make it fit your moment.

Size: H 32 x W 34 cm. Straps: W 2 x L 52- 85 cm. Inner pocket: W 30 x H 21 cm. Outer pocket with zipper: W 17 x H 12 cm.
column6:
>

 

The Maathai Kit

The Maathain Kit is your essential accessory. It's a:

column1: The kit goes perfectly together with all our bags but is also perfect in itself.
• The Bo Bardi Bag in Leather comes in a grainy Bovine leather and suede.
• The Midi Curie Bag in Leather comes in a plain Nappa and suede.
• The Maathai Kit comes in plain Nappa leather.

• All items comes with gold plated details and logo in gold color. If you feel that you would be much more happy with details in silver, send  an e-mail to: customercare@bukvy.se and we will help you!

column2:
/>

 

 

 

 

 

Our Story

We are two founders, Elena Ekström and Joanna Bark. Stockholm based and best friends since the age of six. We believe it is possible to change the way we consume, to make better choices and use the same items a lot more times. We are proud about our way and that we never compromise. This means making  as little impact as possible – including people, animals and environment.

Mass-production is a big issue. We buy too many things that lasts for too short time. Un-sold items are thrown in landfill and non-degradable items filled with chemicals stays in the land for a long time. People get damaged in the production process by unfair work conditions, low wages, bad or none safety equipment and without rights. And the industry just keeps on producing more and more items. But there is a difference between mass production and craftsmanship.

As seen in: 

Sustainability &
column3:
Ethics

Leather

All items will be made in our carefully selected studio in Portugal by beautiful, Europe sourced organic leather (Eco nappa/grainy bovine leather) and suede. The leather is tanned entirely without dangerous chemicals and will get a beautiful patina over time.

Cork Skin

The industry of our Cork Skin is a protection against the climate change. The oak trees reduces the risk of fire and desertification and thanks to the long life of an oak tree a lot of Co2 is deposited in the woods. It is also a natural, organic, renewable and biodegradable material and 100% recyclable.

A closer introduction to our Cork Skin

Production schedule

Bukvy is already up and running and we will produce the items together with our studio who we have been working with for many years.

column1: • September: Leather tanning and ordering of all details (zippers etc.)
• December: Inspection of all bags and shipping

column2:
Challanges

The risks and challenges are the same as the ones we are facing every day and are used to handling:

column1: • Delays in production. If delays occurs, we will of course communicate this clearly with you.

• Shipping problems. We use DHL to get the bags, first to us and then you. You will be able to trace your item when it is shipped from us to know exactly where it is and when the estimated delivery time is planned.
• Covid19. Until today our studio has not closed down at any time. If that would be neccessary this autumn and lead to delays occurs we will be quick to inform you.

The tannery is ready to start and we look forward to delivering all items just in time for Christmas so please consider backing us!

  

Press contact:

Elena Ekström, elena@bezbukvy.com

Hello, we're Dittany Rose and Rebecca Scambler. Dittany is an educational consultant and jewellery designer and Rebecca is an illustrator and designer.
column2: >As friends we quickly discovered a mutual passion for political engagement and a strong desire for a fairer society. We are hugely inspired by the work of the campaigning group 38 Degrees and approached them with the idea of raising money for them through the sale of a T-shirt we designed. They loved the idea and our campaign is now a reality!

column1: If you've ever clicked on a social media campaign you'll be aware of what an important contribution organisations like 38 Degrees make to our democracy. If you share a desire for a more progressive, fairer, better society, help support 38 Degrees by buying one of our T-shirts today.

Our design is based around the inspirational phrase 'be the change you want to see in the world'. Like 38 Degrees, we believe in the power of the individual to make a difference. The use of the word 'change' also links to the 38 Degrees'  slogan 'people. power.change.'
38 Degrees is proud of the fact that it does not take money from political parties
or from big business. In this way it can maintain its independence. By buying a T-shirt as part of our campaign you
are helping 38 Degrees to remain a much needed independent voice in the political
also be spreading the word by walking around with the 38 Degrees logo
emblazoned on your chest for all to see.
have launched our campaign now as we think that not only might you want to buy
a T-shirt for yourself, but that it would make a great Christmas gift. We
realise however that getting your T-shirts to you in time is of key importance.
That is why we will finish the campaign on the 13th November. This will allow
time for us to print and send you your T-shirt by the 10th December at the
understand that not everyone will be able to contribute by buying a T-shirt but
that doesn't mean that you cannot help. Sharing this page on social media and
making sure that you tell friends and colleagues about our campaign is
invaluable support. You can find out more about 38 Degree on their website www.38degrees.org.uk

Hello, we're Dittany Rose and Rebecca Scambler. Dittany is an educational consultant and jewellery designer and Rebecca is an illustrator and designer. As friends we quickly discovered a mutual passion for political engagement and a strong desire for a fairer society. We are hugely inspired by the work of the campaigning group 38 Degrees and approached them with the idea of raising money for them through the sale of a T-shirt we designed. They loved the idea and our campaign is now a reality!

If you've ever clicked on a social media campaign you'll be aware of what an important contribution organisations like 38 Degrees make to our democracy. If you share a desire for a more progressive, fairer, better society, help support 38 Degrees by buying one of our T-shirts today.
Our T-shirt design promotes a message of hope and change that will make a
great gift for socially and politically conscious friends and family. We are aiming to raise £1000. Pledge to buy our T-shirt for £20 and all
profits will go to 38 Degrees.  We've worked out that as a minimum we'll be

able to contribute 38% from each T-shirt - that's £7.60 - hence our campaign title. The more we sell, the greater our margins will be and the more we can give to 38 Degrees (we are donating all our time for free).

We have chosen the flexible funding model on Indiegogo so that you will get your T-shirt whether we reach our target or not. The campaign will finish on the 13th November and we guarantee that all T-shirts will have been sent out to you by the 10th December.

This jacket is ...

1) Made from premium fabric. We use the highest quality 12oz duck canvas. It's designed to have an amazing soft feel but withstand the toughest wear.

2) Backed by a 25 year guarantee. We're so confident that your Quarter Century Jacket will be the most durable jacket you've ever had that we are backing them up with a 25 year guarantee.

3) Made in America. The best quality comes when you make things in your own backyard. We work with production facilities that pay proper attention to fabric, people and processes right here in America.

4) Sold wholesale. By offering our jackets directly via Kickstarter we are able to cut out the retail channel and offer you a jacket that would usually retail for $300 at only $159.

Our journey started almost two years ago when we took a radically new approach to making clothes. It's the passion for quality clothes that led us on a mission to design The Quarter Century Pants. Now, we are at it again and are doing something similarly radical for outerwear: a jacket so well made it's guaranteed to last 25 years.

column1: How does the jacket last so long?

The Quarter Century Jacket is made from premium US made 12oz duck canvas. Duck canvas differs from plain canvas in that the threads in the former are stronger and more tightly woven. The jacket is then constructed right here in America and finished with military grade hardware. The result: the best fitting, most durable jacket on the planet.

Inspired by the classic 20th century deck jacket, we set out to design a timeless and stylish everyday jacket. The Quarter Century jacket redefines style by presenting itself in a simple and modern construction:
Our Quarter Century Jacket includes the following features:
We are launching our Quarter Century Jacket in five colors: stone, amber, olive, slate and black. Let us know if you are looking for additional colors. We'd love to hear from you!
Every jacket comes in size S-XXL for both men &
column2: women in our signature Quarter Century fabric and fit. We will confirm your preferences at the completion of the Kickstarter. You can review our fit guide here.

column1: We are offering The Quarter Century Jacket at wholesale. No retail markups. No distribution markups. By selling to you directly we can maintain the highest quality and construction while offering a fair price point.

column3:
/>

We are offering an IndieGoGo wholesale price of $189 including the Quarter Century Jacket and free shipping (US). Shipping to Canada is $12 and to the rest of the world $20 for a single jacket. Click on the reward to see all details.

column1: The Quarter Century Jacket is 100% made in America. We use the highest quality fabrics and very best construction.
Our premium duck canvas is made by Mount Vernon Mills in South Carolina and the quilted inner lining, metal hardware and construction is done right here in Los Angeles, CA.

We've made these jackets to last a lifetime and are guaranteeing they are of the highest quality possible, but if anything happens to them we'll repair them free of charge. Send them back to us and we'll fix them!

I created Pretty Nobody out of a desperate need for design work. It was about four months after I graduated art school and I couldn't get a design job to save my life. I had always appreciated the people who went out and did their own thing, those people were who I looked up to the most, and one random day in July (2015) I said, ""I'm going to do that!"" and the rest is history. 

As a one-woman-show, I've been making pins from my own designs for almost a year now and its been amazing. I've always thought that one day I would expand into apparel or tote bags and here is where you guys come in! 

I want to create my very own embroidered projects to sell in my shop. Embroidered shirts, bags, vintage one-offs and possibly even take commissions for custom products. In order to do this, I need supplies and the actual machine that can take my digital art and sew it into reality. 

I started Pretty Nobody with nothing, no kickstarter, no loans, just enough money to make one pin and with its success, create the next one and so on
column2:
constantly recycling my profit into more product. I've had some success but not enough to be able to embark on this project anytime soon. So this time I'm asking for help, your help. 

Pins have been very good to me, they make the people who wear them into living art galleries but not everyone collects them or even realizes they are something to collect. Apparel is universal. Who doesn't love a cool shirt? What is better than even the coolest screen printed design? A design that pops straight off the shirt! More exclusive with a higher quality look and feel. Not your average tee! The possibilities could be endless. Lets bring the Pretty Nobody brand to everyone - not just fans of flair. 

Any little bit helps! I am extremely passionate about this project and feel it is exactly where Pretty Nobody should be going and I'm willing to do whatever it takes to make it a reality. Thank you to anyone willing to make it a little easier on me to get there. 

The biggest hurdle I see with this project is the fact I'm currently traveling the country with my husband. So far this has not hindered my business whatsoever and we plan to do whatever possible to make it work with our current living situation.

To find my current products, please visit my shop http://www.prettynobodyco.com

column1: To start a bridal shop that focuses on the more alternative brides, specializing in vintage, vintage inspired, and other offbeat styles. I want it to be a creative space where any kind of bride can find their look. Not just dresses, but jumpsuits, separates, capes, veils, headpieces, and shoes and other accessories. The goal is to make it a comfortable environment for brides to express themselves without having to settle or conform.

Eventually I would love to open my own storefront, but for now my plan is to get started with a rental space at one of the local vintage stores. Usually those vendors just display their merchandise and then leave it up to the store runners, but I want to make mine as personal as possible. In addition to having the dresses on display, I want to make the space feel like an actual tiny bridal shop within the store. I'll be leaving business cards/contact information in the space for brides to make special requests on inventory or to have the option to buy online. Depending on what the store allows, I would also like to give the brides the opportunity to have me help them with styling--almost like a real bridal appointment.

The funds I receive to get started will go mainly towards inventory, as well as retail and marketing supplies (hangers, body forms, displays, business cards, etc.) and some decor items to make it feel like a nice little bridal shop.

I'm 23, recently married, and we just moved into our own place. Things have been looking up in our personal life recently, and I've finally discovered what I'm passionate about! I've dealt with a lot of anxiety over the years but more recently I've been able to put myself out there and I'm ready to really start my life!

I have always been creative, and my only consistent occupational goal has been to live a creative life. When I was younger I was very into fashion design. Interest in fashion has stayed with me, but my career goal changed to graphic design around high school-age. I went to school briefly for graphic design after taking many classes of that sort in high school, however, I got discouraged and reconsidered my interest in making that a career.

Of course, on the side I've had lots of other interests and passions for different types of creative projects--everything from event planning, to flipping furniture, to makeup. When I started working as a stylist in a bridal shop, I realized that this is what I get excited about. I get to be creative with fashion and styling, while also helping people and making them happy.

I'm not a very traditional bride (though I love ALL types of brides!!) I enjoy the more unique looks. Lots of brides would come in to the shop looking for a more ~alternative~ look, and I was usually the stylist they were referred to. I often day dreamed about one day working at or having my own bridal shop that caters to ""offbeat"" brides. After visiting a lot of different bridal shops in the area, I realized there weren't really any... so obviously I have to start one!
Own something you think fits the idea? (A dress, pair of shoes, veil or headpiece, accessory, retail supplies, or decor item?) Let me know!

In 2017, the MY Series was one of 75 industry-leading designs to receive the iF Gold Award out of a pool of 5575 entries. It was the only wristwatch to win the prize. This recognition inspired us to pursue mass production so we could share our championed design with everyone.

In 2019,  MY Series won a second design award, the German Design Award, which is the largest academic award in Germany.

 

To express the beauty of mechanical arts, we adopted an innovative and extreme skeleton design integrating the aesthetic feeling of mechanism and high-end material to the utmost extreme. The operation of the movement can be seen intuitively, which makes the visual effect more exciting. With the incessant movement, time becomes visible. The whole watch is like a precision mechanism worn on the wrist.
 

 

We also employed a fully transparent design on the entire back of the watch, demonstrating the mechanical structure without occlusion, so that we can appreciate the dynamic beauty of the mechanical structure.

 

 

To enhance the wearing experience, we experimented with alternative materials such as stainless steel, carbon fiber, and ceramics, but none of these met our expectations.

After many attempts, we found that titanium made for a perfect match our mechanical watch. Compared to traditional materials, titanium is lighter, so it won’t give customers any unnecessary discomfort. Meanwhile, titanium is one of the hardest metals in the world, it is less likely to be scratched or damaged in daily use.

 

Skin-friendly

It has good compatibility with the human body, skin-friendly causing no allergies, and is widely used in medical, jewelry and other manufacturing industries. It is less likely to cause any discomfort, even in hot sweaty conditions.

 

MY series includes a synthetic sapphire crystal glass on the front, which has a Mohs hardness of 9, second only to diamond, and a strengthened mineral crystal on the back, combined with a titanium alloy case and strengthened mineral glass for the case back provides a perfect contrast as well as taking the meaning of a strong safe watch for daily use to another level.

 

For better quality control and more skeleton parts, we especially customized an auto-mechanical movement with SEAGULL and took their highest quality standard, AAA-Class, which will run four full rounds testing for each movement.

(at 21,600 times/hour, with 19 gems and over 40 hrs power reserve. )

 

Food-grade silicone strap with fine flexibility and toxin-free. Original sweat-proof bump design for better wearing comfort.

*FDA Number: XMHL1609005631CW-01

To allow more people to wear it comfortably, we have increased the length of this model by 7% with 16 holes. The overall strap length has been increased from 24.2cm to 26 cm. New silicone band's softer and more ergonomic for increased comfort.

 

The switch-type spring bar

Quick change lock-tite spring bar for a more convenient strap installation and removal.

 

Collection
column2:
> 

We will offer a free leather band for each MY series watch. This well-selected full-grain leather is has a waterproof base, sweatproof and smell-proof leather base layer

 

 

Upgraded marking and Crown

(*from left to right: MY Stainless Steel Edition, MY Titanium Edition)
column3:
> 

Luminous Watch Hands

(*from left to right: MY Stainless Steel Edition, MY Titanium Edition)
column4:
> 

Slim Design

(*from left to right: MY Stainless Steel Edition, MY Titanium Edition)
column5:
> 

A good design is like a good book - worthy of careful inspection, review, and desirability. Furthermore, if given as a life-lasting gift, this timepiece represents a sign of true sincerity. Every time it is opened it is the beginning of a heart-beating journey

 

 

 

 

 

Michael Young was born in 1966 in Sunderland and graduated from Kingston University in 1992. The following year, he founded the Michael Young Studio to provide exclusive, quality design services across an eclectic range of markets.

Based in Hong Kong, his studio crosses borders, utilizing modern design by exploring the endless possibilities that only Asia’s technological ingenuity can provide.

 

“It is designed as Industrial Art that interests me, not just as a limited edition, but on a scale of mass production.” – Michael Young

 

For the last 25 years, Michael has been trying to express himself through his works. And he found that the time is the fairest thing to us all. It is the same 24 hours a day God gives to each person.

 

 

But to different people, time differentiates greatly. And to Michael, the most important thing is to make a better design with the limited time that he has.

 

 

As the world becomes more complicated, it is the simpler things that become more beautiful. And you can only feel relaxed after escaping from these complicated things. If we do things that matter, our life can be simpler.

The essence of living life is the concept of simplification, and this is MY Series, a work Michael designs for himself.

 

 

Simplify your life, and rule out the things that are not necessary. A minimalist design emerged from the simple lines of the complex movement. It constantly reminds us of the meaning of living a simple life, less complexity, more authenticity.

 

 

Integrated Global Resource

Only for the best-design timepiece that everyone can afford

A good design should be for everyone, but not just for the minority. That's the reason why we are working so hard to bring such an extraordinary and magnificent-design watch to as many people as we can.

 

Craftsmanship

For revealing watches’ luxury and distinguished characteristics, every visible component should be finely burnished, so that’s why traditional skeleton design is so expensive. 
We think the core value of mechanical watches is the aesthetics itself,  but not the precious metal or its unnecessary surface processing. So we didn’t waste too much on carving the texture of components but maintained some essential manufacture combining with pure metal arts. It not only guarantees a concise feature but also lowers the manufacturing costs substantially.   

 

Supplying Chain

We have tried to collaborate with some factories in Switzerland, Japan, and Germany that are professional in making movements. Out of our expectation, the costs are expensive and largely exceeded our budget. For ensuring the quality and costs control, we chose to collaborate with SEAGULL whose movement sales could take up to a quarter of the total sales around the world. Our customized movements fully adopted the test standard in Switzerland so that the quality of every product is consistent as promised

 

 

We are an original designer Brand, founded in 2016. In the last six years, we have won two IF Awards, two German Design Awards, eight Red Dot Awards, and we are also a winner for both the Red Dot Best of Best and IF Gold Award. Besides, we were granted for Top Innovative Design Team of German Red Dot Awards in 2014, which is ranked seventh among counterparts in the world. We appreciate these achievements sincerely, and we are encouraged to create more outstanding products in the future!

 

Mass-production is done and starts shipping worldwide!

New silicone band's softer and more ergonomic for increased comfort. The switch-type spring barQuick change lock-tite spring bar for a more convenient strap installation and removal. Collection  We will offer a free leather band for each MY series watch. This well-selected full-grain leather is has a waterproof base, sweatproof and smell-proof leather base layer  Upgraded marking and Crown(*from left to right: MY Stainless Steel Edition, MY Titanium Edition) Luminous Watch Hands(*from left to right: MY Stainless Steel Edition, MY Titanium Edition) Slim Design(*from left to right: MY Stainless Steel Edition, MY Titanium Edition) A good design is like a good book - worthy of careful inspection, review, and desirability. Furthermore, if given as a life-lasting gift, this timepiece represents a sign of true sincerity. Every time it is opened it is the beginning of a heart-beating journey     Michael Young was born in 1966 in Sunderland and graduated from Kingston University in 1992. The following year, he founded the Michael Young Studio to provide exclusive, quality design services across an eclectic range of markets.Based in Hong Kong, his studio crosses borders, utilizing modern design by exploring the endless possibilities that only Asia’s technological ingenuity can provide. “It is designed as Industrial Art that interests me, not just as a limited edition, but on a scale of mass production.” – Michael Young For the last 25 years, Michael has been trying to express himself through his works. And he found that the time is the fairest thing to us all. It is the same 24 hours a day God gives to each person.  But to different people, time differentiates greatly. And to Michael, the most important thing is to make a better design with the limited time that he has.  As the world becomes more complicated, it is the simpler things that become more beautiful. And you can only feel relaxed after escaping from these complicated things. If we do things that matter, our life can be simpler.The essence of living life is the concept of simplification, and this is MY Series, a work Michael designs for himself.  Simplify your life, and rule out the things that are not necessary. A minimalist design emerged from the simple lines of the complex movement. It constantly reminds us of the meaning of living a simple life, less complexity, more authenticity.  Integrated Global ResourceOnly for the best-design timepiece that everyone can affordA good design should be for everyone, but not just for the minority. That's the reason why we are working so hard to bring such an extraordinary and magnificent-design watch to as many people as we can. CraftsmanshipFor revealing watches’ luxury and distinguished characteristics, every visible component should be finely burnished, so that’s why traditional skeleton design is so expensive. We think the core value of mechanical watches is the aesthetics itself,  but not the precious metal or its unnecessary surface processing. So we didn’t waste too much on carving the texture of components but maintained some essential manufacture combining with pure metal arts. It not only guarantees a concise feature but also lowers the manufacturing costs substantially.    Supplying ChainWe have tried to collaborate with some factories in Switzerland, Japan, and Germany that are professional in making movements. Out of our expectation, the costs are expensive and largely exceeded our budget. For ensuring the quality and costs control, we chose to collaborate with SEAGULL whose movement sales could take up to a quarter of the total sales around the world. Our customized movements fully adopted the test standard in Switzerland so that the quality of every product is consistent as promised  We are an original designer Brand, founded in 2016. In the last six years, we have won two IF Awards, two German Design Awards, eight Red Dot Awards, and we are also a winner for both the Red Dot Best of Best and IF Gold Award. Besides, we were granted for Top Innovative Design Team of German Red Dot Awards in 2014, which is ranked seventh among counterparts in the world. We appreciate these achievements sincerely, and we are encouraged to create more outstanding products in the future! Mass-production is done and starts shipping worldwide!",51.0,0,"4 Campaigns

I am currently unemployed and have been struggling to sell my hand made Jewelry. I have a store on Etsy.com
but no online sales. In the summer I had some success selling at street fairs and flea markets, however since the weather is colder now, there are almost no fairs for me to sell at.
I am trying to raise $100 to join the Woodbridge
Artisan Guild in order to have a retail space to sell my Jewelry. I think The Woodbridge Artisan Guild
and Gallery would be a great opportunity for my Jewelry business. The
Gallery is located on Main Street in Downtown Woodbridge, NJ and his a high traffic area.

With a portion of the remaining funds I plan to purchase jewelry displays (which are very expensive). I can then try to sell my jewelry to bars, liquor stores, and other retail spaces. I would be able to use $300 to purchase 10 earring displays, 10 bracelet displays, 10 ring displays, and about 500 display cards/packaging.
I would like $100 to use for my transportation expenses and marketing (business cards/flyers) related to sales meetings.

column5: >Before presenting the campaign and our watches, we would like to thank all of you for being on this page and we hope you will love the project and would like to be part of this wonderful journey

>The GRIFFIN EMBLEM is more about the treasure than the griffin. We love the fact that griffin were perceived as heroes, but also as protectors of gold. On the logo, you can see the griffin is touching a diamond. This diamond is a reference to the treasure Griffins were fighting for. The word “emblem” is more a reference to the treasure than a synonym of ""logo.""

>There is always one moment in your life that you decide to buy a high quality automatic watch that will last you more than a year. When this moment arrives in our life, we realize it is almost impossible for us to find it because of the budget. Some models were really nice, but way too expensive. This moment changed our life because it brings us an idea. This idea is why we created our own brand: GRIFFIN EMBLEM - a stylish and high quality automatic watch at an affordable price. column1: All the GRIFFIN EMBLEM watches use the Japanese MIYOTA 82S series of mechanical automatic movements with exquisite workmanship and are held to high-quality standards. Both the material selection and assembling technicians have a good reputation. The 82S series, which was selected by GRIFFIN EMBLEM, was one of its masterpieces. The fantastic hollowed out and naked pendulum design combines with intricate carvings and show the manufacturing process - this makes the series’ movements look both beautiful and perfect.

All GRIFFIN EMBLEM watches are made of 316L stainless steel. 316L is a kind of steel that comes from the United States. It is the standard steel number of the ¨ASTM: American Society for Testing and Material.〃 Its corrosion resistance is very strong and the texture of it is pretty good as well. L means low carbon. It will have little impact on human skin and it is the only option for an advanced watch. The designers of GRIFFIN EMBLEM treat watches as artwork, and in addition we choose sophisticated Japanese mechanical movement. We also focus on the process of polishing
column2: its advanced technology of frosting and polishing makes the polish and texture of the watch fine and clear, and from there a strong three-dimensional appearance is formed.

column18: >Each of GRIFFIN EMBLEM watch is equipped with an advanced leather strap, allowing you to not only appreciate its intricate craft, but also enjoy the comfortable feeling.

column9: >The funds we will receive will be used for following all processes during the production of the watches, creating new prototypes and doing all the tests that are able to give you the best experience. Any additional funds will be used to give you new product (all contributors will have a metal plate on the packaging thanks to the goal of 10,000€), create a new collection and recruit new members to our team to enable us to accelerate the delivery time and also create new collections if we raise enough.

column1: (Delivery of rewards / perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.)
2- Do you ship worldwide and how much does it cost ?
We ship worldwide, free shipping for the France, and 10EUR for the rest of the world.
Your country may put some taxes on the customs during the delivery, we will do as much as we can to avoid this, but please note that we can not be responsible for this.
4- I wanted this product but it's out of stock, will you do more ?

Each piece is limited to 45, for a total of 450 pieces in the world. We will not create more, that's the beauty of being proud of having a limited edition. But if we raise enough money, we will create another collection, so don't forget to follow us on Facebook to stay in touch.
5- I bought a watch, but i don't want it anymore, can you refund me ?

Regarding to the terms of Indiegogo, we will not refund you. When you do a contribution to our project, we use the money for the commission of Indiegogo and Paypal and for the production of the watch you bought. We launch the production of the watch because you bought it. If you help us with a contribution, be sure you want it, because we will not refund you. (Terms of Indiegogo)

column8: >Nous sommes fiers de vous présenter nos montres automatiques GRIFFIN EMBLEM. 5 Modèles, 2 couleurs par modèle, chaque couleur est limitée à 45 pièces.
column10: >Plus qu'une montre, une oeuvre d'art.

column2: >Avant de présenter notre campagne et nos montres, nous souhaitons vous remercier d'être présent sur cette page et nous espérons que vous aimerez le projet, et que vous souhaiterez faire parti de cette aventure !

column5: >Il y a toujours un moment dans votre vie où vous décidez d'acheter un objet de qualité, dans notre cas, une vraie montre. Quelque chose de chic qui va durer plus d'un mois et qui ne traînera pas dans le bocal situé dans votre entrée. Lorsque ce moment est arrivé dans notre vie, nous avons réalisé qu'il était presque impossible pour nous de trouver une montre automatique à cause de notre budget. Ce moment a changé notre vie parce que cela nous a apporter une idée. Cette idée a été de créer notre propre marque, GRIFFIN EMBLEM, une montre élégante et luxueuse, mais à un prix abordable ! Nous avons passé des mois à travailler sur les détails et sur la conception pour essayer d'apporter les meilleurs matériaux associés à beau design, combinés dans une même montre. Ce qu'il nous manque ? Les fonds pour démarrer la production. Nous voulons que cette idée puisse se réaliser grâce à vous, ici sur Indiegogo.

column1: Le concept de la marque de GRIFFIN EMBLEM est basé sur des produits limités en quantités mais de très bonne qualité. Nous avons pu créer une série de montres mécaniques, avec une conception soignée et une sélection de matériaux supérieurs. Nous avons travaillé très dur sur cette marque, et nous voulons être sûrs qu'en achetant notre produit, vous aurez une montre qui possède:

column3:
>

Un design qui vous permet de porter la montre avec des vêtements décontractés ou professionnels

>

Le meilleur prix sur le marché pour cette gamme de montres

column1: Nous avons 5 modèles, chaque modèle divisé en 2 couleurs, chaque couleur sera limitée à 45 pièces, pour un total de 450 pièces.

column4:
>

Les modèles 1002-1, 1002-2, 1003-1, 1003-2, 1005-1, 1005-2,  1006-1 et 1006-2 sont en rupture de stock, et ne seront pas renouvelés (Ce sont des éditions limitées).

column6: >Rendez-vous plus haut dans la partie en anglais, ou Cliquez sur l'onglet
column7: >Galerie situé en haut de la page, en dessous du titre du projet, pour voir de nombreuses photos des montres.

column4:
>

Toutes les montres GRIFFIN EMBLEM utilisent la série japonaise Miyota 82S de mouvements mécaniques automatiques, une exécution exquise et supervisée par des normes de haute qualité. Ce mouvement dispose d'une très bonne réputation, à la fois sur le choix des matériaux mais aussi sur les techniciens d'assemblage. La série 82S est l'une des plus belles oeuvres de Miyota (Citizen). La conception de pendule nu et libre, se combinent avec des sculptures complexes. La présence de joyaux expose de façon élégante son processus de fabrication. Cet ensemble donne des mouvements superbes, et parfaits. Les modèles RG-1001 à RG-1005 possèdent le mouvement 82S0 tandis que le modèle RG-1006 est équipé du 85S5.

column1: Toutes les montres GRIFFIN EMBLEM sont faites d'acier inoxydable 316L. 316L est une référence destinée à l'acier aux État-Unis. La référence 316 provient de la société ""
column6: >Material"". Sa capacité de résistance à la corrosion est très forte et la texture de celui-ci est aussi très bonne.
column8: >Low carbon. Il aura donc peu d'impact sur la peau humaine et il est la seule option disponible pour les montres complexes. Les designers de GRIFFIN EMBLEM  considèrent les montres comme des oeuvres d'art, en plus de choisir un mouvement mécanique japonais sophistiqué, ils mettent également l'accent sur le processus du vernissage, sur sa technologie de pointe de givre et de polissage, ce qui rend la texture de la vitre de la montre claire, qui lui permet un fort aspect tridimensionnel.

column5: >Chacune des montres GRIFFIN EMBLEM est equipée d'un bracelet en cuir de qualité, ce qui vous permet non seulement d'apprécier son artisanat complexe, mais aussi de profiter de la sensation de confort de celui-ci.

column1: Les fonds que nous recevrons seront utilisés pour le démarrage de la production, également pour tout le processus au cours de la production de montres, la création de nouveaux prototypes et la mise en place de tous les tests pour être en mesure de vous donner la meilleure expérience. Les fonds supplémentaires seront utilisés pour contribuer à la production, mais également pour vous donner de nouveaux produits (nouveaux bracelets en cuir par exemple), et recruter de nouveaux membres dans notre équipe pour être en mesure d'accélérer les délais de livraison.
Pour faire de cette campagne un succès, il ya deux manières pour nous aider:

Une fois les 43 jours de la campagne terminée, les montres seront vendues sur notre site Internet au prix de vente normal (Retail Price)

column1: Merci de nous suivre et de diffuser la campagne grâce aux boutons de partages situés sous la vidéo. Suivez-nous sur Facebook, Twitter et Instagram pour des offres tels que des concours et photos exclusives.

column2: >Le principal risque était de ne pas financer cette campagne, c'est désormais chose faite grâce à vous tous. Nous souhaitons continuer cette aventure et atteindre notre nouvel objectif de 50 000€, cela nous permet de vous offrir plus d'options sur vos montres. Grâce à l'objectif de 10 000€, chaque contributeur recevra sa montre avec une plaque en métal sur la boite de rangement de sa montre.
>Nous sommes conscients qu'il y a beaucoup de projets, mais nous espérons que nos montres, la qualité et son design vous séduiront.

column1: Nous garantissons le début des envois durant Novembre 2014, l'estimation de réception est donc courant Novembre 2014, maximum Décembre 2014.
(Veuillez noter que la livraison en temps voulu des récompenses / contreparties est soumis à tous nos efforts et ne peut être garanti.)

Vous pouvez cependant nous aider à atteindre notre objectif en commandant nos produits et en partageant notre campagne, c'est gratuit, cela ne prend qu'un clic et vous pouvez également obtenir un remboursement sur votre produit via le programme de parrainage cité plus haut.

column2: >2- Livrez-vous dans le monde entier et combien ça coûte? Nous expédions dans le monde entier, la livraison est gratuite pour la France, et 10 € pour le reste du monde.
>3- Y a-t-il des frais supplémentaires? Votre pays peut mettre des taxes sur les douanes au cours de la livraison, merci de noter que nous ne pouvons pas être responsables de cela.

>4- Je voulais ce produit mais il est en rupture de stock, allez-vous faire de plus? Chaque pièce est limitée à 45, pour un total de 450 pièces dans le monde. Nous ne créerons pas de nouvelles pièces pour cette collection, c'est la beauté d'être fier d'avoir une édition limitée. Mais si nous récoltons assez d'argent, nous pourrons créer une toute nouvelle collection, donc n'oubliez pas de nous suivre sur Facebook, Twitter et Instagram pour vous tenir au courant des nouveautés.
>5- Pourquoi certaines images et la partie de droite sont-elles en Anglais ?

column1: Afin de toucher un public très large, nous avons décidé de proposer cette campagne dans le monde entier. La langue anglaise est la plus parlée dans le monde, et il nous a paru stratégique de proposer notre campagne en Anglais, et Français. La partie de droite qui correspond aux produits que vous souhaitez acheter est composée de la référence du modèle, de la couleur et du prix de la livraison. ""Retail price"" est le prix réel du produit une fois la campagne de financement terminée.
6- J'ai commandé, mais j'ai changé d'avis et je souhaite me faire rembourser, est-ce possible ?

Lorsque vous effectuez une contribution, nous utilisons l'argent pour payer la commission de Indiegogo, et de Paypal, les sous restants sont utilisés pour la fabrication de votre montre. Si vous ne voulez plus de la montre, nous perdons les frais de commission Indiegogo, Paypal, et nous avons lancé la production d'une montre pour rien. En d'autres termes, cela signifie que nous ne ferons pas de remboursements. En lien avec les conditions d'utilisation d'Indiegogo, nous n'effectuerons pas de remboursements. (Voir les conditions Indiegogo, rubrique Refunds)
7- J'ai une autre question, comment puis-je vous contacter ?
Contactez directement notre fondateur, par mail ici : alain.recuze@gmail.com , vous recevrez une réponse en 48h maximum !

Before presenting the campaign and our watches, we would like to thank all of you for being on this page and we hope you will love the project and would like to be part of this wonderful journey.

The GRIFFIN EMBLEM is more about the treasure than the griffin. We love the fact that griffin were perceived as heroes, but also as protectors of gold. On the logo, you can see the griffin is touching a diamond. This diamond is a reference to the treasure Griffins were fighting for. The word “emblem” is more a reference to the treasure than a synonym of ""logo.""

There is always one moment in your life that you decide to buy a high quality automatic watch that will last you more than a year. When this moment arrives in our life, we realize it is almost impossible for us to find it because of the budget. Some models were really nice, but way too expensive. This moment changed our life because it brings us an idea. This idea is why we created our own brand: GRIFFIN EMBLEM - a stylish and high quality automatic watch at an affordable price. We spent months working on details and on the design trying to bring the best materials and design to a single watch.

The brand concept of GRIFFIN EMBLEM insists on the principle of little quantity and high quality. We create a series of valuable limited edition mechanical watches by careful design, superior selection and artistic polish. We’ve worked very hard on this brand, and we want to be sure that you can have a watch that has :
A design that allows you to wear the watch in casual or professional clothes
The best affordable price for a watch of this quality
A beautiful watch without a battery (save the planet, say no to batteries)
We have five models, and each model divided into two colors. Each color will be limited in 45 pieces, for a total of 450 pieces.
All the models are SOLD OUT. THANK YOU
You can see 26 more pictures into the Gallery

All the GRIFFIN EMBLEM watches use the Japanese MIYOTA 82S series of mechanical automatic movements with exquisite workmanship and are held to high-quality standards. Both the material selection and assembling technicians have a good reputation. The 82S series, which was selected by GRIFFIN EMBLEM, was one of its masterpieces. The fantastic hollowed out and naked pendulum design combines with intricate carvings and show the manufacturing process - this makes the series’ movements look both beautiful and perfect.

All GRIFFIN EMBLEM watches are made of 316L stainless steel. 316L is a kind of steel that comes from the United States. It is the standard steel number of the ¨ASTM: American Society for Testing and Material.〃 Its corrosion resistance is very strong and the texture of it is pretty good as well. L means low carbon. It will have little impact on human skin and it is the only option for an advanced watch. The designers of GRIFFIN EMBLEM treat watches as artwork, and in addition we choose sophisticated Japanese mechanical movement. We also focus on the process of polishing
column2: its advanced technology of frosting and polishing makes the polish and texture of the watch fine and clear, and from there a strong three-dimensional appearance is formed.

column1: Each of GRIFFIN EMBLEM watch is equipped with an advanced leather strap, allowing you to not only appreciate its intricate craft, but also enjoy the comfortable feeling.
How will the funds be used ?

The funds we will receive will be used for following all processes during the production of the watches, creating new prototypes and doing all the tests that are able to give you the best experience. Any additional funds will be used to give you new product (all contributors will have a metal plate on the packaging thanks to the goal of 10,000€), create a new collection and recruit new members to our team to enable us to accelerate the delivery time and also create new collections if we raise enough.
How can you help GRIFFIN EMBLEM?
To make this campaign a success, there are two ways for you to help us:

Avant de présenter notre campagne et nos montres, nous souhaitons vous remercier d'être présent sur cette page et nous espérons que vous aimerez le projet, et que vous souhaiterez faire parti de cette aventure !

Il y a toujours un moment dans votre vie où vous décidez d'acheter un objet de qualité, dans notre cas, une vraie montre. Quelque chose de chic qui va durer plus d'un mois et qui ne traînera pas dans le bocal situé dans votre entrée. Lorsque ce moment est arrivé dans notre vie, nous avons réalisé qu'il était presque impossible pour nous de trouver une montre automatique à cause de notre budget. Ce moment a changé notre vie parce que cela nous a apporter une idée. Cette idée a été de créer notre propre marque, GRIFFIN EMBLEM, une montre élégante et luxueuse, mais à un prix abordable ! Nous avons passé des mois à travailler sur les détails et sur la conception pour essayer d'apporter les meilleurs matériaux associés à beau design, combinés dans une même montre. Ce qu'il nous manque ? Les fonds pour démarrer la production. Nous voulons que cette idée puisse se réaliser grâce à vous, ici sur Indiegogo.

Le concept de la marque de GRIFFIN EMBLEM est basé sur des produits limités en quantités mais de très bonne qualité. Nous avons pu créer une série de montres mécaniques, avec une conception soignée et une sélection de matériaux supérieurs. Nous avons travaillé très dur sur cette marque, et nous voulons être sûrs qu'en achetant notre produit, vous aurez une montre qui possède:
Un design qui vous permet de porter la montre avec des vêtements décontractés ou professionnels
Le meilleur prix sur le marché pour cette gamme de montres
Nous avons 5 modèles, chaque modèle divisé en 2 couleurs, chaque couleur sera limitée à 45 pièces, pour un total de 450 pièces.
Les modèles 1002-1, 1002-2, 1003-1, 1003-2, 1005-1, 1005-2,  1006-1 et 1006-2 sont en rupture de stock, et ne seront pas renouvelés (Ce sont des éditions limitées).
Rendez-vous plus haut dans la partie en anglais, ou Cliquez sur l'onglet Galerie situé en haut de la page, en dessous du titre du projet, pour voir de nombreuses photos des montres.

Toutes les montres GRIFFIN EMBLEM utilisent la série japonaise Miyota 82S de mouvements mécaniques automatiques, une exécution exquise et supervisée par des normes de haute qualité. Ce mouvement dispose d'une très bonne réputation, à la fois sur le choix des matériaux mais aussi sur les techniciens d'assemblage. La série 82S est l'une des plus belles oeuvres de Miyota (Citizen). La conception de pendule nu et libre, se combinent avec des sculptures complexes. La présence de joyaux expose de façon élégante son processus de fabrication. Cet ensemble donne des mouvements superbes, et parfaits. Les modèles RG-1001 à RG-1005 possèdent le mouvement 82S0 tandis que le modèle RG-1006 est équipé du 85S5.

Toutes les montres GRIFFIN EMBLEM sont faites d'acier inoxydable 316L. 316L est une référence destinée à l'acier aux État-Unis. La référence 316 provient de la société ""ASTM, American Society for Testing and Material"". Sa capacité de résistance à la corrosion est très forte et la texture de celui-ci est aussi très bonne. L signifie Low carbon. Il aura donc peu d'impact sur la peau humaine et il est la seule option disponible pour les montres complexes. Les designers de GRIFFIN EMBLEM  considèrent les montres comme des oeuvres d'art, en plus de choisir un mouvement mécanique japonais sophistiqué, ils mettent également l'accent sur le processus du vernissage, sur sa technologie de pointe de givre et de polissage, ce qui rend la texture de la vitre de la montre claire, qui lui permet un fort aspect tridimensionnel.

Chacune des montres GRIFFIN EMBLEM est equipée d'un bracelet en cuir de qualité, ce qui vous permet non seulement d'apprécier son artisanat complexe, mais aussi de profiter de la sensation de confort de celui-ci.
Comment les fonds récoltés seront-ils utilisés?

Les fonds que nous recevrons seront utilisés pour le démarrage de la production, également pour tout le processus au cours de la production de montres, la création de nouveaux prototypes et la mise en place de tous les tests pour être en mesure de vous donner la meilleure expérience. Les fonds supplémentaires seront utilisés pour contribuer à la production, mais également pour vous donner de nouveaux produits (nouveaux bracelets en cuir par exemple), et recruter de nouveaux membres dans notre équipe pour être en mesure d'accélérer les délais de livraison.
Pour faire de cette campagne un succès, il ya deux manières pour nous aider:
Contribuer au projet en envoyant de l'argent et / ou en commandant nos montres, pour nous aider à la production de notre rêve et ainsi recevoir votre montre.

Passez le mot grâce aux boutons de partage et parler du projet, ne soyez pas timide! Vous pouvez même obtenir un remboursement sur votre montre avec le programme de parrainage. Sachez également que ces prix sont exclusivement pour la campagne Indiegogo, ne manquez pas l'occasion de faire partie de l'histoire de GRlFFIN EMBLEM. Une fois les 43 jours de la campagne terminée, les montres seront vendues sur notre site Internet au prix de vente normal (Retail Price)

Merci de nous suivre et de diffuser la campagne grâce aux boutons de partages situés sous la vidéo. Suivez-nous sur Facebook, Twitter et Instagram pour des offres tels que des concours et photos exclusives.

Le principal risque était de ne pas financer cette campagne, c'est désormais chose faite grâce à vous tous. Nous souhaitons continuer cette aventure et atteindre notre nouvel objectif de 50 000€, cela nous permet de vous offrir plus d'options sur vos montres. Grâce à l'objectif de 10 000€, chaque contributeur recevra sa montre avec une plaque en métal sur la boite de rangement de sa montre.
Nous sommes conscients qu'il y a beaucoup de projets, mais nous espérons que nos montres, la qualité et son design vous séduiront.
Nous garantissons le début des envois durant Novembre 2014, l'estimation de réception est donc courant Novembre 2014, maximum Décembre 2014.
(Veuillez noter que la livraison en temps voulu des récompenses / contreparties est soumis à tous nos efforts et ne peut être garanti.)

Vous pouvez cependant nous aider à atteindre notre objectif en commandant nos produits et en partageant notre campagne, c'est gratuit, cela ne prend qu'un clic et vous pouvez également obtenir un remboursement sur votre produit via le programme de parrainage cité plus haut.
2- Livrez-vous dans le monde entier et combien ça coûte? Nous expédions dans le monde entier, la livraison est gratuite pour la France, et 10 € pour le reste du monde.
3- Y a-t-il des frais supplémentaires? Votre pays peut mettre des taxes sur les douanes au cours de la livraison, merci de noter que nous ne pouvons pas être responsables de cela.

4- Je voulais ce produit mais il est en rupture de stock, allez-vous faire de plus? Chaque pièce est limitée à 45, pour un total de 450 pièces dans le monde. Nous ne créerons pas de nouvelles pièces pour cette collection, c'est la beauté d'être fier d'avoir une édition limitée. Mais si nous récoltons assez d'argent, nous pourrons créer une toute nouvelle collection, donc n'oubliez pas de nous suivre sur Facebook, Twitter et Instagram pour vous tenir au courant des nouveautés.
5- Pourquoi certaines images et la partie de droite sont-elles en Anglais ?

Afin de toucher un public très large, nous avons décidé de proposer cette campagne dans le monde entier. La langue anglaise est la plus parlée dans le monde, et il nous a paru stratégique de proposer notre campagne en Anglais, et Français. La partie de droite qui correspond aux produits que vous souhaitez acheter est composée de la référence du modèle, de la couleur et du prix de la livraison. ""Retail price"" est le prix réel du produit une fois la campagne de financement terminée.
6- J'ai commandé, mais j'ai changé d'avis et je souhaite me faire rembourser, est-ce possible ?

Lorsque vous effectuez une contribution, nous utilisons l'argent pour payer la commission de Indiegogo, et de Paypal, les sous restants sont utilisés pour la fabrication de votre montre. Si vous ne voulez plus de la montre, nous perdons les frais de commission Indiegogo, Paypal, et nous avons lancé la production d'une montre pour rien. En d'autres termes, cela signifie que nous ne ferons pas de remboursements. En lien avec les conditions d'utilisation d'Indiegogo, nous n'effectuerons pas de remboursements. (Voir les conditions Indiegogo, rubrique Refunds)
7- J'ai une autre question, comment puis-je vous contacter ?
Contactez directement notre fondateur, par mail ici : alain.recuze@gmail.com , vous recevrez une réponse en 48h maximum !",67.0,0,"4 Campaigns
Now that we've talked about how the CVs are comfortable... let's talk style, let's talk fashion!  Here's a short video of what we've been up to:
We received some great questions about the function of CVs.  Check out our short video update:
We are excited to see the great interest and feedback from some fans.  Here is a short video to keep you up to date:
Greetings Indiegogos!  We are very pleased to début our first generation of glasses, renamed CVsTM.  The unique design of CVs helps to solve the age old question “where did I put my glasses?”
When not in use, CVs collapse to the perfect size with very little effort.  Unlike traditional glasses, CVs’ sides gently rest on the temple versus over the ear.

This design is TempleRestTM technology that is manufactured from a special memory polymer.  The goal of the TempleRest is to promote comfort and provide the stability to keep CVs in place.  Combine the TempleRests with a specially designed hinge in the bridge of the CVs and they fold into a practical size when not in use.

By connecting the CVs to a retractable reel, which can clip to your shirt pocket, collar, ID lanyard, or inside pocket of your jacket, the age old question and frustration becomes a thing of the past.  The reel is attached by a simple snap and can be removed as needed.  A “retract” button on the reel holds them close at hand when you are not wearing them.
If you don’t want to use the reel, we have a great custom designed carrying case that clips to your belt.
The initial release of CVs will include three very stylish frame styles in three colors and lenses ranging in strength from 1.0 to 2.5.

Our founder Robert Rochford, is a 28 year veteran of the United States Navy and designed CVs out of a need to resolve the frustration associated with making reading glasses more convenient.  What we are presenting to you was born out of frustration and will revolutionize not only how you wear eyewear, but how you carry them with you.

Look at the glasses that Ben Franklin wore.  Do they look familiar?  He invented bifocals over 200 years ago and yet the basic design of glasses themselves is still the same!  To solve this problem elegantly, I knew that we needed to reinvent glasses altogether.

Our company has completed the prototyping and now seeks support through crowdfunding.  When we reach our 100% funding goal, we will deliberately march from prototyping to full rate production.  The needed funds will support the high quality injection molds to produce the anticipated volume needed and manufacturing infrastructure to help us succeed right out of the gate.  We decided to start with Reader CVs, but with great excitement plan to have Sun CVs that have no prescription and are for everybody out before Christmas.

Most people who use reading glasses reached a point in their lives, normally around the age of 40, where their ability to read newspapers, books, or a computer screen becomes hampered as their eyes can’t focus up close anymore.  However, because reading glasses are not normally worn all of the time, there is a moment of frustration when you find yourself somewhere where your glasses are not.

CVI’s challenge was to combine the usefulness of glasses with the convenience of having them with you when you need them.  The driving force behind their design was based on the aggravation of them not being handy.  Most who wear reading glass try not to remember how many times they left the house without their glasses only to find that they can’t read the menu because the font is too small or at the supermarket struggling to read a label.  Or how about just trying to read or send a text message from their cell phone.

The challenges that faced our engineers were to overcome two obstacles.  First, how do you keep CVs with you without wearing them around your neck on a chain while still keep them close at hand?  The second issue that needed to be addressed
column2: the size of traditional glasses don’t collapse into a convenient space.  The arms that stick over your ears and the face of glasses don’t fold.  Not to mention that traditional glasses sitting on your ears hour after hour can be bothersome.

column1: The most common solution today is folding eyeglasses.  They have numerous folding mechanisms to open and close them, tend to be flimsy, are bulky enough that it’s difficult for you to keep them with you, and still sit on your ears.

Folding the glasses was indeed part of the solution, but we needed to challenge the basic paradigm of how glasses are designed and worn today.  The result is the new glasses would need to effortlessly collapse and be “at the ready” when you didn’t need them
column2: and they would be with you when you did need them.  We have heard so many times, “I hate to have to walk across the room, up the stairs, out to the car, or borrow someone else’s glasses from the next table over just to read something!”

column1:
The size of CVs, when closed, was key to the overall design and in particular,
 how the sides were designed.  But size was not the only consideration.  Stability of the CVs when worn is in large part due to the technical design and the dimensions of the TempleRest.  The gentle spring action of its memory polymer provides just enough pressure to gently hold them in place.  When you combine the stability of the TempleRest with the specially designed hinge in the bridge, the whole thing collapses with very little help.
The final element to solve the “convenience conundrum” is the retractable reel.  The reel attaches to the side of the TempleRest by use of a simple
column2: title=""Engineering Drawing Fig 3""/>snap, which can be removed as needed.  On the back of the reel is a pressure clamp that slides onto just about anything you’re wearing.  When the user pulls the CVs away from the reel, the nylon cord remains out until the “retract” button is pushed.  When not needed the reel holds the CVs in place.  If the wearer doesn’t want to use the
column4: title=""CV Holster""/> reel, they can easily be stored in their custom designed carrying case that clips to your belt.  Additionally, our engineers are in the process of redesigning the reel to offer additional attachment options and to improve the overall aesthetics.  We expect this to be out sometime early next year.

column1: We changed eyewear and created CVs™!  These are stylish, comfortable, and really cool eyewear.  The change from traditional over the ear glasses to CVs that rest on the temples is exciting, new, and innovative.  Based on the level of interest already and the trending towards convenience in today’s gadget savvy world, CVs are a welcomed revolutionary change to the norm.

CVI’s engineering team is excited to already be designing Sun CVsTM that should début by Christmas and Prescription CVsTM should be available early
 next year.  We are excited to watch where this journey of CVs take us and strive to build a quality product that is Changing EyewearSM.  You will never wonder where you left your glasses again with CVs clipped to your shirt!
Now, we have started off with Reader CVs but are really excited to also be working hard on
column2: >Sun CVs and these don’t have any prescription to them and are for everybody
column3: and not far behind that will be Prescription CVs.  To get there, we need your help.  We’ve got some great pledge levels with great offers for you to look over.  We hope you’ll find something you like.  Your assistance will help us get through all of the production level preparations including the high quality injection molds needed to produce a high quality product and the manufacturing infrastructure to succeed.  And oh by the way, these are made in the United States.

column1: We absolutely love CVs and are passionate about changing the landscape for eyewear.  I hope you’ll help us on this journey.  We are already looking at the next generation of CVs and we are going to ask for your input to help guide us through this revolution of Changing Eyewear.  If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate.  Thanks for your help and thanks for your consideration.

column2: >Q.  What are the details of the $1650 pledge level?  A.  This pledge level promises to be a blast!  There is no minimum number of pledgers for this level but there is a maximum of 75, so better hurry.  We will have the kickoff celebration with as many pledgers that sign up.  The flight must originate in the continental U.S. (48 States).  International pledgers will be reimbursed a maximum of $400 for the flight.  Transportation to the nearest major airport and parking are not included.  Flight cost is for the pledger only.  Transportation costs if you wish to bring a guest or your family are not included.  Shuttle from Orlando airport to the hotel
column3: >is covered for everyone.  All flights will be estimated using Kayak.com plus 10%.  A voucher will be sent to the pledger to pay for the flight.  All reservations are the responsibility of the pledger.  If you live a reasonable distance (~175 miles) from Orlando, you are expected to drive and we will provide a voucher for gas reimbursement (estimated).  Hotel room will be booked based on single or double occupancy.  Any additional costs associated with the hotel room are the responsibility of the pledger.  The hotel room cost is for Saturday night (kickoff celebration) only.  If the pledger wishes to arrive early and/or stay late, Disney has offered a special room rate for up to three days before Saturday and three days after Saturday including special discounts on park passes.  Cost for the room before or after Saturday is the responsibility of the pledger.  Kickoff celebration is for the pledger and one guest.

column2: >Q.  What are the details of the $60 Sun CV pledge level?  A.  This is also a great pledge level that will help us choose the frame styles for our debut of Sun CVs.  Sun CVs don’t have any prescription and are designed for everybody!
column3: >BONUS:  We will randomly select one pledger from this level to join us for the CV kickoff celebration and to meet the CV Team!  We’ll fly you to Orlando and put you up in a luxury hotel at Disney.  There must be a minimum of 40 of the 75 pledgers at the $1650 level.  The selection for the pledger to join us in Orlando will be videotaped and available for viewing by link from our website and on YouTube.  The same restrictions that apply for the $1650 pledge level also apply at this level for the one selected to join us in Orlando.

column2: >Q.  Will they stay put on my face?  A.  Absolutely!  TempleRest technology ensures a comfortable and stable fit.  TempleRest is manufactured out of a special memory polymer that gently rests on your temple and provides the stability to keep the CVs in place.  The benefit of the TempleRest™ design is the elimination of those long arms that sit on your ears and don’t conveniently collapse.
>Q.  Will they hurt my temples?  A.  No.  Under normal circumstances, CVs with TempleRest technology will gently rest on the temples and are comfortable for all day wear.

>Q.  How does the reel attached to my clothing?  A.  The reel has a pressure clip (like one you would attach to a pocket) that will securely hold the CVs in place when not in use.  The clip will also hold the reel securely while you are wearing the CVs.  Our engineers are in the process of redesigning the reel to offer several options to secure the CVs.  More to follow on that…

>Q.  Are the Sun CVs for everyone?  A.  Absolutely!  Sun CVs do not have any prescription or lens magnification at all.  Sun CVs are intended to provide a new and exciting look for eyewear wore outside.  These will probably become the coolest thing out there.

>Q.  Are the lenses scratch proof?  A.  Yes!  The lenses are made from a hard and durable plastic (polycarbonate) and should be able to withstand normal day to day use.  Like any pair of conventional glasses, over time and if misused, the lenses can become damaged.  If the lenses are damaged, we recommend replacing them immediately.

>Q.  Do the lenses provide UV protection?  A.  Yes!  CVs lenses are provide protection from UVA and UVB.  Although the protection is not the same as wearing sunglasses, CVI recommends wearing Sun CVs when outdoors (see how we did that).

>Q.  Do CVs come in any other frame designs or offer any additional lens options?  A.  Remember this is a revolution, we will need some additional time to take over the world.  We are already working on adding exciting designs and colors as well as additional options on lenses.  We hope to release CVs 2.0 during the fall of 2013 and early in 2014.  Buying the current versions of CVs will help us cover the expense of expanding the CV line of products… more to follow.

>Q.  Is the founder, Bob Rochford, still on active duty?  A.  Yes.  Bob is intimately involved with every aspect of business development and continues to serve the U.S. Navy as a Captain on active duty.  The CVI staff keeps him informed of all day to day operations and we wait for him to join us full time when he retires soon from the Navy.

>Q.  Do CVs come with the carrying case?  A.  No.  Unfortunately, we are not able to offer the carrying case as part of the Indiegogo pledge levels.  You can visit our website at www.ChangingEyewear.com to order a carrying case for your CVs.  Details are offered on the website.  The carrying case  is also very cool.

>Q.  What if I need reader lenses at a stronger strength than you are offering?  A.  Once you have signed up for a pledge level, send us an email and we will provide you additional information.  Depending on the quantity for your particular strength, a small service charge may apply.

>Q.  Are CVs for everyone?  A.  CVs were designed to fit faces of all different shapes and sizes.  The gentle spring motion from the TempleRests may help fit CVs to those with a more narrow face or those with a wider structure.  CVs are not intended for children, although, we are planning on a line of CV products for younger folks.

>Q.  Are there other options for attaching the reel to my clothing?  A.  Not yet.  It is a priority for us.  Our engineers are in the process of redesigning the reel to offer additional attachment options and to improve the overall aesthetics.  We expect this to be out sometime later this year.
>Still have a question?  Please don't hesitate to shoot it to us at CV.Info@ChangingEyewear.com
>Have a comment?  You are welcome to visit our website at www.ChangingEyewear.com and click on the Blog or ""Like"" us on facebook (search for ""CVs"").

THIS IS WHERE YOU COME IN!
