column2: and not far behind that will be Prescription CVs.  To get there, we need your help.  We’ve got some great pledge levels with great offers for you to look over.  We hope you’ll find something you like.  Your assistance will help us get through all of the production level preparations including the high quality injection molds needed to produce a high quality product and the manufacturing infrastructure to succeed.  And oh by the way, these are made in the United States.

column1: We absolutely love CVs and are passionate about changing the landscape for eyewear.  I hope you’ll help us on this journey.  We are already looking at the next generation of CVs and we are going to ask for your input to help guide us through this revolution of Changing Eyewear.  If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate.  Thanks for your help and thanks for your consideration.

Q.  What are the details of the $1650 pledge level?  A.  This pledge level promises to be a blast!  There is no minimum number of pledgers for this level but there is a maximum of 75, so better hurry.  We will have the kickoff celebration with as many pledgers that sign up.  The flight must originate in the continental U.S. (48 States).  International pledgers will be reimbursed a maximum of $400 for the flight.  Transportation to the nearest major airport and parking are not included.  Flight cost is for the pledger only.  Transportation costs if you wish to bring a guest or your family are not included.  Shuttle from Orlando airport to the hotel is covered for everyone.  All flights will be estimated using Kayak.com plus 10%.  A voucher will be sent to the pledger to pay for the flight.  All reservations are the responsibility of the pledger.  If you live a reasonable distance (~175 miles) from Orlando, you are expected to drive and we will provide a voucher for gas reimbursement (estimated).  Hotel room will be booked based on single or double occupancy.  Any additional costs associated with the hotel room are the responsibility of the pledger.  The hotel room cost is for Saturday night (kickoff celebration) only.  If the pledger wishes to arrive early and/or stay late, Disney has offered a special room rate for up to three days before Saturday and three days after Saturday including special discounts on park passes.  Cost for the room before or after Saturday is the responsibility of the pledger.  Kickoff celebration is for the pledger and one guest.

Q.  What are the details of the $60 Sun CV pledge level?  A.  This is also a great pledge level that will help us choose the frame styles for our debut of Sun CVs.  Sun CVs don’t have any prescription and are designed for everybody!  BONUS:  We will randomly select one pledger from this level to join us for the CV kickoff celebration and to meet the CV Team!  We’ll fly you to Orlando and put you up in a luxury hotel at Disney.  There must be a minimum of 40 of the 75 pledgers at the $1650 level.  The selection for the pledger to join us in Orlando will be videotaped and available for viewing by link from our website and on YouTube.  The same restrictions that apply for the $1650 pledge level also apply at this level for the one selected to join us in Orlando.

Q.  Will they stay put on my face?  A.  Absolutely!  TempleRest technology ensures a comfortable and stable fit.  TempleRest is manufactured out of a special memory polymer that gently rests on your temple and provides the stability to keep the CVs in place.  The benefit of the TempleRest™ design is the elimination of those long arms that sit on your ears and don’t conveniently collapse.
Q.  Will they hurt my temples?  A.  No.  Under normal circumstances, CVs with TempleRest technology will gently rest on the temples and are comfortable for all day wear.

Q.  How does the reel attached to my clothing?  A.  The reel has a pressure clip (like one you would attach to a pocket) that will securely hold the CVs in place when not in use.  The clip will also hold the reel securely while you are wearing the CVs.  Our engineers are in the process of redesigning the reel to offer several options to secure the CVs.  More to follow on that…

Q.  Are the Sun CVs for everyone?  A.  Absolutely!  Sun CVs do not have any prescription or lens magnification at all.  Sun CVs are intended to provide a new and exciting look for eyewear wore outside.  These will probably become the coolest thing out there.

Q.  Are the lenses scratch proof?  A.  Yes!  The lenses are made from a hard and durable plastic (polycarbonate) and should be able to withstand normal day to day use.  Like any pair of conventional glasses, over time and if misused, the lenses can become damaged.  If the lenses are damaged, we recommend replacing them immediately.

Q.  Do the lenses provide UV protection?  A.  Yes!  CVs lenses are provide protection from UVA and UVB.  Although the protection is not the same as wearing sunglasses, CVI recommends wearing Sun CVs when outdoors (see how we did that).

Q.  Do CVs come in any other frame designs or offer any additional lens options?  A.  Remember this is a revolution, we will need some additional time to take over the world.  We are already working on adding exciting designs and colors as well as additional options on lenses.  We hope to release CVs 2.0 during the fall of 2013 and early in 2014.  Buying the current versions of CVs will help us cover the expense of expanding the CV line of products… more to follow.

Q.  Is the founder, Bob Rochford, still on active duty?  A.  Yes.  Bob is intimately involved with every aspect of business development and continues to serve the U.S. Navy as a Captain on active duty.  The CVI staff keeps him informed of all day to day operations and we wait for him to join us full time when he retires soon from the Navy.

Q.  Do CVs come with the carrying case?  A.  No.  Unfortunately, we are not able to offer the carrying case as part of the Indiegogo pledge levels.  You can visit our website at www.ChangingEyewear.com to order a carrying case for your CVs.  Details are offered on the website.  The carrying case  is also very cool.

Q.  What if I need reader lenses at a stronger strength than you are offering?  A.  Once you have signed up for a pledge level, send us an email and we will provide you additional information.  Depending on the quantity for your particular strength, a small service charge may apply.

Q.  Are CVs for everyone?  A.  CVs were designed to fit faces of all different shapes and sizes.  The gentle spring motion from the TempleRests may help fit CVs to those with a more narrow face or those with a wider structure.  CVs are not intended for children, although, we are planning on a line of CV products for younger folks.

Q.  Are there other options for attaching the reel to my clothing?  A.  Not yet.  It is a priority for us.  Our engineers are in the process of redesigning the reel to offer additional attachment options and to improve the overall aesthetics.  We expect this to be out sometime later this year.
Still have a question?  Please don't hesitate to shoot it to us at CV.Info@ChangingEyewear.com
Have a comment?  You are welcome to visit our website at www.ChangingEyewear.com and click on the Blog or ""Like"" us on facebook (search for ""CVs"").",9.0,0,"1 Campaign

What is mad mind wear?

Mad Mind Wear is a small project started by our passion for urban art, underground culture, music and graphic design. It Was born as an idea in a small room and so we embarked on this adventure of creating Mad Mind Wear. This is a clothing brand that not only we represent, but one that also stands for people with dreams and a desire to turn them into reality.
We are a young group of designers, artists, and photographers from different parts of Europe. We are people with different points of view but with the same passion for Mad Mind.
Mad Mind Wear is not just a clothing brand. Through mad mind, we want to share art projects for people committed to what mad mind represents. We do not like the commercial aspects of fashion
column2: we believe that everyone should wear something that represents their unique selves, and not what represents the mainstream media.

column1: All of our products are unique and limited editions, produced in a traditional and individualized way .
We are working with the best materials brought from Los Angeles and with manual production processes that provide traditional quality.

There are loads of hidden Mad Mind messages you can find in places all over the world. We represent an eclectic group of people, and have created art in each one of their disciplines, including skate, bmx, graffiti, urban art, music, design and more ...

My name is Kristy Chong, owner and developer of Australian Made Modibodi underwear, www.modibodi.com.au

Modibodi is stylish underwear designed to resist sweat, stains and leaks. Modibodi is putting the function back into fashion and giving women a more eco-friendly way to manage their light bladder leaks, plus provide them with some extra security to help out on those tricky days eg. periods, hot days, working out.

The underwear uses both high performance fabrics that prevent perspiration odour and keep you dry. The underpants include our patent pending super slim (.3mm), super absorbent (over 5ml), stain resistant liner. We called it 'Modifier Technology' and the liners works to wick, absorb and evaporate moisture.
Modibodi are not bulky, and to wear they are almost similar to regular underwear but with plenty more benefits.
Modibodi is great for - menstruation, pregnancy, mums, menopause, active women and hot days, or for those who just want underwear you can wear from morning to night no worries.

As a mother and active person I owned plenty of pairs of cotton and synthetic underwear, but after one too many 'oh no' moments I came to the realisation that my underwear, while it was pretty, was failing me. The thought of wearing uncomfortable and environmentally damaging disposable liners did not seem right and had quite a negative impact on my ego. I started to wonder just how many women had this problem.
- 1 in 8 young women have urinary leaks
- 1 in 3 women who have been through childbirth experience urinary leaks
- Most women have experienced period leaks
- Most women perspire when working out and on hot days

column2: >I decided it was high time that women of all ages had access to a more comfortable, eco-friendly and stylish option than the disposable liner and a better alternative to underwear that was failing them.

column1: By contributing to my campaign you will be working with me to
1. GIVE WOMEN THEIR CONFIDENCE AND COMFORT BACK
2. HELP THE ENVIRONMENT BY REDUCING THE USE OF DISPOSABLE LINERS

column2: >3. CHANGE UNDERWEAR FOR GOOD. By providing women with both a fashionable and functional underwear that wont fail them. Maybe we might start a movement to change fashion in general. I mean why shouldnt our clothes not only look great but perform great as well.

column1: I have currently invested some of my own personal funds to get a small product range out onto the market. I am working really hard to find stockists, get media coverage and sell the range at markets.

But to really take this further I need some funding for my marketing and advertising efforts. I would love to market these on bathroom panels in shopping centres, to develop a slick video, better photography, and of course to buy more stock (fabric, care labels, swing tags, packaging and cut and sew).
Basically I would use half of these funds for marketing and the other half for stock.

Your contribution means alot to me. I believe there should be more to clothing than fashion and that we should constantly seek to find more eco-friendly solutions than the options that surround us. Modibodi does both. It provides women with a stylish solution that has great functionality while at the same time removing the need for the environmentally damaging and uncomfortable disposable liner.

column2: >It is important to remember that 1 in 8 young women have urinary leaks, 1 in 3 women who have been through childbirth experience urinary leaks, most women have experienced period leaks and perspiring. The positive impact on a woman's self-esteem my brand could have is far-reaching, and yet to have a positive impact on the environment at the same time is pretty cool I reckon.

column1: If you cannot contribute I would absolutely love for you to:
-  Like my FB page http://www.facebook.com/pages/Modibodi/644960068851740 or follow us on Twitter @Modibodi
- Share this Indiegogo campaign with your friends and family eg. post on your FB page, Tweet about it
- Let all your female friends know about www.modibodi.com.au
My name is Kristy Chong, owner and developer of Australian Made Modibodi underwear, www.modibodi.com.au

Modibodi is stylish underwear designed to resist sweat, stains and leaks. Modibodi is putting the function back into fashion and giving women a more eco-friendly way to manage their light bladder leaks, plus provide them with some extra security to help out on those tricky days eg. periods, hot days, working out.

The underwear uses both high performance fabrics that prevent perspiration odour and keep you dry. The underpants include our patent pending super slim (.3mm), super absorbent (over 5ml), stain resistant liner. We called it 'Modifier Technology' and the liners works to wick, absorb and evaporate moisture.
Modibodi are not bulky, and to wear they are almost similar to regular underwear but with plenty more benefits.
Modibodi is great for - menstruation, pregnancy, mums, menopause, active women and hot days, or for those who just want underwear you can wear from morning to night no worries.

As a mother and active person I owned plenty of pairs of cotton and synthetic underwear, but after one too many 'oh no' moments I came to the realisation that my underwear, while it was pretty, was failing me. The thought of wearing uncomfortable and environmentally damaging disposable liners did not seem right and had quite a negative impact on my ego. I started to wonder just how many women had this problem.
- 1 in 8 young women have urinary leaks
- 1 in 3 women who have been through childbirth experience urinary leaks
- Most women have experienced period leaks
- Most women perspire when working out and on hot days

I decided it was high time that women of all ages had access to a more comfortable, eco-friendly and stylish option than the disposable liner and a better alternative to underwear that was failing them.
By contributing to my campaign you will be working with me to
1. GIVE WOMEN THEIR CONFIDENCE AND COMFORT BACK
2. HELP THE ENVIRONMENT BY REDUCING THE USE OF DISPOSABLE LINERS

3. CHANGE UNDERWEAR FOR GOOD. By providing women with both a fashionable and functional underwear that wont fail them. Maybe we might start a movement to change fashion in general. I mean why shouldnt our clothes not only look great but perform great as well.
What We Need & What You Get
I have currently invested some of my own personal funds to get a small product range out onto the market. I am working really hard to find stockists, get media coverage and sell the range at markets.

But to really take this further I need some funding for my marketing and advertising efforts. I would love to market these on bathroom panels in shopping centres, to develop a slick video, better photography, and of course to buy more stock (fabric, care labels, swing tags, packaging and cut and sew).
Basically I would use half of these funds for marketing and the other half for stock.

Your contribution means alot to me. I believe there should be more to clothing than fashion and that we should constantly seek to find more eco-friendly solutions than the options that surround us. Modibodi does both. It provides women with a stylish solution that has great functionality while at the same time removing the need for the environmentally damaging and uncomfortable disposable liner.

It is important to remember that 1 in 8 young women have urinary leaks, 1 in 3 women who have been through childbirth experience urinary leaks, most women have experienced period leaks and perspiring. The positive impact on a woman's self-esteem my brand could have is far-reaching, and yet to have a positive impact on the environment at the same time is pretty cool I reckon.
If you cannot contribute I would absolutely love for you to:
-  Like my FB page http://www.facebook.com/pages/Modibodi/644960068851740 or follow us on Twitter @Modibodi
- Share this Indiegogo campaign with your friends and family eg. post on your FB page, Tweet about it
- Let all your female friends know about www.modibodi.com.au",3.0,0,"1 Campaign
Alpha is light  - Unlike other bottle openers that are normally
made from Stainless Steel, Alpha is made from strong Air Craft Grade Aluminum. As a result, Alpha is 75% lighter than others Stainless Steel
Machined from Solid Air Craft Aluminum - Air Craft Grade Aluminum is super strong, light, and is known for its weight-to-strength
ratio. One of the best things about this metal is that it has memory,
this means you can bend the side opening of Alpha and it will just bend
back to where it was-- how cool is that?
Hand cut, hand stamped leather tab - We use thick hand-cut
Italian leather, then we hand-stamp each piece. You can simply write
your contact info on your leather tab in case you lose your keys.
Designed and Crafted in Virginia, USA - We believe in creating
jobs within the community and that's exactly what we are doing with our small
business. We also love quality first products, and that's what Alpha brings to you. You'll feel proud putting it in your pocket everyday.
Alpha is handy - Many bottle openers are bulky or simply aren't
nice enough for you to carry them in your pocket. You can change this
with Alpha and carry a fashionable accessory that becomes very handy-
especially when your enjoying your favorite beverages.

Lifetime Warranty - Alpha's for life.  That's right.  Each Alpha carries a lifetime warranty to cover breakage.

Most everybody hates to add bulk to
their keychain. If you're an enthusiast when it comes to enjoying life's simple pleasures, but live a lifestyle that's on
the go, Alpha is perfect for you. It's super thin and light! Loop it around your
belt to lighten your pockets when you go out, all while adding to your

style.

Simple and smart with no bulk

Personalize your keychain and never lose it!

It is very common for us to lose our keys. Never worry again. You can get your Alpha with a thick hand cut leather tab which allows you to write your name and number in case you forget your keys. 

In or out you will love it!

Each leather tab is cut and embossed by hand

Available in many colors to fit your style

Hard coat is also a choice for those who live more on the

wild side. You're going to love your new accessory!


We already have Alpha in stock and more are currently being manufactured. This will ensure a timely delivery of your products after the campaign is over. We have a goal to raise enough to funds to start our business and create jobs! We can't wait, and no words can describe our passions for making this dream a real business. Everyone has a passion for quality, our dream is to put it in your pocket.

Current machining of Alpha

Forever Made with Pride.

When you pledge for this campaign, you're getting more than just a material item. We are working as hard as we can to help our community out by keeping production 100% local.  This allows us to inspect every Alpha we make while providing our families and friends with consistent work. We believe anyone in the world would appreciate a quality made product, that's exactly why we created Alpha.

We can't wait to see how you rock your Alpha

Indiegogo and YOU

We have a great relationship with our current manufacturer that we have been working with. Now it's time to offer different products and expand. To do this we need to buy our own CNC machine. This is where WE NEED YOU and your support. Of course we aren't just asking for it, we are delivering quality crafted fashionable keychains for your pledges.


Take rein over a favorite past-time

True story behind Team Alpha:
It was a sunny day in Yorktown, Virginia. I went fishing with my
friend at close by river. We brought an essential item for fishing:
Beer. Unfortunately we forgot to bring a bottle opener. Well we opened
the bottles although we broke one of the tops without an opener. Who
likes to waste a perfectly cold beer? Later, my friend and I got into
conversation about why people don't carry such a tool around anymore.
We came to the conclusion that prior keychain bottle openers were
unattractive because of their the size, design, weight, as well as a
number of other things. With the skills I have acquired from working
with metals, I knew I could create a convenient bottle opener that

offers strength and elegance in one package.

Fishing in Yorktown, VA.

UPDATE: Wow! We've reached £500, thank you so much! This means I can fund the last parts of my website, buy supplies for the start of my clothing and accessories ranges and fabrics for my home-wares. This also means the illustrated pendants will be making a comeback very soon! Plus lots more supplies and fun stuff for VelvetVolcano!
Can we do even better? It would be utterly amazing if we could make it to £1000, then I would be able to start work on and release my two side projects.
If we can go even further than that, I would be able to fund equipment like a high quality sewing machine/over-locker to take VelvetVolcano to an even higher level :).

I cannot express just how much I appreciate your help in sharing and contributing, it really means so much. VelvetVolcano is my baby and has really changed my life (you all have helped change my life), your support over the last 4 years has made such a difference to me as a person and I am so happy to have such wonderful people in my life (whether you're a friend made through VelvetVolcano or a distant supporter of my work - thank you, thank you, thank you!). Thank you!
column2:
>*****************

I have been running VelvetVolcano solely for almost 4 years now, it's been an amazing experience and I cannot thank my customers and fans enough for helping me to get where I am :). I love my work and it's great to be able to be creative within my job.

I started VV while very ill with chronic illness, i'm still recovering and have been doing a lot better the last 2 years, but I do have periods of 'remission'. When I started VV it was without any funding and with very little money as I was physically unable to get a 'standard' job, I kept building VV with the money I was making but without any additional funding, it was very difficult to expand the brand any further.
Since then, while trying to find a balance between keeping myself well and building my business, every penny has been going straight back into my business and to making sure i'm well enough to continue it.

I have many plans to build VelvetVolcano, but without any additional funding, they will not be possible, so hopefully this campaign can be beneficial to both of us :).

My plans include:
Finally completing and releasing the VelvetVolcano website
Expanding the VelvetVolcano brand with new products - Homewares (including crystal encrusted pieces / cushions, blankets etc inspired by VelvetVolcano favourites), Clothing and Accessories (embroidered patches, custom jackets/vests, bags, gloves and scarves etc)
The return of the popular illustrated pendants (including anatomical designs, horror characters and custom options)
Releasing two secret side projects that i've been planning for a while behind the scenes inspired by Fruit and Gothic Romance.

Of course all my plans (some not even detailed here) will require more funding than I have stated in this campaign, but this will definitely get me started and would mean huge changes for my business :).

What We Need &
column3:
What You Get
  • Every single penny raised with this campaign will go straight into VelvetVolcano. It will pay for the last required funds for the website, required fabrics and other supplies for cushions, gloves and scarves, funds to commission embroidered patches, more supplies for the side projects and any leftover funds will go to advertising, packaging and promotional materials (like stickers :) ).

    The more money received, the more new products i'll be able to offer and the further VelvetVolcano will be able to expand :).

column1:
The Impact

£500, though it may not seem a great deal to some, would be huge for an independently run small business like VelvetVolcano and self-employed designer like me. As well as starting VV with no funding and little money, I have never borrowed or taken out a loan, and unfortunately never had the opportunity to save so my ideas have all been halted, trying to keep my head above water.

With your help I can make my dreams and ideas reality and provide you with MORE cute, spooky, sparkly (and not so sparkly) goodies! :)

Other Ways You Can Help

I appreciate that times are hard for everyone and not everyone will be able to contribute, but there are still ways you can help :) -

  • Please help share this campaign and get the word out, the more people that know, the more funds I may be able to raise - this is hugely important! :)
    You can do this by using the Indiegogo share tools and sharing the link with your friends - please share it far and wide :).

    Thank you so much for reading and contributing if you can! :)

It will pay for the last required funds for the website, required fabrics and other supplies for cushions, gloves and scarves, funds to commission embroidered patches, more supplies for the side projects and any leftover funds will go to advertising, packaging and promotional materials (like stickers :) ).The more money received, the more new products i'll be able to offer and the further VelvetVolcano will be able to expand :).

The Impact£500, though it may not seem a great deal to some, would be huge for an independently run small business like VelvetVolcano and self-employed designer like me. As well as starting VV with no funding and little money, I have never borrowed or taken out a loan, and unfortunately never had the opportunity to save so my ideas have all been halted, trying to keep my head above water. With your help I can make my dreams and ideas reality and provide you with MORE cute, spooky, sparkly (and not so sparkly) goodies! :)Other Ways You Can HelpI appreciate that times are hard for everyone and not everyone will be able to contribute, but there are still ways you can help :) -Please help share this campaign and get the word out, the more people that know, the more funds I may be able to raise - this is hugely important! :)You can do this by using the Indiegogo share tools and sharing the link with your friends - please share it far and wide :).Thank you so much for reading and contributing if you can! :)",0.0,0,"2 Campaigns
Fiona's Parents Are Shipping Her Off To Europe For The Summer

Fiona is a 20-year old rising sophomore Fashion Design student at Parsons the New School for Design in NYC.  While home on spring break, her mother, Sunny, decided Fiona needs to see the world. Less than a month later, Fiona's flight has been booked and she is set to depart NY on May 16th (before her classes are even over!).
Fiona needs to experience life outside of the US!  She needs to see the wonders of the world!
For the first time ever FIONA IS LEAVING THE COUNTRY.  She will go on a two month adventure.  It will be the trip of a lifetime.
Imagine all of the great things she will create in her upcoming year of design school with this amazing experience.  The inspiration will be life changining.  She will return a new woman.
Be a Part of Her Artistic Journey

You will be glad you did.  This will be worth every penny when you can say ""Fiona, the amazing [fill in the blank]?  Yes, I helped her get to Europe back in 2013.  Look at how incredibly well she is doing now.  I was a part of that.  I helped make that happen!""

Fiona's parents have paid for her round-trip tickets and her monthly train passes.  Now she needs extra funding to help pay for food and places to stay.  Giver her peace of mind.  She can be easily overwhelmed.
Fiona chose $2300, becasue she originally wanted $2000, but there are fees/deductions...  :]

Reykjavik, Iceland
London, England
Paris, France
Bordeaux, France
Madrid, Spain
Barcelona, Spain
Marseille, France
Nice, France
Milan, Italy
Florence, Italy
Rome, Italy
Venice, Italy
Budapest, Hungary
Vienna, Austria
Munich, Germany
Frankfurt, Germany
Brussels, Belgium
Amsterdam, Holland
Copenhagen, Denmark
Oslo, Norway
Stockholm, Sweden
The posistive experience of helping Fiona see the world.
Fiona has creativity pouring out of her veins, so she wants to break you off a piece of her talents as a token of her appreciation.
• A hand written/drawn post card mailed from the Vatican City post office (this is really an exciting thing!)
• A book of drawings from the trip
• A book of photos from the trip
• You can go on the trip with her in photo form
• You can go on the trip with her (in photo form)

(she is NOT using a digital camera... these will be authentic 35mm film photos)

Anything you can give will help!
You can even just share the video with your friends, family, coworkers, pets, neighbors, personal trainer, therapsit, roommate, or local billionare.
(""Make it real for people and build trust"")
This Is Real.  You Can Trust Me.

PS.  Items will be shipped from NYC once Fiona returns to school and settles into her Brooklyn apartment that she has yet to find...   You can expect your goodies by the end of September. (excluding the Vatican City postcards of course!)
(photos must be developed upon return to America, so date of expectance may be slightly altered)

hewn

We at hewn have a simple goal: construct stylish wooden sunglasses that feature superior craftsmanship.

Our journey started when we purchased a pair of wooden sunglasses but were disappointed in the quality. We tried many different pairs of wooden sunglasses, but we were unable to find any that left us satisfied. Every pair we tried either were poor quality or fantastically expensive. We knew there had to be a better way so we set out to build our own.
column30: >We designed dozens of pairs each with minor
column32: > in sizing, thickness, manufacturing process, and of course species of wood. Wood is a beautiful, natural material and each species has its own character. After much
column34: > and many late nights, we
column44:
>

View the complete photo gallery:

https://plus.google.com/photos/102669874025960320512/albums/6053819840493596721
column55:
>What makes us different?

We have put a tremendous amount of effort into designing a sunglass that is higher quality. A unique hinge design embedded in the wood keeps the arms firmly in place with no wiggle. The base curve of the sunglass is slightly higher so that they stay closer to your face and feel more comfortable. Our lenses are polarized to reduce glare and provide high contrast. A microfiber pouch that serves as a cleaning cloth as well as a hard, durable case are included with every pair. All orders have free shipping within the United States!

Read more about what makes hewn truly unique:


Due to the handmade process and unique nature of wood, the sunglasses you receive will vary slightly from the images here. We are hoping to begin production as soon as the campaign reaches its goal and estimate it will take approximately one month once the funds have been raised.

Several people have asked about international shipping. If you are purchasing from outside the USA, please add $18 to cover shipping.

EITHER/OR is an online boutique
— that will sell Canadian-designed and manufactured, sustainable and ethical apparel and accessories.

""..most of the public is still not aware that...what they're wearing could have been made in an exploitative way. We don't want to wear that story anymore. We want to see fashion become a force for good."" - Fashion Revolution white paper
EITHER/OR will carry a small collection of hand-picked clothing and accessories made my Canadian designers who value quality, comfort, style, ethical manufacturing and high environmental practices.
My name is Malorie Bertrand. I'm a media relations and social media professional by day, sustainable fashion blogger and stylist by night.
Why am I launching an online sustainable fashion shop?
I'm launching EITHER/OR to meet the growing demand for a one-stop, online shop that sells several sustainable and ethical Canadian brands under one virtual roof.

We have become far too removed from our clothing, from where it is made, by whom, in what conditions and at what cost to the environment. EITHER/OR will connect people to Canadian brands that value local production, transparency and social and environmental responsibility.

What is sustainable and ethical fashion?

Sustainable and ethical fashion defines clothing and accessories whose production process, from crop cultivation and dyeing, to pattern making and sewing, has a smaller environmental and social burden. It's an alternative branch of the fashion industry that operates under a triple ""p"" model: people, planet, profit.
A few characteristics of sustainable and ethical fashion:
• Uses organic textiles (grown without the use of pesticides or herbicides)
<li>Made my garment workers who are paid a fair, livable wage
column3: work in a safe environment with strict health and safety regulations

column1: • Made in garment factories that don't hire child labourers
• Avoids the use of other harmful chemicals
• Avoids the use of animal products or only uses animal by-products of the meat industry
• Operates within a closed-loop process in which everything that is used to make a product is reused and not discarded, including the product itself.
What is the problem with mainstream fashion?

The mainstream ""fast fashion"" industry, worth an estimated $3 trillion dollars as of 2013, is the third largest industry and the second biggest polluter in the world. It directly employs more than 60 million people and likely more than double that indirectly dependent on the sector.

Over the past decade, large fashion brands have gone from producing two collections a year, to one a week. According to the fashion documentary, The True Cost, the world now buys 80 billion new pieces of clothing and accessories a year and the average American alone generates 82 pounds of clothing annually.
The fashion industry is rampant with environmental and human abuses, and most people don't know that what they're wearing could have been made in an exploitative way.
I know that we don't want to wear that story anymore. As the 2015 Fashion Revolution white paper says, more and more people want to see fashion become a force for good.
EITHER/OR will bridge the gap between people who demand more of the fashion industry, and the designers who are answering that call.
This campaign to raise money for EITHER/OR has many layers to it. It's about helping me bring the shop to life
column2: promoting Canada's sustainable and ethical fashion designers to a broader online audience
column3: educating people on the benefits of shopping responsibly
column4: and, in the grand scheme of things, strengthening support of Canada's sustainable and ethical fashion industry.

column1: My five-year plan for the shop is to position it as an online platform to promote designers and to highlight the hurdles they have to overcome to be successful in this country. Through expert storytelling, EITHER/OR will represent designers and help them with their efforts to get more funding and to revive Canada's manufacturing industry.

Why is this important now?

Society is witnessing a paradigm shift in consumer behaviour. Two years ago, the Rana Plaza factory collapse in Dhaka, Bangladesh killed and injured thousands of garment workers, people who's very blood went into making clothing for us. The horrific realities of fast fashion are now impossible to ignore, and consumers are demanding higher labour standards, higher livable wages and stricter environmental policies.

There is an ever-growing band of Canadian designers that is embracing a more sustainable and ethical model of fashion. They value transparency, respect, the environment, and quality over quantity. They're creating beautiful apparel and accessories that are made to stand the test of trends and time. EITHER/OR will be your online destination to find them all under one virtual roof.
EITHER/OR has received a startup grant of $15,000 that partially covers inventory costs for year one.
I'm contributing some of my own savings to cover the following startup fees and operational expenses:

More funds are needed to put together two solid collections, help cover branding costs (logo design, website conception, packaging, labeling, stationery and online assets), shipping material and give a cushion to use to buy collections for year two.
It's important for me to say a proper thank you to all of my donors and supporters. Remember, even if you can't donate money, your promotional support means everything to this campaign.
I've reached out to several Canadian designers and makers to provide you with a wicked selection of perks. I'm also giving EITHER/OR gift cards for the higher donation levels.
You will, at the very least, receive a hand-written note from yours truly, thanking you for your donation. I'll also recognize your donation across the shop's social media platforms at the same time.

column2: target=""_blank"">
column3: target=""_blank"">

column1: Mary Lee Jewelry
And what if I don't reach my goal?
I've chosen the flexible funding plan to make sure that your funds are still put to good use, even if I don't reach my goal. But mind over matter, I will, and you'll make it possible!
The biggest risk for retail shops is not selling
your inventory by the end of the season. You never want to carry too much
inventory. You also don't want to run out of stock too quickly.
To mitigate these risks, I've built the shop on a
slow business model. I'll only be purchasing around 220 pieces for the year.
This means that if the shop can sell around ten pieces a month, it won't carry
a loss. This is a very reasonable number for me that is manageable. I'm working
full-time for at least the next two years, so I've made sure that I can handle
the operations involved in selling and shipping ten items a month.
If I'm left with inventory at the end of the year, I'll
sign up with Garmentory, an online shop that sells left-over stock from brick
and mortar, and online shops. Garmentory also gives me the option to bargain
with customers, making left-over stock that more appealing and affordable.

EITHER/OR will feature more than a handful of designers. There is always the risk of a designer or two not delivering an order on time. To mitigate this risk, I'm working with designers with whom I've had several conversations with and/or met with in person. My expectations will be made clear, and I'll be sure to put in my orders far enough in advance to give designers plenty of time to fulfill them.

The shop also has an advantage of being a ""slow fashion"" business. Our customers will understand that each item is hand-made, and that the designers we're working with are often one-person shops. The slower production is a positive feature of the clothing, indicating that it is ethically made and to high standards.

Other ways you can help

I know that not everyone can donate money to this campaign, but helping me by promoting it is just as helpful. Please share this campaign link with your friends and network via email and social media. The
more people who learn about it, the better.
Thank you for taking the time to read this and for your support.
Devlyn Van Loon, photographed by Luis Mora, model Katya with Peggi Lepage, hair and makeup by Ashley Readings
Kazz Clothing, creative direction and photography by Brendan Minto, model with Elite Model Management (Toronto) Inc., hair and makeup by Priya Kumari Bilkhu
Josiane Perron, photography by Daphné Caron, model Laurie with Agence Look, hair and makeup by Valeria Amirova

It all started in 2016 when we set out to devise the most cash accessible minimalist wallet in the market. We knew there was a better way to access cash, so we achieved that purpose by introducing the Vant clipfold wallet on Kickstarter.

Now we are happy to introduce the next product in our lineup. With Arc, we took all the problems seen with other wallets and nurtured them to develop the most intuitive and all-round cash, card, and coin accessible wallet to ever be created.
column2: >Practical features consolidated in a sleek and modern package
column3:
>

Clipfold Money Clip

 Access, manage, and store your cash in the most effortless way possible. Our money clip was designed to roughly arc at a 45 degree angle to keep your cash readily accessible for a swift and intuitive cash handling experience.

While other wallets have you pinching for your cash or unraveling a quartered bill, our money clip keeps your cash flat and compliant for optimal cash management. 

Now revamped with an extended length and 1.5x the rigidity of previous iterations. Each cash tab is now constructed with a bespoke top-grain leather selected to achieve its unique structure, form, and functionality.  

 Quick Draw Gridstop Pull Tab 

Pull, fan out, and gain access to all your cards in a swift and intuitive motion. Each card cavity can contain up to 3 cards each(6 total), giving each clipfold the needed capacity to hold all your frequently used cards.

Coin Stash

Available exclusively for the Arc Pinnacle. Conveniently stow all your coins and/or trinkets in a swift and organized manner. Our coin stash was designed for effortless access and a clear first-person perspective when accessing your coins. 

 Water Resistant Top-grain Leather

 210D Dyneema Gridstop Nylon
column4:
>Beautiful inside and out! 

We didn't want to make any compromises with this wallet, so we only selected the most beautiful and and highly reinforced waterproof fabric we could get our hands on! The beauty of our 210D Dyneema gridstop nylon has been proven to withstand the rigors of any weather condition, while evoking a sleek and modern aesthetic to compliment your attire.

Thin and Accommodating 

Interior Stash Compartment

Stash:

Extra cards

Business cards

Receipts

Tickets

Larger notes
column5: >Choose Your Lining!

column2:
>Choose between gridstop or traditional black cross-weave nylon lining!

I'm Angelle Chang, founder of JOW Junior, handmade Dutch fashion for Kids and their Parents. I'm mother to JOWin, now already 3 years old, born with a left cleft lip.
People kept staring at him, so I gave them a good reason, this would be the most trendy and confident boy they have ever seen.
I encourage kids to be confident and happy, wear anything they want and like, have a personality and dare to be different.

Now I hope our fashion will travel the world with this message. We hope our first stop will be LA Fashionweek since my mother and my grandma lives there. We need EUR 2500 to pay the fee for LA Fashion Week.

JOW Junior is not just locally handmade fashion for kids but we love to design with the kids themselves, let them inspire us with the kids view and we make it with young designers and creative elderly.


All our PERKS are personal, we will contact you before making you something special, please check our website for our designs, www.jowjunior.com

0,"

After a successful first Indiegogo campaign, smartwatch users are asking us to make our breathable and washable nato bands into a 2 piece strap for their smartwatch so they can use the heart beat sensors behind.

Our 2 piece nato bands comes with quick release pins so changing between bands is effortless.

The collection contains 10 different designs to help you stand out from the crowd.

Designed in Singapore and created with love for detail.

We made a small quantity of 2 piece nato bands in 18mm/20mm/22mm with silver buckles and they are in stock and available for purchase and ready to be shipped out.

Once you've backed our band, we will email you to find out which design you prefer.
column3:
'>FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING VIA REGISTERED AIRMAIL

Customers who purchase 2 bands will get a watch pouch for FREE. Customers who purchase 3 bands will get a watch roll for FREE.  
*watch and mobile phone not included*

 

Our 2 piece Nato band works with quartz and mechanical watches as well!

For those of you who like our straps but don't have a watch, you can purchase this minimalist watch at $20.

Case Material:  Alloy (Ion-Plated Silver colour) with Stainless Steel Case Back
Case Diameter: 38 mm
Strap Width: 20 mm
Dial Window Material: Mineral Glass
Display: Analog
Movement: Japanese Quartz
Water Resistant: 3 ATM
Warrenty: 1 Year

Warranty does not cover:  

The life of the battery 

Wear and tear and aging (e.g. scratched crystal
column4: alteration of the color and/or material of watch case
column5:
peeling of the plating) 

Any damage on any part of the watch resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, negligence, accidents (knocks dents, crushing, broken crystal, etc.) 

How to measure your watch band?
This pebble classic takes a 22mm watch band. If your watch band width is odd number eg 19mm, go 1mm smaller and get the 18mm band.

column2: >MIZU was recently contacted by British GQ and was asked to participate in one of their upcoming Advertorials titled "" The Fashion Collection "". I would get the chance to be in the company of  famous high end brands, Giorgio Armani, Prada, Hugo Boss and not to mention the famed faces who have graced their pages. With an average reader base of 381,000, this could be an amazing opportunity for MIZU to get ties into the hands of thousands international readers.
column3:
>
MIZU would be apart of the upcoming spring / summer issues ( April, May)  right in time for the S/S14 catwalk guide! Help make this opportunity come to fruition with anything you can donate.
column12:
>

Oxford Dictonary defines it:

a newspaper or magazine advertisement giving information about a product in the style of an editorial or objective journalistic article.

The advertorial that I was selected to be apart of, "" The Fashion Collection "" will be featured in 2 issues ( April and May). Under my current agreement, the cost of space for each issue is approx. $400 USD.
column22:
>The Impact

With exposure like this, the potential impact is limitless. 

You never know which affluent GQ reader comes across MIZU's ties. Being apart of this international advertorial could mean MIZU being sold in stores across the UK and around the necks of thousands of people abroad. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone has money to donate- and that's okay!

There are plenty of other ways to help. Share this one Facebook, Pinterest, Tumblr, Instagram or any other social media site you are currently a member of. Any exposure you can give this campaign and MIZU  is incredibly valuable. 

Need a tie? Check out MIZU's full collection at mizubrand.com. All profits will be going towards reaching our goal.

column2: >Vandra - The world's safest backpack by Casten Design

>Vandra is all that You need to keep your things organized and safe. Vandra protects your personal belongings against falls, shocks and is water-repellent. You can also secure your Vandra backpack with a locking cable and locate it using a tracking device and app.
>Casten Design is a Scandinavian company. We aim to be clever and thoughtful. We created Vandra with a vision to make modern life easier and keep your belongings safe.
>We spent 15 months researching, designing, testing, to create Vandra. Now we want your help to bring Vandra to market. See our perks to find the Vandra so suit you best and make a pledge today.

>""When you go to swim or to the gym your things get damp or dirty. You don't want to put them in the same compartment as your laptop and paperwork. We gave Vandra separate compartments for office and sports."" - Gustaf Bergendal, Founder of Casten Design

>Vandra is your squire. In the Middle Ages, a squire was the armor-bearer for a knight. He protected his master's equipment, organised it and kept it clean and safe. Today, Vandra acts as your valet-squire by keeping your things organised and tidy. helping you locate and secure them and providing an emergency charge for your phone, too!
>Separate compartments of the bag for office and sports that you won't find anywhere else!
>Vandra's front compartment is expandable, therefore can you make it bigger to contain more sports gear.​
>Charge your phone with the help of the External USB outlet connected to your powerbank or laptop!
>  Convert Vandra from backpack to a sling-backpack.
>When you carry your Vandra no one can open the zippers from outside. Vandra features a hidden easy-access pocket to hold your passport, wallet or smartphone.
> Lockable zippers, to prevent thieves from getting to your valuables in  public places.​
>Easy access card holder at the left carry strap for convenience.​
>Vandra features Trolley handle strap with easy access to the hidden pocket to hold your passport, wallet or smartphone.​
> Vandra's front compartment is expandable to fit more sports gear.
>Vandra protects your personal belongings against falls and shocks with  a patent pending anti shock protection system.​
>Casten Design is a Scandinavian design company, from Stockholm and based in Hong Kong. Our passion is to create sustainable useful everyday products with great innovative design.

>Gustaf Casten founded Casten Design. Gustaf, got the idea for Vandra after dropping his backpack and breaking his laptop. Gustaf like to unwind at gym or at the hiking trails after days at the office. He determined to create a backpack to gadgets, but also make room for wet sports gear.
>""Vandra comes with a patent-pending shock protection system, and a secure waist strap to protect it from bumping.""

>We began creating Vandra 15 months ago. The goal was to create the world safest, backpack - versatile and with great design. A backpack that you bring to the office in the morning and to the gym in the afternoon. An tough, elegant unisex item which looks good for all occasions.

>Establishing a sustainable design. Sourcing the correct fabric, insuring quality and the accessories required to make Vandra. Finding a reliable manufacturing partner. These were some of the challenges we faced to bring you Vandra. We selected a reliable manufacturer, in business for 15 years. We assigned third party quality control, to ensure products get shipped in prime condition.
>We made agreements with two freight forwarder for the fulfillment of rewards. To help avoid delivery challenges, we ask you to provide a complete address and let us know if your address changes.

<span>At M.J. Schiebe travel messenger bags, we support a lifestyle of excitement and exhilaration exploring new experiences
column2: a lifestyle of music festival goers who travel internationally from one music festival to the next
column3: the surfers and beach lovers who run across oceans to catch that next big wave
column4: the lifestyle of a backpacker who backpacks from one hostel to the next and the lifestyle of the traveling philanthropist, who recognizes that giving back to our international communities is an important part of our principles and what we believe in.

column1: What is The Media saying about M.J. Schiebe bags?
Kate Thomas, Host of Travel show series, Travel with Kate(youtube.com/TravelwithKate)

There is something special about my MJ Schiebe bag...it has become my go-to bag for when I’m packing light and on the go as a traveler – and also in my everyday life as a city dweller. The bag itself is an extra-large, over the shoulder messenger bag. The retro-style has a fun color scheme that kind of goes with everything.
Kristen Sarah, Host of Travel Show, Hopscotch the Globe (youtube.com/hopscotchtheglobe)

Every time I bring my pink travel bag out with me, I get one compliment after the other. People really love the look of it. The bag is capable of holding a lot, and I especially like the small compartments in the front.
Daisy Jing, Host of Your Perfect Beauty and featured in Forbes, Huffington Post, StartupAmerica, Seventeen.com (yourperfectbeauty.com)

I love using my MJ Schiebe bag for travel! It’s very sturdy, and roomy enough to fit a laptop, books, and other supplies. I love how the front pocket fits my iphone perfectly, so I don’t need to rummage around for my phone. Overall, MJ Schiebe bag is one of the most sturdy bags I have and it’s definitely a talking piece!

Megan Schiebe, Head Designer at M.J. Schiebe started designing these bags due to her busy work and travel schedule hopping from one country to the next for work as well as traveling to the most exotic beaches in the world to pursue her passion for surfing.  She realized that there was not a style-savvy enough bag on the market that was big enough to hold her laptop and iPad securely on the plane that looked chic, as well as could keep her cell phone and iPod in a convenient pocket with extra room to pack for a weekend getaway.  She wanted a bag that she could slide under the plane seat that was big enough to keep all of these items secure.

1) Distinctive positioning of the iPod and cellphone pocket in the front of messenger bag allows for convenient placement of keys, iPod and cellphone to facilitate easy music listening experience when traveling.
2) Convenient zip in the center of bag in the front holds passport for effortless access.
3) Upper zip pockets in front of bag provides convenient placement for flip flops, swimsuits, board shorts, sunscreen, rain-jacket, cameras, bottled water and sandwiches when traveling.
4) Large Velcro pocket pouch inside bag at the back allows for iPads and laptops to be placed while traveling and can be slipped under the plane seat.
5) Bags are padded in the front, back and sides to protect items inside bag.
What are we doing with the funds raised?

As part of our evolution as the unique travel bag for every international and exotic traveler, we are raising funds so that we can produce more bag colors. Our bags are becoming popular internationally and we have an increased demand for all of our colors to be made and we are raising $7,500 to cover the initial upfront production costs.  Our bags are ideal for carrying on the plane so that you can slip them under the seat and they are large enough to pack your personal items for a weekend trip getaway.

We are also big philanthropists and donate a percentage of our sales to several non-profits locally and internationally so that we can bring awareness to these causes such as Humanitarian campaigns like Women and Girl literacy projects, Human Rights, Climate Change and Breast Cancer Awareness.

column2: >How actively engaged are we with our friends?

column1: You can find us here on Facebook
Find us here on Twitter
Find us here on Pinterest
Which bags are we giving you with each of your contributions?

For your contribution of $25, we are offering our smaller, hip and retro out-on-the-town blue messenger bag.  This bag is ideal for taking to parties and hanging out with friends.  This bag is 9 inches x 8 inches.

We are offering our large pink travel messenger bag for each $38 contribution. This travel messenger bag is ideal for traveling and carrying on planes.  It is big enough for your iPad, laptop and can hold your cell phones and iPods and passports in the front pockets designated for these accessories.  This bag is 15.5 inches x 12 inches.
We are sending you our large black travel messenger bag with your $38 contribution!  This bag is 15.5 inches x 12 inches.
We are sending you our large blue travel messenger bag with your $38 contribution!  This bag is 15.5 inches x 12 inches.
We are sending you our large brown travel messenger bag with your $38 contribution!  This bag is 15.5 inches x 12 inches.
We are offering both our large pink travel bag as well as our small blue retro messenger bag with your $60 contribution.

Not sure which color you like the most? How about getting all four colors with your $150 contribution. We will send you all four bag colors so that you can mix and match them with every outfit with your busy schedule.

Megan Schiebe is the Head Designer and Founder of MJ Schiebe.  Her extensive travel experiences includes working, studying and traveling abroad, as well as her passion for surfing, wakeboarding and SUP boarding which have given her direct insight into designing unique travel bags which is fully equipped with all the right pockets for those busy travel schedules.

Ever have that experience where you’re just looking at a world globe, spin it around and then jump onto a plane to where ever your finger lands?  In a brief nutshell, that’s usually how I travel.  I’m a little feisty and love the idea of exploring and waking up every day to a new, pristine and exotic adventure.   My travels have allowed me to work, study, live and volunteer abroad, experiences I will always cherish.  I hope that when you wear one of my bags, you too will know what that feels like and carry on with your own adventure.

Our product is well designed to facilitate long term wear and tear and can be worn for extensive periods of time. We have had Sales companies present our bags to consumer panels around the country who have received the products really well.

With every new venture in the Fashion and Luggage industries, there are always challenges regarding delivery dates of the merchandise, challenges around maintaining an affordable sales price for our customers as a result of the changing business climate, etc
column2: however, due to our established relationships within the Fashion and Luggage industries, we are confident that we can maintain our high quality of goods and customer satisfaction.

We are sending you our large brown travel messenger bag with your $38 contribution!  This bag is 15.5 inches x 12 inches.
We are offering both our large pink travel bag as well as our small blue retro messenger bag with your $60 contribution.

Not sure which color you like the most? How about getting all four colors with your $150 contribution. We will send you all four bag colors so that you can mix and match them with every outfit with your busy schedule.

Megan Schiebe is the Head Designer and Founder of MJ Schiebe.  Her extensive travel experiences includes working, studying and traveling abroad, as well as her passion for surfing, wakeboarding and SUP boarding which have given her direct insight into designing unique travel bags which is fully equipped with all the right pockets for those busy travel schedules.

Ever have that experience where you’re just looking at a world globe, spin it around and then jump onto a plane to where ever your finger lands?  In a brief nutshell, that’s usually how I travel.  I’m a little feisty and love the idea of exploring and waking up every day to a new, pristine and exotic adventure.   My travels have allowed me to work, study, live and volunteer abroad, experiences I will always cherish.  I hope that when you wear one of my bags, you too will know what that feels like and carry on with your own adventure.

Our product is well designed to facilitate long term wear and tear and can be worn for extensive periods of time. We have had Sales companies present our bags to consumer panels around the country who have received the products really well.

With every new venture in the Fashion and Luggage industries, there are always challenges regarding delivery dates of the merchandise, challenges around maintaining an affordable sales price for our customers as a result of the changing business climate, etc
column2: however, due to our established relationships within the Fashion and Luggage industries, we are confident that we can maintain our high quality of goods and customer satisfaction.",23.0,0,"1 Campaign

Are you ready to take an
exquisite journey through the various fashion corners of the world? It is in
this spirit that I bring to you <b>The
In this day and age the idea of “global fashion” is bandied
about readily but not really taken seriously. Sure there are entertaining  webisodes with the host imparting their
experience (and opinion), but there isn’t something that holds a bit more
So here I am set to shake things up.
promises to be an in-depth documentary series focused on how fashion is
conceived, curated and cultivated in cities that aren’t on the traditional
fashion radar. So we diverge from the traditional fashion capitals of the world
and hone in on those who aren’t immediately recognizable but have their own
respected and developed fashion industry.
designers, fashion scholars and the person on the street, about how style fits
into their lives,
column4: >The Style Atlas

column1: delves deeper into the country’s vision when it comes to fashion. What are
their challenges? Strengths? How does their socio-economic, geo-political,

culture and religion play a part in completing their fashion vision? 

I have over 20+ years of
experience in the Canadian fashion publishing space, including a decade as one
of the senior editors at FLARE Magazine, Canada’s
national fashion magazine. Currently I have a robust portfolio as an
independent editor and journalist with media outlets including The Kit South Asian Edition with The Toronto Star, Canada’s largest city
Media, North America’s longest running South Asian media platform, and a
Canada. It is this experience I bring forth in my aim to create an
intelligent, and exploratory view on what creates fashion.
Along with an established film crew led by noted producer
(and recent Canadian Film Centre inductee) Ali Mashayekhi, The Style Atlas will be comprised of a 5-part documentary series,
taking place in an 8-week shooting schedule this fall.  Each episode can be seen as a stand-alone
program or part of a continuing narrative. For this specific initiative we have
strategically picked the following countries keeping cultural and ethnic
So everyone is in place. Now it’s time for YOU to join our
come to fruition. I look forward to working together with you in raising 91K USD for this specific venture.  The
reason I picked the crowd funding channel via
Indiegogo is because I decided to forgo the traditional film making
route i.e.: looking to select studios for select funding.  The reason is because I want to ensure that
there is no tug-of-war when it comes to creative control with inexperienced
executives. Especially in this case when it comes to discussing sensitive
geo-political aspects of the country. There will be no risk of falling into the

sensationalism route with me being at the helm.

Here's where our budget will be going:

Another reason on why I'm doing this is that instead of me
just self-financing this project, this route reflects the spirit of how I
website) all with the support of a community behind me. It’s more effective to
go to a distribution company to show that I have all these supporters who have
contributed. To paraphrase someone I met (and who recently led their very own
successful Indiegogo campaign) self-financing is basically me saying, “This is
a great idea. And you know who else likes it? Me.”
So of course it goes without saying that without your
will note be able to drive this much-needed conversation when it comes to the
world of style. So it’s time to talk, traverse and take
it all in.
column3: culture hunter, I love exploring how fashion is embraced all over the world and in cities/countries that aren't necessarily on the typical ""fashion"" radar. It's a long held interest (and the reason why I got into publishing to begin with) and launched my passion project www.Ramp1885.com where I along with a global team of bloggers and writers cover the international fashion scene from Beirut to Berlin. Kashmir to Korea. Denmark to Delhi.

Through the years, I've produced a wide variety of fashion editorials, photo shoots, covers, celebrity profiles from Vancouver to Halifax, Cuba to Switzerland. With over 18 years of editorial experience under my belt, 14 of that was spent honing my skills while working on staff in a senior editor capacity with national publications.

column4: >I've been lucky to have had the pleasure of interviewing celebrities at global high profile events including The Golden Globe Awards, The Juno Awards, The MuchMusic Video Awards and The Toronto International Film Festival. My desire to explore the world past my doorstep has led me to publish travel stories as well as feature articles.

His work ethic and attention to detail were sought out to provide the technical solutions to realizing Hina’s vision. He is eager to collaborate with Hina and her team to create breathtaking visuals which compliment the fashion and culture of the countries The Style Atlas will be documenting.

As a freelancer I've had the privilege of working with a variety of corporate & editorial clients across Canada and globally. Pretty much anything in the media space: writer, editor, journalist, online content gate-keeper, blogger... I'm there. The logos on this page have been censored or removed. This is due to a trademark dispute that has resulted in a last minute name and logo change. The new company name is Smart Hour and our logo is now SMHR, short for Smart Hour. Logos will be in silver lettering and will be next to the three o'clock marker.

column1: • Hello every one!! thank you for visiting our crowdfunding page. This is to raise funds for the newest boxing shoe we came up with the partnership between Rumble Brothers Boxing and Bryant Boxing called the COUNTER.ACT boxing shoe.

• This campaign is to begin production and get the shoes off the ground. Researching and trying on different boxing shoes out there, we plan to offer a very different approach and feel to the boxing shoe line altogether. The Counter.Act shoe will take a lot of inspiration from some of the current trends that are popular today, while maintaining the functionality of a boxing shoe.

• With your help, we can introduce a new trend and look of the boxing shoe line. Boxing Shoes have a history of poor taste and design, and this is where we can change that and innovate to a higher standard.
• For production and funding of the Counter.Act shoe, we need a start-up of $8,000. This will help up get the production going and get pre-orders out to customers.

• But thats not all. Some of the perks we offer will be exclusive shirts and boxing gloves that matches the respective color of the Counter.Act from either variant of Rumble Brothers or Bryant Boxing. Match and work in style with your new shoes!!
• And if we don't reach our goal (but i know we will) we will use the funds to meet the pre-orders that you made and use them to continue production of the shoes.

• As we stated before, both brands (Rumble Brothers and Bryant Boxing) feel that there is a lack of fresh and innovative approach to boxing shoes. and this is where we hope to change that and offer a cool, clean, and different design to our customers all over.
The only risk we face is not having your size available when production is complete and sizes ship out. Don't be that guy (or girl, we don't discriminate) and pledge your order now with us.

can't donate at this time? Get the word out!! share our story to people who you think would like to try something fresh and new. Our Counter.Act is unlike any other, a fusion of trendy and functional, combining sylish features with practical, and innovative design.

Hello every one!! thank you for visiting our crowdfunding page. This is to raise funds for the newest boxing shoe we came up with the partnership between Rumble Brothers Boxing and Bryant Boxing called the COUNTER.ACT boxing shoe.

This campaign is to begin production and get the shoes off the ground. Researching and trying on different boxing shoes out there, we plan to offer a very different approach and feel to the boxing shoe line altogether. The Counter.Act shoe will take a lot of inspiration from some of the current trends that are popular today, while maintaining the functionality of a boxing shoe.

With your help, we can introduce a new trend and look of the boxing shoe line. Boxing Shoes have a history of poor taste and design, and this is where we can change that and innovate to a higher standard.
What We Need & What You Get
For production and funding of the Counter.Act shoe, we need a start-up of $8,000. This will help up get the production going and get pre-orders out to customers.

But thats not all. Some of the perks we offer will be exclusive shirts and boxing gloves that matches the respective color of the Counter.Act from either variant of Rumble Brothers or Bryant Boxing. Match and work in style with your new shoes!!
And if we don't reach our goal (but i know we will) we will use the funds to meet the pre-orders that you made and use them to continue production of the shoes.

As we stated before, both brands (Rumble Brothers and Bryant Boxing) feel that there is a lack of fresh and innovative approach to boxing shoes. and this is where we hope to change that and offer a cool, clean, and different design to our customers all over.
The only risk we face is not having your size available when production is complete and sizes ship out. Don't be that guy (or girl, we don't discriminate) and pledge your order now with us.

can't donate at this time? Get the word out!! share our story to people who you think would like to try something fresh and new. Our Counter.Act is unlike any other, a fusion of trendy and functional, combining sylish features with practical, and innovative design.",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

column6:
>5,000 days in pajamas

On March 10, 2016, Muck Sticky celebrated his 5,000th consecutive day of wearing pajama pants as his public attire. Known for his comedic music, he has been wearing pajama pants for more than thirteen years as a way of letting the world know he is comfortable with who he is and how he looks. He doesn't dress sloppy. But he does keep it casual. Any lots of people are following his lead. The first line of Muck Pajamas, released in December 2015, sold out by reservations in October of 2015 (2 months before they were released)...

column2: >NOW IS YOUR CHANCE TO GET MUCK PAJAMAS #2

column1:
Now you can get in on this growing brand of pajama pants by selecting the perk ""Limited Edition Muck Pajamas #2"", and reserving your pair today. Only 100 pairs of each style are printed. Once they are gone, they are gone. As time goes on you can build your collection of Muck Pajamas because once each pair sells out, we will release a new limited edition pair with a brand new design. Here is the design for Muck Pajamas #2...

AVAILABLE NOW...

Choose the perk ""Limited Edition Muck Pajamas #2"" to reserve yours today! We will email you about sizes once all 100 have been sold.

Secret Perk

Once you order your pair of Muck Pajamas #2, within 48 hours we will send you a secret link to advance reserve Muck Pajamas #3. This is ONLY available to those who have reserved Muck Pajamas #2. Once we sell out of the 100 Muck Pajamas #2, we will release Muck Pajamas #3 to the public for everyone to reserve. So your best bet is to go ahead and get on it!

Muck Sticky Autographed 8x10 Photo

Choose the perk ""Autographed 8x10"" and you will get one of these super groovy photos...

Everyone who orders a coloring book gets an autographed photo...

And by the way, we are taking pre-orders for Muck Sticky top hats too...

On the ""Wacky"" campaign, about 25 people reserved the first ever line of Muck Sticky orange top hats. We are still waiting for them to come in from the manufacturer. So if you were one of those who were able to reserve, your hat will be on it's way to you soon. If you haven't ordered, now is your chance...

We also do our T-shirts in limited edition runs. The numbers vary, but most often there are less than 100 of each style of shirt. Choose the perk ""Muck Sticky T-shirt"" now and you will receive a limited edition Muck Sticky T-shirt (style and color very by sizes in stock). 
*You will receive an email about sizes after your order is complete.

There are currently 18 albums in the Muck Sticky catalog. Some titles are out of print, and some are out of stock. Choose the perk ""Autographed Muck Sticky CD"" and you will receive a randomly chosen autographed Muck Sticky CD. Order as many as you like, and we will give you as many different CDs as we have in stock. All of them will be autographed.

Other Ways You Can Help

Here are some other ways you can be part of this ongoing mission:

  • Share this website with your family &
column2: friends through social media and email.

Austin Designer, Malissa Long, and bi-coastal stylist, Joanna Beckwith have teamed up to establish House of Púca and Necessary Elements!

Necessary Elements: Specializing in production work for retailers seeking private label designs and/or designers that require production of their own designs. It is a goal to begin producing lines for independent designers around the globe while continuing to serve designers in Austin,Tx.
- Providing patterns, samples/ prototypes at $30 per hour, and production at $15 per hour.
- Everything is made locally, in the studio and production offers runs as small as 10-50 pieces.
- Following the Pattern Makers code of ethics, Necessary Elements waits 5 years to use elements or patterns that have been developed for other designers.
- Necessary Elements has strong knowledge of resources for fabric/notions, and the ability to source materials for clients and their lines as needed.
House of Púca- A label offering a variety of original designs and custom work. Ultimately House of Púca will sale clothing through their on-line store and retailers in Texas and beyond.
- A Púca is a shape shifting spirit, so at house of Púca, you will find original designs of tops, bottoms, dresses, and outerwear.

- Anything in the line can be remade in a fabric of the client/customers choice, custom design is also an option. 
- H.O.P.  develops and designs new items throughout  the season.
- H.O.P. offers a strong background in fashion styling and knowledge of current trends.
- Obsessive attention to detail and the quality of craft and fabric is the foundation that gives these garments longer durability than what one may find in a chain-store.

Where music and movies go - fashion is sure to follow. Austin is known as the live entertainment capital of the world. Directors such as Richard Linklater and Robert Rodriguez use the city as the backdrop to create theatrical magic. New York and LA are defined by their sound, their imagery, and their fashion. Austin has the sound and the imagery down and is working towards fashion and we hope to be an intricate part of the infrastructure here.

Staying local helps our local economy, “Your dollars spent in locally-owned businesses have three times the impact on your community than dollars spent at national chains. When shopping locally, you simultaneously create jobs, fund more city services through sales tax, invest in neighborhood improvement and promote community development.” (staylocal.org) By contributing to our business you are not only supporting one local entrepreneur but multiple ones making your dollars go even further.

We are off to a great start, and we hope you believe in our goals as much as we do. We are in need of new equipment such as a dress form or two, an industrial rotary cutter, a variety of supplies, and we would even like to get the restroom in working order. So we have decided to offer you a variety of valuable and tangible gifts for contributions. We are asking for a helping hand, not a hand out. Our contributions begin at $10 while gifts range from tote bags and tank tops to dresses, tops, and even sewing lessons. We also have some special gifts for the contributing fashion designer or retailer.

If you’re not able to contribute with a donation there are other ways you can help. We have sample garments available for sale. Share with friends and family about our endeavor. Like us on Facebook If you are a designer in need of help we’d love to be your source for product development and production. We are “For Hire”.

We'd like to thank our help in creating this campaign Greg Cestaro for our video, Nikki Qiao for photographing all our samples, and Sanetra Stewart for wearing all our beautiful clothes.

Staying local helps our local economy, “Your dollars spent in locally-owned businesses have three times the impact on your community than dollars spent at national chains. When shopping locally, you simultaneously create jobs, fund more city services through sales tax, invest in neighborhood improvement and promote community development.” (staylocal.org) By contributing to our business you are not only supporting one local entrepreneur but multiple ones making your dollars go even further.

We are off to a great start, and we hope you believe in our goals as much as we do. We are in need of new equipment such as a dress form or two, an industrial rotary cutter, a variety of supplies, and we would even like to get the restroom in working order. So we have decided to offer you a variety of valuable and tangible gifts for contributions. We are asking for a helping hand, not a hand out. Our contributions begin at $10 while gifts range from tote bags and tank tops to dresses, tops, and even sewing lessons. We also have some special gifts for the contributing fashion designer or retailer.

If you’re not able to contribute with a donation there are other ways you can help. We have sample garments available for sale. Share with friends and family about our endeavor. Like us on Facebook If you are a designer in need of help we’d love to be your source for product development and production. We are “For Hire”.

We'd like to thank our help in creating this campaign Greg Cestaro for our video, Nikki Qiao for photographing all our samples, and Sanetra Stewart for wearing all our beautiful clothes.",1.0,0,"1 Campaign

My name is Ellie and I'm 20 years old. My cousin, Tiffany Headley, is an awesome fashion designer and I want her to be able to go to the Omaha Fashion Week and Kansas City Fashion week shows. It's seriously her dream and it would mean the world to her. She's been working on this reality show and it's basically drained her funds. If she can go to both of these shows, it will further her career and help get a lot of publicity for her line (Donna Faye). Even if we can't raise the set goal, the funds will still go to Tiffany to help her with her line and as a starting point for her fashion shows.
TELL EVERYONE ABOUT THIS! HELP A GIRL LIVE OUT LIFE LONG DREAMS!!
