Ciao! Sono Francesca, l'ideatrice del Vestito Verde.
Sono una studentessa dell'università Bocconi, appassionata di consumo responsabile, ecologia e creatività.

L'industria della moda è attualmente insostenibile, molto inquinante e spesso complice di sfruttamento. Credo che la maggior parte delle persone non sia amante di questo modello di business, ma è così difficile trovare alternative migliori che spesso ci rassegniamo e, per mancanza di informazioni, finiamo col fare acquisti nelle catene fast fashion

Ho sempre trovato l'acquisto di moda etica molto complicato e costoso, i brand sostenibili sono tanti, ma sono piccoli e spesso eclissati da grandi catene. Con Il Vestito Verde ho deciso di raccogliere tutti i brand di abbigliamento ecosostenibile ed etico e di sistematizzarli in categorie, in modo da rendere lo shopping consapevole un'esperienza più semplice, divertente ed economica.
Attraverso il Vestito Verde potrai trovare aziende che promuovono l'artigianato italiano, il riciclo e un modo di fare moda più umano, etico ed unico.
Il Vestito Verde NON è un e-commerce, ma un raccoglitore di molti e-commerce diversi.

Attraverso il menu potrai trovare tutto ciò che cerchi, dai costumi da bagno per donna alle scarpe per bambini. Nel sito saranno presenti più di 1000 brand. Sarà possibile filtrarli per selezionare solo alcune caratteristiche, come vegan, made in Italy, handmade e biologico. Passando con il cursore sopra la finestra del brand, potrai trovare ulteriori informazioni.
Sarà presente anche un'indicazione della fascia di prezzo di ogni brand, in modo da rendere la moda sostenibile accessibile a tutti!
Attraverso una donazione, aiuterai il Vestito Verde nella ricerca dei brand, nella promozione, nello sviluppo e nella manutenzione del sito.

0,"

 

With our 1st ever ""SINS WINDOW"", which changes through 7 sins (Greed, Wrath, Sloth, etc.) every 24 hours,  we provide the daily inspiration to rebel against or embrace your daily sin. How will you go through life? How will you deliver yourself to the world? How will you create your narrative to explore your desires? We will provide the spark.

 

 

 

 

 

We should not go through life with preconceived notions of who we are. We should wake every day with the goal to get rid of the prejudices we hold against ourselves. Go a little bit out of your depth. That’s right where you will be to do something exciting.
•  Envy The desire for others' traits, status, abilities, or situation
•  Gluttony an inordinate desire to consume more than that which one requires
•  Greed the desire for material wealth or gain
•  Lust an inordinate craving for the pleasures of the body
•  Pride the excessive belief in one's own abilities
•  Sloth the avoidance of physical or spiritual work
•  Wrath manifested in the individual who spurns love and opts instead for fury

You’re unique. Your watch should be also. 

With switch blade hands and the first ever custom Seven Sins date wheel you will face a new Sin every day.

Will you embrace your sin or rebel against it?

 

 

 

Time is constant...yet still created. To say ""I don't have time"", is like saying, ""I don't want to"". You should Want! And want strong.

Will you Embrace your sins or rebel against them? How will you Feed your passions? 

A versatile watch for all styles designed to be your new everyday watch
column2:
dressed up with the stainless band or dressed down with the NATO strap.... It's ready when you are.

 

 

Born in a bar. The first Stooges album blaring, a few cocktails into the evening, a goth girl singing the songs out loud, and a switchblade in our Creative Director’s pocket. From that night our Creative Director began prototyping, our Manufacturing Director began gathering industry respected suppliers and manufacturers, and the Goth girl went home with a stranger.

 

 

Our Manufacturing Director’s experience with sourcing and partnerships, added to the precision, scrutiny, and standards that we hold ourselves to. We have a dedicated team in the manufacturing plants reviewing and working with the technicians at every step in the process. Our Manufacturing Director is visiting the plant to ensure high quality, exact standards, and exceptional control. 

 

 

We selected the highly reputable Miyota 8205 Movement for its strong reputation of being a workhorse movement. This 21 jewel movement features a 42 hour power reserve and 21,600 VPM, which will keep your Seven Sins watch ticking for years to come!

 

 

 

 

Our Creative Director has carried around 3 things in his pocket everyday for the past 20+ years. A hobo nickel, his tooth that was knocked-out at an Agnostic Front show, and a switchblade.

The switchblade has been a valuable tool in his everyday life. For him it has come to symbolize the truth that requires the least speculation
column3:
similar to Occam's razor. Because of it’s instantaneous response it represents action. A reminder to continually move forward. Such a fitting use as the hands of the watch. It reminds one to take action with or against your sins on a daily basis.

 

 

 

 

We have enhanced our lume process using high grade phosphorescent. The LumiBrite lume is 10x brighter than conventional luminous paint. Longer fade times and brighter glows.

 

 

All Seven Sins watches will come standard with a stainless steel bracelet and a premium NATO strap.

 

 

 

 

 

All Sharp Bros. Watches come with a hardshell case made with 1680 Denier Ballistic Nylon and a padded interior. The conical shape provides a base for your watch to wrap around while the case is closed, keeping it held in place, secure, and ready to travel anywhere.

We will provide the spark.     We should not go through life with preconceived notions of who we are. We should wake every day with the goal to get rid of the prejudices we hold against ourselves. Go a little bit out of your depth. That’s right where you will be to do something exciting.

Items can fit in the Puzzle Box Bag: iPad mini, iPhone 8plus, sunglass, long wallet, pen, car key, lip balm and more. (size reference)
Puzzle Box Bag can convert into few styles: crossbody bag, shoulder bag, pouch/clutch and make-up bag/ vanity case, 4 in 1 for a bag.
Carry extra bag but lack of space to pack in the luggage? It can disassemble and packable flat in luggage to save more space for your other stuff.
Most important, it’s fashionable and practical, we didn’t forget this feature.
We chose recycled leathers and fabrics (rPET) as our main material to implement sustainable fashion concept
Recycled leathers and fabrics help reduce wastage from factories without going to landfill (both leather wastage and plastic bottle)

We are independent design studio based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. Our mission is to introduce the best and eco-friendly bag to the world. Every pieces of our products are limited in quantities and every designs are unique and yet affordable in price using environment-friendly materials.
Over the 5 years working with clothing and accessories company as a designer such as Bonia and etc, Michael Lee (MIC&
column2: BEN designer) found something more promising such as bringing 'MIC&amp
column3: BEN' to live and bringing fashion industry to be more eco-friendly.

column2: BEN co-founder), an experienced customer relationship manager, believed great customer service brought you luxurious shopping experience.

column1: We ensure that our suppliers and manufacturer in Guangzhou, China are well-certified. We are pleased to ensure our customer that our products are ethically-made with loved. All our product will produce in limited quantity and small-batch collection to prevent overload stockpile.

• We offered a special perk price for our backers. All backers will be listed on our website under ""hall of fame"" as a special thank you. (We will send a survey form for confirmation before listing)
• Received funds will use for production, operating expenses, and coming new collection, all backers will receive our email for announcement and special discount.
• We sell our product in limited quantity only, no overhead stockpile. All our design and bags are unique, sustainable and special for everyone.

• Not having a physical store lowers overhead costs, and the savings are
    passed to the backers/ customer.
• Our brand implements a sustainable concept, from materials to stock, we try not to make wastage left to the landfill.
• Sustainable materials (recycled leather and rP.E.T fabrics) as main materials.
• With your supports, we can help our earth reduce wastage together.
• Recycled leather is a special material which needs bulk order for new colourways, we offer black colour at the moment, our stretch goals offer new colour in a limited quantity.

Custom VAT: This does mean that from time to time, and depending upon the country, that customs at that country's border will stop the goods and levy a charge. Unfortunately, this is not something we have any control over and is standard for international shipments. We will try our best to avoid any additional charges.

We have a trusted, long-term relationship with a quality manufacturer overseas and a production schedule ready as soon as our goal has been met. The manufacturer is skilled and professional and we do not foresee any issues in the production process.

In manufacturing, there's always a risk that suppliers do not fulfill orders on time. We're working with a manufacturer that is very professional and organized. We are working closely with them to make sure production goes smoothly. In any case, we will do what we can to deliver before the expected delivery dates.
We are a small team of 2 people as a start-up, we will do our best to deliver the best quality and service to our backers and customers.
PLEASE CONSIDER BACKING US, AND SHARE THIS CAMPAIGN TO YOUR FRIENDS AND FAMILY.

column2:
>
 

The World's First Technical Leather Backpack with 12-in-1 versatility: Providing the functionality of a technical outdoor backpack and the premium style of a classic leather backpack.
column4:
>


 

Our current quality backpack options? Overpriced backpacks with little to no functionality OR overly functional technical outdoor backpacks with little to no style. Both of these categories are so specific we are forced to sacrifice either comfort or style. That's why we created a hybrid bag that combines the best of both categories.
column11: >
column24:
>



Flashback to early 2016. Husband and wife founder duo Gizem Mut-Webster &
column25: Johnathan Webster just gotten back from a month long trip, and went looking for a certain kind of bag. One that was highly functional yet simple, organizing yet un-techy, premium yet unfussy. The kind that would make going through the airport a breeze. When they couldn’t find what they had in mind, they hatched the idea that would become a world’s first: The Duffle Suitcase. They didn't have investor money behind them so they asked the crowdfunding community for help. It was an instant hit! The next year, 2017, they followed up with another invention: The 6-in-1 Duffle Backpack. And in 2018 they added the Duffle Backpack Sports to their collection of original designs. The Wings backpack is their newest innovation and 4th Indiegogo campaign.

column2: >

Oak’s fourth Indiegogo campaign. We have launched and delivered 3 successful campaigns to 1000s of happy backers. To date, our products have been delivered to thousands of happy backers in over 80 countries... and counting!

Oak has gained an extraordinary amount of knowledge from our previous crowdfunding experiences, as well as through our experience as an eCommerce brand. All of our learnings are continuously applied to further streamlining the entire experience for backers of our Wings campaign.

Oak is your travel brand. Based out of Brooklyn, New York we strive to make the best bags from your everyday carry to your month-long get-a-ways. We have a network of global manufacturers and significant experience with industry supply chain and logistics management.

column1: We work with companies from around the world including Bogota, Los Angeles, Berlin, India and Vietnam. Everything we do is about travel and we love the thrill and exploration of it!

We have secured our manufacturers, shippers and fulfillment centers, all of whom are waiting for us to give them the green light! All of our partners have over 5 decades of experience. Our manufacturers are professional, precise and ethical.

Our freight forwarders move tons of product daily and they are ready for our business. We have partnered up with one of the industry's leading fulfillment center so our backers will get their Wings backpack in pristine condition and, and on time–no matter where in the world they’re headed.
With all of this being said, we must note that unforeseen complications do occasionally arise. Natural disasters or accidents are unavoidable.
We’ve constructed our timelines with reasonable accommodations for unforeseen events, and The Wings backpack will be insured throughout every step of its arrival to your doorstep.

column2: Oak has a keen understanding of the fact that delays in the fashion industry are sometimes inevitable, so our anticipated delivery dates are conservative estimates. If all runs smoothly there is a chance you will receive your bag earlier than expected!

column1: Most domestic shipments are sent through USPS, UPS, or FedEx. The exact service depends on the size and weight of your order and your location.

U.S. Delivery Times: 
Handling time is generally 1-3 business days, and once shipped packages usually reach their destination in 2-5 business days.

Local Duties, Taxes, and Fees: 
Some international backers will be subject to local customs import duties and taxes
column2: these backers will be responsible for covering all of their local customs duties and taxes. In certain cases the prices of your rewards along with the cost of shipping may be included with the duties / taxes / fees assessed on your shipment.

column1: Import duties and taxes are not covered by this Indiegogo campaign or by Wool &
column3: Oak is not responsible for any customs, duties, taxes, or any other import-related fees associated with receiving your Wool &amp

column1:
International Delivery Times: 
Orders typically take 4-10 business days to reach international destinations
column2: however, some shipments can take up to 3-4 weeks to reach certain destinations due to complexities associated with international shipping and local customs.

column1: The Wings backpack you are seeing on this Indiegogo are considered final prototypes. They are very close to the finished product you’ll receive, but the design may be subject to final alterations and/or modifications based on Wool &

While all of our products include a warranty against any manufacturer defects, it is not our policy to offer refunds or returns on items received as Indiegogo rewards.

column2: >UPDATE! The First 50 Backers Will Get a Personalized ""Thank You"" Video from Molly!

column1: Join Thousands of Customers Who Already Love From Molly With Love

Hi. My name is Molly Beane. I started From Molly With Love 2.5 years ago from the kitchen of my 500 sq. ft. apartment in San Diego, Calif. I'd been making my own skincare products as a hobby for years, but in 2016, I was freshly out of rehab for alcoholism and out of a job (I'd been in PR/marketing for a decade). It was the lowest point of my life. So naturally, I decided to take that pain and create something beautiful with it.

We started with just a few hundred dollars on Etsy in Aug 2016. 2.5 years later, From Molly With Love sells in hundreds of retail stores, including Urban Outfitters. We also sell on Amazon and are gearing up for both retail &
column2: ecommerce expansion in 2019. We're now a team of 5 employees and growing.
>We taught ourselves how to pack palettes!
><i>A team that protests together stays together

column1: Because I bootstrapped my company myself (with very little funds), we have experienced some growing pains in the last year. ","UPDATE! The First 50 Backers Will Get a Personalized ""Thank You"" Video from Molly!
Join Thousands of Customers Who Already Love From Molly With Love

Hi. My name is Molly Beane. I started From Molly With Love 2.5 years ago from the kitchen of my 500 sq. ft. apartment in San Diego, Calif. I'd been making my own skincare products as a hobby for years, but in 2016, I was freshly out of rehab for alcoholism and out of a job (I'd been in PR/marketing for a decade). It was the lowest point of my life. So naturally, I decided to take that pain and create something beautiful with it.

We started with just a few hundred dollars on Etsy in Aug 2016. 2.5 years later, From Molly With Love sells in hundreds of retail stores, including Urban Outfitters. We also sell on Amazon and are gearing up for both retail & ecommerce expansion in 2019. We're now a team of 5 employees and growing.
We taught ourselves how to pack palettes!
A team that protests together stays together

We sell all-natural ""clean"" facial skincare, bath & body products & aromatherapy. Our products look & perform like ""luxury"" products without the high price tag. We believe that everyone should have access to healthy skincare products.

Because I bootstrapped my company myself (with very little funds), we have experienced some growing pains in the last year. I noticed that it was sometimes taking our customers awhile to receive their product - and I wanted to improve the production process, enhance product quality, and streamline our shipping processes so customers can get their orders faster.
I know customer satisfaction is what is going to help us get to the next level. So we're raising money so we can keep our customer first as we grow.
What We Need & What You Get
We're hoping to raise at least $50,000 in 50 days. Here is how we will use the funds:

We will move to a new production facility so we have more space to work as we grow. We're totally grown out of our current facility. This new facility will adhere to Good Manufacturing Practices and will be better organized so we can work more efficiently.
Stock up on inventory to shorten shipping & lead times for customers.
We want to keep our customers our central focus as we grow. These funds will help us grow & scale, while allowing us to better serve our customers.

This was taken at a local boutique in San Diego that carries our products. We did a chakra workshop where we taught the audience about chakras and how to use these sprays in yoga, meditation, or around the house.
